Chinese Subtitle: 人，我保住了
English Translation: My master-safe!

Chinese Subtitle: 经，我取到了
English Translation: The scriptures-sound!

Chinese Subtitle: 俺老孙啥功名不要，只求回到这花果山终老，过过逍遥日子
English Translation: All I ever wanted was a life in my mountain, free from you, and your so-called merits.

Chinese Subtitle: 上面的天王老子信不过我，我懂
English Translation: Those high above don't trust me. I understand that.

Chinese Subtitle: 让你小子带些虾兵蟹将过来虚张声势
English Translation: And they send you and those knuckleheads...

Chinese Subtitle: 让你小子带些虾兵蟹将过来虚张声势
English Translation: And they send you and those knuckleheads...

Chinese Subtitle: 让你小子带些虾兵蟹将过来虚张声势
English Translation: And they send you and those knuckleheads...

Chinese Subtitle: 又想唬我回去做神仙，我也懂
English Translation: to threaten me to obey and serve once more. Hmm, I understand that too.

Chinese Subtitle: 我不懂的是……
English Translation: But what I don't understand is...

Chinese Subtitle: 你他娘的杀我猴子猴孙
English Translation: you bastards killing my kind!

Chinese Subtitle: 蠢狗，放肆，还不退下
English Translation: Stay back, stupid dog!

Chinese Subtitle: 都记好喽，他不是只普通猴子，他是有功的猴子
English Translation: Mark this. He's not just any monkey. He's a monkey of merit.

Chinese Subtitle: 是封过佛位的猴子
English Translation: A monkey was made Buddha once.

Chinese Subtitle: 这里除了我，没人配与他单挑
English Translation: None other than me can challenge him to a duel.

Chinese Subtitle: 猢狲啊猢狲，我本不想与你这个手下败将再战一场
English Translation: Look, monkey, I don't make a habit of fighting someone I've before...

Chinese Subtitle: 猢狲啊猢狲，我本不想与你这个手下败将再战一场
English Translation: Look, monkey, I don't make a habit of fighting someone I've before...

Chinese Subtitle: 猢狲啊猢狲，我本不想与你这个手下败将再战一场
English Translation: Look, monkey, I don't make a habit of fighting someone I've before...

Chinese Subtitle: 这样罢，一会儿若是你败了，我带你回天庭
English Translation: Here's my offer. If you lose, I'll take you to the Celestial Court.

Chinese Subtitle: 他们，留在这里铲平花果山
English Translation: They would stay and level your mountain.

Chinese Subtitle: 若是我输了，我定然不会罢休
English Translation: But if I lose, I shall certainly take revenge,

Chinese Subtitle: 他们，照样铲平花果山
English Translation: and they will level your mountain nonetheless!

Chinese Subtitle: 生灵涂炭呐，好歹也同僚一场，是真不想打
English Translation: How tragic would that be, huh? You were one of the Court; we don't need to resort to violence.

Chinese Subtitle: 要不你现在就跪下，认个错，这事儿就算过去了，如何？
English Translation: How about you bend the knees, admit the wrongs and we can put this behind us?

Chinese Subtitle: 这么多年了，除了那只猪头，就属你最会扯淡，最能逗老孙开心
English Translation: All these years, except for that pig, you're the one who talks the tallest tales. Good, I am entertained!

Chinese Subtitle: 这么多年了，除了那只猪头，就属你最会扯淡，最能逗老孙开心
English Translation: All these years, except for that pig, you're the one who talks the tallest tales. Good, I am entertained!

Chinese Subtitle: 杨兄弟，你放心
English Translation: Speaking of entertainment,

Chinese Subtitle: 待会儿我只拔下你额头上那颗眼睛尝尝鲜，其他两颗先给你留着
English Translation: wouldn't it be fun if I pluck your extra eye out for my snack, and allow you to keep the other two?
Source Word: 拔下你额头上那颗眼睛

Chinese Subtitle: 我让你亲眼看看，我是怎么杀光天庭每一条狗的
English Translation: Because I'd hate to let you miss how I'll slaughter each mongrel of the Court.

Chinese Subtitle: 这里的，上面的，还有刚刚那条黑的
English Translation: Those below, those above, and that black mutt of yours.

Chinese Subtitle: 溜撒点，一起上罢！
English Translation: Come at me, all of you!

Chinese Subtitle: 老天一再给你机会
English Translation: They gave you many chances,

Chinese Subtitle: 你这般不识抬举，算不算背恩忘情
English Translation: yet you spurned each one. Such ingratitude!

Chinese Subtitle: 你这般不识抬举，算不算背恩忘情
English Translation: yet you spurned each one. Such ingratitude!

Chinese Subtitle: 斗战胜佛……
English Translation: The Victorious Fighting Buddha...

Chinese Subtitle: 你可知这长生不老的佛位，有多少人求而不得？
English Translation: Have you any idea how many would give their everything for immortality?

Chinese Subtitle: 长生不老……
English Translation: Immortality...

Chinese Subtitle: 三界六道，不就毁在这四个字上？
English Translation: For that word, all realms and beings have ruined themselves.

Chinese Subtitle: 泼猴，你受了天箓，本性未改
English Translation: The Celestial Court welcomed you, foul monkey, yet you remain untamed!

Chinese Subtitle: 泼猴，你受了天箓，本性未改
English Translation: The Celestial Court welcomed you, foul monkey, yet you remain untamed!

Chinese Subtitle: 今日谁也救不了
English Translation: None shall save you now!

Chinese Subtitle: 好兄长， 你的刀钝了？
English Translation: Dear brother, your edge needs honing.

Chinese Subtitle: 好兄长， 你的刀钝了？
English Translation: Dear brother, your edge needs honing.

Chinese Subtitle: 正好给俺老孙挠个痒……
English Translation: Good, I was in need of a backscratcher!

Chinese Subtitle: 泼猴，吃吾一刃！
English Translation: Foul monkey, taste my axe!Foul monke

Chinese Subtitle: 小外甥，这就是你说的单挑？
English Translation: Brat, you call that a duel?

Chinese Subtitle: 天上阳光扎眼的很，有种再和你舅舅去山里会会
English Translation: The glare up here is dazzling. Fight me in the woods if you have the guts.

Chinese Subtitle: 天上阳光扎眼的很，有种再和你舅舅去山里会会
English Translation: The glare up here is dazzling. Fight me in the woods if you have the guts.

Chinese Subtitle: 这便是孙悟空的最后一个故事
English Translation: And so ends the last tale of Sun Wukong,

Chinese Subtitle: 他一生豪杰，平生最喜自由自在
English Translation: a hero who treasured his freedom above all else.

Chinese Subtitle: 纵然得了正果金身，却还是受不得天条繁冗
English Translation: Buddhahood he attained, yes; but cumbersome, he found the Celestial Rules.

Chinese Subtitle: 一心想着回来这里，与咱共乐天真
English Translation: For he yearned to come back and to revel in the simple joys with us.

Chinese Subtitle: 谁知他辞了佛位，欢喜还乡，有些人倒是越发放心不下
English Translation: Little did he know, his choice to forgo the life above only fueled their mistrust.

Chinese Subtitle: 这块石头啊，在山里矗了不知多少时节
English Translation: This stone has stood for countless days on the mountain.

Chinese Subtitle: 我打小听人说，齐天大圣的尸身，就藏在里面
English Translation: Since my youth, they said that his remains lie within it.

Chinese Subtitle: 他乃天产石猴，本有不生不灭的大神通
English Translation: Unbegotten, undying, such is the nature of a stone monkey.

Chinese Subtitle: 纵然不幸身死，但神魂没有完全消散
English Translation: Though his body was broken, his spirit endures.

Chinese Subtitle: 而是化为了六件灵物，各自逃遁，隐匿世间
English Translation: Into six relics he turned, and separately they escaped, choosing to stay hidden.

Chinese Subtitle: 这便是大圣六根的传说
English Translation: Those are the Six Senses of the Great Sage.

Chinese Subtitle: 可惜数百年来，无人亲眼得见
English Translation: Yet no one has ever seen them. Not in centuries.

Chinese Subtitle: 我老了，走不完这四洲茫茫之地
English Translation: I'm old now. Venture through all the lands, I cannot.

Chinese Subtitle: 但你们之中，庶几会有天命所归
English Translation: Yet among you, there might be one who is destined,

Chinese Subtitle: 将他遗下的灵物一一寻遍
English Translation: one that shall recover all his scattered relics.

Chinese Subtitle: 待灵物尽数回归花果山之日，或是大圣复生之时……
English Translation: And upon the return of the relics to Mount Huaguo, he may yet rise again...

Chinese Subtitle: 走走走，游游游
English Translation: On the go, bent the toe,

Chinese Subtitle: 甘为铜钱做马牛
English Translation: Life of human, all for gold.

Chinese Subtitle: 做人哪比做妖好
English Translation: Nowhere better than our home,

Chinese Subtitle: 不怕阎王命不休
English Translation: We cheat death and ever grow.

Chinese Subtitle: 诶，你看
English Translation: Here, you see?

Chinese Subtitle: 缘到福自有
English Translation: What bliss my fate shows!

Chinese Subtitle: 大哥真是有口福
English Translation: Well well! Luck's around the corner.

Chinese Subtitle: 指不定是从哪个山头上滚下来的
English Translation: Seems like it just fell from a fruit tree here.

Chinese Subtitle: 正好饿着
English Translation: Perfect timing!

Chinese Subtitle: 这桃儿倒是识趣
English Translation: This peach knew I needed a snack!

Chinese Subtitle: 好个小猢狲
English Translation: You sneaky rascal!

Chinese Subtitle: 敢作弄你爷爷？
English Translation: Dared to fool me?

Chinese Subtitle: 今日定叫你知道知道厉害！
English Translation: I'll make sure you regret it!

Chinese Subtitle: 不管来多少次
English Translation: No matter how many times you come around.

Chinese Subtitle: 发什么呆
English Translation: What are you waiting for?

Chinese Subtitle: 拔根毛来拜一拜
English Translation: Pluck your hair and make an offer!

Chinese Subtitle: 哎，等等！
English Translation: Hey! Wait!

Chinese Subtitle: 小神是黑风山的土地，在此候你多时
English Translation: I, the keeper of Black Wind Mountain, have long been waiting for your arrival.

Chinese Subtitle: 像
English Translation: His spitting image...

Chinese Subtitle: 真像
English Translation: I'd say.

Chinese Subtitle: 再往前走，就是观音禅院
English Translation: Up ahead is Guanyin Temple.

Chinese Subtitle: 当年也是香火鼎盛
English Translation: Once, it was bustling with worshippers,

Chinese Subtitle: 只可惜那场大火……
English Translation: before it was ruined by that fire...

Chinese Subtitle: 后来，这禅院又被重建了
English Translation: Then, the temple was rebuilt.

Chinese Subtitle: 可人心若是烧没了
English Translation: But what good is it to rebuild a temple...

Chinese Subtitle: 修好一座破庙，又有什么用呢？
English Translation: if the goodwill of men has been burnt to ashes.

Chinese Subtitle: 你不记得此地
English Translation: You've forgotten this place.

Chinese Subtitle: 此地却是有些东西惦记着你
English Translation: but they haven't forgotten you!

Chinese Subtitle: 来者不善，小猴子自求多福！
English Translation: That's a tough one. Good luck to you!

Chinese Subtitle: 许久不用
English Translation: It's been a while,

Chinese Subtitle: 没承想这定身术倒还好使
English Translation: but the Immobilize Spell still works like a charm!

Chinese Subtitle: 既是花果山来的故人
English Translation: Since you hail from Mount Huaguo,

Chinese Subtitle: 教你一招也无妨
English Translation: it won't hurt to teach you a handy trick.

Chinese Subtitle: 来，速速把手伸来！
English Translation: Now, here we go, give me your hand!

Chinese Subtitle: 写好了
English Translation: There you go.

Chinese Subtitle: 日后遇到什么凶匪恶徒
English Translation: Should you come across any miscreants,

Chinese Subtitle: 只消用这手一指
English Translation: just point your finger at them,

Chinese Subtitle: 心里默念一声“定”
English Translation: and release this spell.

Chinese Subtitle: 就能让对方动弹不得
English Translation: You'll be able to hold them in place,

Chinese Subtitle: 你也可喘息片刻
English Translation: while giving yourself a breather.

Chinese Subtitle: 只是小老儿道行浅薄
English Translation: Sadly, mine is but a humble trick.

Chinese Subtitle: 这定身效果不消片刻就会失灵
English Translation: Its power will wear off within a few short moments.

Chinese Subtitle: 遇到些夯货倒还好用
English Translation: Though it's good enough against boneheads like this one.

Chinese Subtitle: 你权当是挣个傍身的手段罢
English Translation: Anyway, just consider it an ace up your sleeve.

Chinese Subtitle: 如今这些小儿
English Translation: The younguais these days...

Chinese Subtitle: 真是目无尊长！
English Translation: have no manners!

Chinese Subtitle: 别怕，用刚学的法术与他玩玩！
English Translation: Fear not! Teach him a lesson with your new spell!

Chinese Subtitle: 再不知深浅地这么往前硬闯
English Translation: Hey! Wait! You don't think you can just parade in, do you?

Chinese Subtitle: 只怕得吃大苦头
English Translation: It's not that simple!

Chinese Subtitle: 我且把你变为一只金蝉
English Translation: Let me transform you into a golden cicada.

Chinese Subtitle: 你可顺着前面的火光
English Translation: So you may follow the fires ahead,

Chinese Subtitle: 探一探这山中的虚实
English Translation: and scout this mountain unnoticed...

Chinese Subtitle: 小庙还有诸多神奇妙用
English Translation: It might be humble, but my shrine is very versatile.

Chinese Subtitle: 日后你自会明白
English Translation: You'll get it soon enough.

Chinese Subtitle: 黑风山的后山重地，藏着不少秘密
English Translation: In the depths of Black Wind Mountain, there are secrets galore.

Chinese Subtitle: 想四处探探的话
English Translation: The cicada form may help you explore,

Chinese Subtitle: 务必留神金蝉的存续时间
English Translation: but be wary this form does not last forever.

Chinese Subtitle: 若是遇上穷途末路之处
English Translation: Should you find yourself lost,

Chinese Subtitle: 小神自会暗中提点
English Translation: just follow my voice.

Chinese Subtitle: 放心去罢！
English Translation: Now, off you go!

Chinese Subtitle: 来者何人
English Translation: Who goes there?

Chinese Subtitle: 敢来此处扰我清修？
English Translation: How dare you to interrupt my meditation...

Chinese Subtitle: 诶，又是只猴子？
English Translation: Hmmm...Another monkey, I see?

Chinese Subtitle: 施主不如放下棍棒
English Translation: Why don't you lay down your weapon,

Chinese Subtitle: 也同我学点佛法
English Translation: and join me in Buddha's mercy?

Chinese Subtitle: 如何？
English Translation: What say you?

Chinese Subtitle: 你……莫非就是大王说的那个……
English Translation: You... Master spoke of you...

Chinese Subtitle: 天……命……人
English Translation: The Destined... One.

Chinese Subtitle: 嘘！别出声
English Translation: Shhh! Keep quiet!

Chinese Subtitle: 小心惊动了那条大狗
English Translation: You don't want to set off that beast.

Chinese Subtitle: 后院那厮是黑风怪的道友
English Translation: In the backyard is Black Wind Guai's ally.

Chinese Subtitle: 自称灵虚子
English Translation: Calls itself Lingxuzi.

Chinese Subtitle: 以你现在的道行，恐怕……
English Translation: Considering your strength... I'd suggest you...

Chinese Subtitle: 糟了！
English Translation: Oh, no!

Chinese Subtitle: 小猴子快逃，还来得及！
English Translation: Get away while you can, little monkey!

Chinese Subtitle: 你若进了这道门，便回不了头了！
English Translation: Once you pass that gate, there's no turning back!

Chinese Subtitle: 小瞧你了
English Translation: You've surprised me.

Chinese Subtitle: 既然结果了它，不妨先把这里翻个底朝天
English Translation: Now that it's dead, you might as well take a good look around.

Chinese Subtitle: 那黑风怪赏了凌虚子一颗金丹
English Translation: A great pill the Black Wind Guai had gifted the wolf.

Chinese Subtitle: 若是寻到此物，就算没白来一遭
English Translation: Finding it would be a deserving reward for that fight.

Chinese Subtitle: 小僧法名广谋
English Translation: This humble one's name is Guangmou.

Chinese Subtitle: 若是今日死在你手
English Translation: Should my demise come by your hands,

Chinese Subtitle: 帮我带句话给师父
English Translation: please pass this message to my master:

Chinese Subtitle: 肉眼凡夫，求而不得神仙骨
English Translation: Searching for deity, mortals do aspire.

Chinese Subtitle: 半荣半枯，几人知是长生路
English Translation: Craving immortality, yaoguais surely will conspire.

Chinese Subtitle: 施主如此执于外物
English Translation: My master is possession-obsessed.

Chinese Subtitle: 与我那师父又有何分别
English Translation: You are just like him...

Chinese Subtitle: 广谋？
English Translation: Guangmou?

Chinese Subtitle: 广智？
English Translation: Guangzhi?

Chinese Subtitle: 小神想起来了！
English Translation: I remember now!

Chinese Subtitle: 当年怂恿金池长老放火烧死唐僧师徒的恶僧
English Translation: The evil monks abetted Elder Jinchi to burn the Great Sage and Tang Monk alive...

Chinese Subtitle: 正是他俩！
English Translation: That's these two!

Chinese Subtitle: 我道是这两人，都随那场火灰飞烟灭了
English Translation: I thought they were already turned into ashes by that fire.

Chinese Subtitle: 谁晓得不但没死，还化成了一狼一蛇两只妖怪
English Translation: Who would have thought they had turned into yaoguais?

Chinese Subtitle: 小神有种不好的预感
English Translation: I have an ominous feeling...

Chinese Subtitle: 钟响之后，后山传来的怨气似乎更重了一些……
English Translation: After the bell rang, it seems as though the resentment in the depths of the mountain has grown.

Chinese Subtitle: 算了算了，想那么多作甚
English Translation: Forget it... Overthinking won't help.

Chinese Subtitle: 现在山里大大小小的妖精，都知道你闯进来了
English Translation: Your presence has already made a mess in the mountain.

Chinese Subtitle: 干脆一鼓作气，把他们收拾干净罢！
English Translation: Why not go ahead and take them out once and for all?

Chinese Subtitle: 你你你，愣着干嘛？
English Translation: Hey, hey! What are you waiting for?

Chinese Subtitle: 快快快，帮你哥哥，速速乱棍打死
English Translation: Come, come! Help a big brother and give them a drubbing!

Chinese Subtitle: 小小蛇妖，不过尔尔
English Translation: These snake guais are nothing to fear.

Chinese Subtitle: 蛇胆用来泡酒，倒是清热解毒的佳品
English Translation: Snake gall steeped in drink, though, makes a fine tonic to flush malady.

Chinese Subtitle: 来来来，小老弟，里面请，里面请
English Translation: Here, here, young friend! Be my guest inside!

Chinese Subtitle: 瞧瞧瞧，你这模样多半也是花果山来的猴子，我见得多了
English Translation: Well, well, I'd stake you're one more monkey from Mount Huaguo. I've met many of you.

Chinese Subtitle: 论辈分你们都得叫我声祖宗
English Translation: By rank of birth, you all ought to call me forefather.

Chinese Subtitle: 不过算了，谁让我被贬了呢
English Translation: But I' m just an old monkey banished to the mortal world.

Chinese Subtitle: 下界之时，拿了不少宝贝，你瞅瞅，可有心仪的？
English Translation: I brought troves down to this realm, though. Have a look if something catches your fancy.

Chinese Subtitle: 小老弟切记，一分醉酒，十分醉德
English Translation: Remember, young friend: a sip makes one tipsy, many sips make you hammered.

Chinese Subtitle: 管他玉液琼浆，羊酪椰醪，宽怀畅饮！
English Translation: Dew drops, honey brew, sheep curd, palm tipple. I drink all there is!

Chinese Subtitle: 有酒处处神仙府，无酒天阙如天牢
English Translation: Where there's drink, all is bliss. Without it, the highest court is a cage.

Chinese Subtitle: 凤兮凤兮
English Translation: Hailed bird, hailed bird!

Chinese Subtitle: 何德之衰
English Translation: What dimmed your shine?

Chinese Subtitle: 往者不可谏
English Translation: Past's grip, beyond our grasp.

Chinese Subtitle: 来者犹可追
English Translation: The future, we may still clasp.

Chinese Subtitle: 小师父，天色已晚
English Translation: Late is the hour, young one....

Chinese Subtitle: 你来我这修身之地大开杀戒
English Translation: ... in which you choose to stain my tranquil abode.

Chinese Subtitle: 到底是何居心啊？
English Translation: Pray tell, to what end do you seek?

Chinese Subtitle: 且慢！
English Translation: Halt!

Chinese Subtitle: 是大哥要我来此做个内应，这才假意听命于那熊罴守这后山要道
English Translation: No ill will I bear. I'm merely my brother's eyes and ears. I feign my loyalty to guard this path on the bear's order!

Chinese Subtitle: 知君命不偶，同病亦同忧
English Translation: Your destiny's bleak and stark. In its grip, we share the mark.

Chinese Subtitle: 观音禅院是烧没了，可那长老的冤魂没有散
English Translation: The Guanyin Temple now lies in cinders, yet the Elder's soul endures.

Chinese Subtitle: 贪根不拔，苦树常在
English Translation: The root of greed ever fosters the stem of suffering.

Chinese Subtitle: 你真正想要的东西，忘了最好
English Translation: Better to forget the things you truly seek.

Chinese Subtitle: 那三口钟……你可都见过了？
English Translation: The three bells... Have you seen them all?

Chinese Subtitle: 旁人念念不忘的，也是你所求的吗……
English Translation: Do you, too, desire that which they ceaselessly hold dear?
The bells?

Chinese Subtitle: 自那黑风怪回来后，山里便立起了三口洪钟，却不许旁人靠近
English Translation: Three bells were set in the mountain since the Black Wind Guai's return, yet no one is allowed to go near them.

Chinese Subtitle: 莫非那三口钟，与当年的火烧禅院有关？
English Translation: Maybe the bells have something to do with the temple's burning.

Chinese Subtitle: 此人所言不像假话，小猴子，你可暗自留心
English Translation: His words sound like truth to me, little monkey. Stay sharp and keep a lookout!

Chinese Subtitle: 阿弥陀佛
English Translation: Thank Amitabha!

Chinese Subtitle: 那三口洪钟终于响了
English Translation: Oh finally then, the three bells sang!

Chinese Subtitle: 徒儿们，又有外面的老爷们过来了
English Translation: Disciples come! I hear travelers approaching my temple!

Chinese Subtitle: 给我带新宝贝了！
English Translation: Carrying new treasures!

Chinese Subtitle: 我看不见样貌
English Translation: I cannot see you....

Chinese Subtitle: 但我能闻到那股臊味
English Translation: but I recognize your odor!

Chinese Subtitle: 莫非是你？
English Translation: It cannot be you?

Chinese Subtitle: 你回来了？
English Translation: You are back?

Chinese Subtitle: 定是你把那袈裟藏起来了
English Translation: It must be you who took that kasaya!

Chinese Subtitle: 快还给我！
English Translation: Now give it back!

Chinese Subtitle: 我今年二百七十岁
English Translation: Two hundred...and seventy years spent...

Chinese Subtitle: 空挣了几百件袈裟
English Translation: Kasayas collected....by the hundreds...

Chinese Subtitle: 怎么得有他这一件？
English Translation: Still one short...without his...

Chinese Subtitle: 不，不不
English Translation: No, no, no! Stop, stop, stop!

Chinese Subtitle: 广智广谋
English Translation: Guangzhi! Guangmou!

Chinese Subtitle: 那袈裟我不要了，不要了……
English Translation: That kasaya... Leave it... Just leave it!

Chinese Subtitle: 你们别烧，都别烧了……
English Translation: Stop the fire! Please stop...

Chinese Subtitle: 辟火罩！

Chinese Subtitle: 你想必是超度过那个人了

Chinese Subtitle: 唉，缘起缘落

Chinese Subtitle: 只因多看一眼

Chinese Subtitle: 天色不早，赶紧上山罢！
English Translation: It's getting late. Let's hurry up the mountain!

Chinese Subtitle: 五百年了

Chinese Subtitle: 我重建了观音禅院

Chinese Subtitle: 规模比之前的更大
English Translation: Now it's grander in scope.

Chinese Subtitle: 那些葬身火海的僧众

Chinese Subtitle: 化为孤魂野鬼

Chinese Subtitle: 在这黑风山间游荡

Chinese Subtitle: 是我！
English Translation: It was I,

Chinese Subtitle: 亲手将他们超度
English Translation: who granted them eternal repose!

Chinese Subtitle: 我甚至把那些经书残卷
English Translation: I have even restored the charred scriptures...

Chinese Subtitle: 一一复原

Chinese Subtitle: 但我知道总有一天
English Translation: But oh yes I always knew...

Chinese Subtitle: 你还是会找上门来！
English Translation: one day you shall return!

Chinese Subtitle: 有点本事

Chinese Subtitle: 有种跟我来山顶会会！
English Translation: Meet me at the summit if you dare!

Chinese Subtitle: 他这聚形散气之术
English Translation: The spell he just cast...

Chinese Subtitle: 看着花里胡哨
English Translation: may appear intricate,

Chinese Subtitle: 实则不难掌握
English Translation: but it's not hard to learn.

Chinese Subtitle: 这黑风怪学艺不精
English Translation: That black bear's expertise is lacking.

Chinese Subtitle: 去了趟南海也不见长进
English Translation: Serving Guanyin didn't help him much.

Chinese Subtitle: 他刚才的几番变化
English Translation: But what he left here...

Chinese Subtitle: 遗留了不少元气在此
English Translation: could surely help us!

Chinese Subtitle: 正好小老儿收些来用！
English Translation: Consider today your lucky day!

Chinese Subtitle: 聚形散气，无痕无迹
English Translation: Focus and disperse, illusions traverse.

Chinese Subtitle: 里面门道大得很
English Translation: You still have a lot to learn.

Chinese Subtitle: 自己慢慢领悟罢
English Translation: Give yourself the time you need.

Chinese Subtitle: 小猴子，前方山路凶险，紧要时莫忘了刚学的法术！
English Translation: Ahead is a treacherous path, young monkey. Don't forget the spell you just learned!

Chinese Subtitle: 那家伙曾经对我说
English Translation: He once told me,

Chinese Subtitle: 眼不见，心不乱寻常修为，
English Translation: Out of sight, out of mind is a fool's task;

Chinese Subtitle: 入一切相，破一切相，方得自在
English Translation: seeing but seeing through is what wise men do".

Chinese Subtitle: 可是他自己看到那些东西后
English Translation: But didn't he turn mad...

Chinese Subtitle: 不也疯了吗？
English Translation: by what he saw, too?

Chinese Subtitle: 小泼物有点手段
English Translation: You cunning wretch...

Chinese Subtitle: 今日本大王先不与你纠缠！
English Translation: I'll spare your sorry life for today!

Chinese Subtitle: 此番不同往昔
English Translation: Fortune is no longer on your side.

Chinese Subtitle: 无人与你助力
English Translation: No one will come to your aid.

Chinese Subtitle: 待我取走这宝贝
English Translation: All I need is to take it elsewhere...

Chinese Subtitle: 哪里不能重建宝刹？
English Translation: and rebuild everything anew!

Chinese Subtitle: 大圣
English Translation: Great Sage!

Chinese Subtitle: 哦不，小圣
English Translation: Oh, pardon me, Young Sage!

Chinese Subtitle: 小圣饶命！小圣饶命！
English Translation: Mercy, Young Sage! Have mercy!

Chinese Subtitle: 我也是被那天庭胁迫
English Translation: I was just a pawn of the Celestial Court.

Chinese Subtitle: 若非身不由己
English Translation: If given a choice,

Chinese Subtitle: 好端端的谁敢对那闹天宫的瘟神动手
English Translation: who'd dare to challenge the mighty Wrecker of the Celestial Palace?

Chinese Subtitle: 这熊怪说的倒不假
English Translation: His words ring true.

Chinese Subtitle: 借再多的胆子
English Translation: No matter how daring he was,

Chinese Subtitle: 他也绝计不敢自己谋害大圣
English Translation: he had not the nerve to harm the Great Sage.

Chinese Subtitle: 这幕后指使定然另有其人
English Translation: There must be someone else pulling all the strings

Chinese Subtitle: 况且这玩意邪乎得很
English Translation: Exactly! And this thing is eerie.

Chinese Subtitle: 得来后根本不知如何炼化
English Translation: I had no idea how to make use of its power,

Chinese Subtitle: 只好高高供在上面
English Translation: except to enshrine it up there,

Chinese Subtitle: 偶尔骗些小妖怪朝拜敛财而已
English Translation: tricking lesser yaoguais into offerings.

Chinese Subtitle: 若小圣饶我这一次
English Translation: If you'd pardon me,

Chinese Subtitle: 我自当回到南海负荆请罪
English Translation: I'll go back to Guanyin to atone for my actions,

Chinese Subtitle: 重戴禁箍
English Translation: and be put back on the Encaging Band.

Chinese Subtitle: 从此不再离开普陀半步！
English Translation: You will never see me out there anymore!

Chinese Subtitle: 别听他掰扯！
English Translation: Oh, ignore his nonsense!

Chinese Subtitle: 小猴子，赶紧先把大圣遗物取回来看看
English Translation: Go now little monkey, go and retrieve the great sage's relic.

Chinese Subtitle: 师傅，徒弟还是想不明白
English Translation: Master, it still puzzles me.

Chinese Subtitle: 出家人尘缘已断，金海尽干
English Translation: A monk's lust for gold should be quelled.

Chinese Subtitle: 长老他为何偏偏放不下一件衣裳？
English Translation: Why does Elder Jinchi still cling to that one kasaya?

Chinese Subtitle: 若不披上这件衣裳
English Translation: Bereft of that kasaya,

Chinese Subtitle: 众生又怎知我尘缘已断，金海尽干
English Translation: how shall they show the world their ties are cut, and their lust is quelled?

Chinese Subtitle: 黄风岭，八百里，曾是关外富饶地
English Translation: Yellow Wind Ridge, a mighty ole' range, once buzzin' with joy and glee.

Chinese Subtitle: 一朝鼠患凭空起，乌烟瘴气渺人迹
English Translation: But the pesky rats took hold, a sudden unfold, turned it all barren and bleak.

Chinese Subtitle: 无父无君无法纪，为非作歹有天庇
English Translation: The King got denied, rules thrown aside, evil connived, runnin' wild and free.

Chinese Subtitle: 幸得大圣见佛力，邪风一时偃旌旗
English Translation: Wukong went to the Bodhisattva to plead, granting this land a moment o'peace.

Chinese Subtitle: 哪知不测奇祸起旦夕
English Translation: Yet before long, another disaster struck,

Chinese Subtitle: 那黄毛孽畜再回籍
English Translation: The cursed beast returned on a killin' spree

Chinese Subtitle: 凶犯不死好得意，福星横尸却成谜
English Translation: The hero, he lies there dead, with the truth hidden from ye and me...

Chinese Subtitle: 小施主来此的目的，老衲多少猜到几许
English Translation: Reckon I got an idea why ye have come here, me friend.

Chinese Subtitle: 心急吃不着热面皮，暂且助你一臂之力
English Translation: Haste makes waste. I'll lend ye a hand.

Chinese Subtitle: 小心上路，再落得一身窟窿可没人救
English Translation: Watch your step, eh? Get more shots and you'll be high and dry.

Chinese Subtitle: 血化风，沙化雨，无主的猫鼠儿串一气
English Translation: In a land o' bloodshed and chaos' sting, mice and rat mingle without a king.

Chinese Subtitle: 成败生死莫讲理，不强走那正道才有戏
English Translation: No logic in success or strife, the right path may be a different thing.

Chinese Subtitle: 好一个心狠手辣的泼赖猴
English Translation: Oh! Heartless monkey, vicious and vile!

Chinese Subtitle: 好一个心狠手辣的泼赖猴
English Translation: Oh! Heartless monkey, vicious and vile!

Chinese Subtitle: 可怜那鼠怪耗精地府走
English Translation: Woe! Me heart pains for their death wail!

Chinese Subtitle: 眼见得父死子亡又生离愁
English Translation: Father and son, fate's bitter game,

Chinese Subtitle: 老衲我有手无头空虚久
English Translation: Headless, I grieve all the same.

Chinese Subtitle: 普天之下
English Translation: Across all realms,

Chinese Subtitle: 父子君臣纲纪，伦常规矩天理
English Translation: Fathers and sons, kings and folks,

Chinese Subtitle: 哪个说了才算，哪个放任不管
English Translation: the former bonds the latter, that's how it goes.

Chinese Subtitle: 你瞧那鼠辈倒讲人情
English Translation: These rats have obeyed the rule,

Chinese Subtitle: 可怎么就落得个子亡父逃尸骨寒
English Translation: But how come fate snatched the son, and the father flew?

Chinese Subtitle: 世人都爱拼利害，偏偏破门敲不开
English Translation: People crave greatness, but the gate's held. The path to glory, a secret withheld.

Chinese Subtitle: 神风奇术蔽日月，三昧妙法障山海
English Translation: His great Samadhi Wind sweeps the land. Veils the sky with its mighty command.

Chinese Subtitle: 要想见那黄毛鼠精，必须要得心腹口令
English Translation: To beat the yellow rat, tokens ye'll need. Get both from his henchmen who ye'll meet.

Chinese Subtitle: 一个不够凑一双
English Translation: Subdue him, brave and bold,

Chinese Subtitle: 那缩卵风魔不死也得伤
English Translation: Yer valor and might, forever be told.

Chinese Subtitle: 且慢走，且慢走，再走怕你也无头
English Translation: Hold yer steps, hold'em true, lest yer head get severed too!

Chinese Subtitle: 甭急，甭急
English Translation: Easy, easy!

Chinese Subtitle: 好灵，好灵
English Translation: This befits ye grandly!

Chinese Subtitle: 亏得我一直存着，算是找着正主了
English Translation: Aye, luckily I've kept it close for its rightful owner.

Chinese Subtitle: 无生有，莫强求，方便法门鬼见愁
English Translation: A pluck of Many, deemed as mighty, Quite a few find it uncanny.

Chinese Subtitle: 旁人以为稀罕物，左道旁门不入流
English Translation: But if ye'd ask me, I deem it a wee trick, Shortcuttin makes nothing great.

Chinese Subtitle: 金铁击石金无力，大圣天蓬遭虎欺
English Translation: The tiger deceived them, led them to attack a rock, But the rock stood firm, leaving hands sore and the tiger's mock.

Chinese Subtitle: 枪刀剑戟浑不避，石猴似你不似你
English Translation: Did this one's deceit recall yer true norm? A stone monkey defies harm in all forms.

Chinese Subtitle: 小施主筋骨清奇，正相应这铜头铁臂
English Translation: This body of yours is perfect for the art of Rock Solid.

Chinese Subtitle: 来得正好
English Translation: You come at a good moment.

Chinese Subtitle: 我有一丹方被水里的小蛙吞了
English Translation: One of my formulas was swallowed by a petty frog.

English Translation: Stay and help. A deity like myself will not short you.

Chinese Subtitle: 甚好甚好！
English Translation: How wondrous!

Chinese Subtitle: 人法地，地法天，天法道，道法自然
English Translation: Man follows Earth, Earth follows Sky, Sky follows Dao, Dao follows nature.

Chinese Subtitle: 着！
English Translation: Zah!

Chinese Subtitle: 这等凡品，赏你便是
English Translation: These common pills, I grant you.

Chinese Subtitle: 往后，你便可去土地庙自行炼制
English Translation: Hereafter, you may craft more yourself at the Shrines.

Chinese Subtitle: 小神还要寻丹炉，先走一步
English Translation: I must retrieve a furnace forthwith. Pray forgive my departure.

Chinese Subtitle: 别过来，走开走开
English Translation: Let's rush out and take'em!

Chinese Subtitle: 你，快走！
English Translation: Move! Now!

Chinese Subtitle: 别在这里伸头探脑

English Translation: If them two heads lay eyes on us, we're both done for!

Chinese Subtitle: 我等遭劫难才落得如此下场，不得已背井离乡
English Translation: Our misfortune back home has led us to exile.

Chinese Subtitle: 原想跟随鼠神大人重整大业，可我……
English Translation: We'd hoped to rebuild with the Rat sage's guidance, but...

Chinese Subtitle: 我看到他那手下先锋在吃……
English Translation: but I saw that vanguard of his feasting upon...

English Translation: Our king has lost his way. Escape was the only choice.

Chinese Subtitle: 双头鼠乃我国中精锐……
English Translation: The two heads are the best fighters...

Chinese Subtitle: 明明是同僚，却还要自相残杀

English Translation: We'll starve hiding here. Let's get out and get this over with!

English Translation: Why are you still here? Don't put me in danger. Be off!

Chinese Subtitle: 手足相残之事，我万不肯做
English Translation: I'd never take part in slaying kin.

Chinese Subtitle: 你帮我除去同僚，我也是时候该走了
English Translation: Now that you have rid me of them, it's time for me to go.

English Translation: With a blinded king, we can never rise again.

Chinese Subtitle: 须找到下落不明的三王子

English Translation: And look at us now. He won't even recognize us. Not one bit!

English Translation: The King honored rats, that's why the Third Prince left.

Chinese Subtitle: 可那西天佛国又在何处呢
English Translation: We must find it then, but where and how?

Chinese Subtitle: 儿啊，你说的这些个苦处
English Translation: Son, I hear you loud and clear.

Chinese Subtitle: 做爹的怎会不知
English Translation: How can I not know your sufferings?

Chinese Subtitle: 可大王一日不出谷底
English Translation: But before our Master returns from the valley,

Chinese Subtitle: 你我就得再熬一日
English Translation: we've got to tough it out.

Chinese Subtitle: 熬住了才有活命
English Translation: Tough it out to survive.

English Translation: The lads went out to see the altar the other day.

Chinese Subtitle: 气味比往前更臭，那满地的骨头渣子
English Translation: Said it's stinkin' worse than ever, and covered in bones,

Chinese Subtitle: 不像人，不像牛羊，却跟咱们一般大小
English Translation: not from men, or livestock, but littered in the remains of our kin!

Chinese Subtitle: 这天杀的毛团，日后大王知道了定饶不了它！
English Translation: Curse that furry jackass! Oh, just wait... Wait until master hears about this!

Chinese Subtitle: 这天杀的毛团，日后大王知道了定饶不了它！
English Translation: Curse that furry jackass! Oh, just wait... Wait until master hears about this!

Chinese Subtitle: 小声小声，你这瓜皮！
English Translation: Hush, hush, you fool!

Chinese Subtitle: 复兴大事，还得从长计议
English Translation: Our restoration... we can't say it out loud now!

Chinese Subtitle: 只是可怜你那兄弟……
English Translation: If your poor brother hadn't...

Chinese Subtitle: 什么味道？
English Translation: What's that smell?

Chinese Subtitle: 居然是只两脚羊
English Translation: Aye, that's fresh meat...

Chinese Subtitle: 这鬼地方也有鲜肉送上门？
English Translation: delivering itself all the way to this dump for our lunch!

Chinese Subtitle: 这鬼地方也有鲜肉送上门？
English Translation: delivering itself all the way to this dump for our lunch!

Chinese Subtitle: 贼猴子，难道你不知我国有敬鼠令么！
English Translation: Wicked monkey! Have you not heard of the Reverence Edict here for mice?

Chinese Subtitle: 想当初我们跟着大王何等辉煌
English Translation: How mighty we were, standing with Master.

Chinese Subtitle: 可怜现在连只贼猴子都拿不下
English Translation: But now, we can't even best this vile monkey.

Chinese Subtitle: 大王啊，不要闭关了！
English Translation: O my Master, quit your meditation, I pray!

English Translation: You helped us subdue that beetle. Now, aid us in crushing this filthy monkey!

Chinese Subtitle: 刁民！刁民！

Chinese Subtitle: 刁民造反啦！
English Translation: Rabbles defying their king!

Chinese Subtitle: 砸死你这刁民！
English Translation: I'll stone you to death, lowly rabble!

Chinese Subtitle: 不知道哪个妖孽用法力把我困在石头里了
English Translation: Some bastard has got me trapped in this rock with his spell!

Chinese Subtitle: 连带这岭上的石头也成了精
English Translation: Even the rocks on the ridge have come to life!

Chinese Subtitle: 那边的山洞里有只石精怪得很，它身上一定有些秘密
English Translation: In that cave, there's a rock guai lurkin', holdin' secrets, I bet!

Chinese Subtitle: 弄清了原委，我好脱身
English Translation: Should ye uncover the reason, I shall find me way out!

Chinese Subtitle: 石头成了精，此事非同小可
English Translation: Rocks turnin'into guais... 'Tis no small matter...

Chinese Subtitle: 你这娃子真好骗，我可算是弄到这宝贝哩!
English Translation: Ye are surely a gullible one! I've finally got me hands on the treasure!

Chinese Subtitle: 你咋还没走？
English Translation: Why are ye still here, eh?

Chinese Subtitle: 你不会是想要回这宝贝罢？不害臊！
English Translation: Ye ain't expectin' this back, are ye? Shameful!

Chinese Subtitle: 快走，本事不大，心倒挺贪
English Translation: Begone! Ye greedy inept wretch!

Chinese Subtitle: 快走，本事不大，心倒挺贪
English Translation: Begone! Ye greedy inept wretch!

Chinese Subtitle: 滚开，不害臊！
English Translation: Get lost, ye disgrace!

Chinese Subtitle: 滚开，不害臊！
English Translation: Get lost, ye disgrace!

Chinese Subtitle: 你狗日的真不识俊，偏要跟我试试身手!
English Translation: Why bother, ye daft one? Ye haven't got a chance against me!

Chinese Subtitle: 头都要被你震碎了！
English Translation: Ye'll crack me skull!

Chinese Subtitle: 饶命，饶命！
English Translation: Mercy! Mercy!

Chinese Subtitle: 不会还想要宝贝罢？
English Translation: Ye ain't expectin' another treasure, are ye?

Chinese Subtitle: 赖皮，不知羞！
English Translation: Ye wicked twerp!

Chinese Subtitle: 赖皮，不知羞！
English Translation: Ye wicked twerp!

Chinese Subtitle: 这样，我也不能白给
English Translation: But I can't be handin' it over to ye for free!

Chinese Subtitle: 你过会儿再来，拿灵蕴来换
English Translation: Come back later to trade with Will.

Chinese Subtitle: 甭急，也得让我准备一下罢？
English Translation: Easy there. I'll need a bit o' time to get restocked.

Chinese Subtitle: 妈了个巴子，咋又这么迟 ？
English Translation: Bloody hell! What's the holdup this time?

Chinese Subtitle: 东西放下，赶紧回去下崽
English Translation: Chuck yer offerings and go breed more rats!

Chinese Subtitle: 下回再送迟了，耽搁了大王练功的进度
English Translation: If ye dare to muck up the king's practice again,

English Translation: I'll serve yer dimwit son up for supper meself!

Chinese Subtitle: 老子亲自把你的傻儿子洗干净，送进去！
English Translation: I'll serve yer dimwit son up for supper meself!

Chinese Subtitle: 那老瓜怂没来？
English Translation: Ain't ye that old loser?

English Translation: Where'd ye come from, ye fur-faced mug?

Chinese Subtitle: 管他娘的，老子先尝两口！
English Translation: Who cares anyway! I'll gobble ye up first!

Chinese Subtitle: 管他娘的，老子先尝两口！
English Translation: Who cares anyway! I'll gobble ye up first!

Chinese Subtitle: 拿了你，换我儿
English Translation: Your life, for my son.

Chinese Subtitle: 自食恶果……
English Translation: This... is my karma...

Chinese Subtitle: 悔不……当初……
English Translation: I... I shouldn't have...

Chinese Subtitle: 一生习武，竟不能……
English Translation: With all my skills, I failed...

Chinese Subtitle: 小猴子，我在这里

Chinese Subtitle: 拨浪鼓，摇一摇
English Translation: Let me hear my rattle-drum.

English Translation: Where is my pa? Did you see him?

Chinese Subtitle: 爹爹说，风沙散了，病就能好
English Translation: Pa told me, when the dust stops, my cough ends.

Chinese Subtitle: 一看你就是外乡人
English Translation: I know you're not from around here.

Chinese Subtitle: 别皱着眉头，这里可好玩了
English Translation: Don't frown like that. Our village is fun!

Chinese Subtitle: 有躲在石头里的老爷爷，有在村子里偷酒喝的猪
English Translation: I know an old man in the stone and a piggy who steals all the drinks.

Chinese Subtitle: 还有在井底的……

Chinese Subtitle: 啊！不告诉你！
