Chinese Subtitle: 好可怕，大家围着我
English Translation: I was scared. They were all around me.

Chinese Subtitle: 他们都说，是爹爹把村子里的人带去给妖怪吃了
English Translation: They told me, Pa took people from the village and fed them to a guai.

Chinese Subtitle: 骗我！我才不信！
English Translation: That's a lie! That's not my pal!

Chinese Subtitle: 诶？好厉害，你怎么知道我在这里？
English Translation: Hmm? How did you even know I was here?

Chinese Subtitle: 这个地方只有我和爹爹知道
English Translation: Just Pa and I know of this place.

Chinese Subtitle: 偷偷告诉你，有个帮我治病的好朋友，就住在下面
English Translation: Don't tell anyone, but I have a friend in this well. He helped me with my coughing fit.

Chinese Subtitle: 好久没来，也不知他自个的伤，养好了没有.....
English Translation: It's been so long. I hope his wounds have healed too...

Chinese Subtitle: 你也一起下来玩呀！
English Translation: Come down and play with us!

Chinese Subtitle: 狗心贱种，还敢顶虎先锋名号接着做那黄风怪的手下
English Translation: Rotten mutt. And he dares bear our father's title under that Yellow Wind guai.

Chinese Subtitle: 兄弟又如何，老子早晚要报这个仇
English Translation: Brother or not, I will have my vengeance!

Chinese Subtitle: 嗯？
English Translation: Mm-mm?

Chinese Subtitle: 那小孩的爹逃了，正愁没人送吃的来!
English Translation: The kid's dad ran off, but now you've shown up to be eaten!

Chinese Subtitle: 打不过，也不能……跪下
English Translation: Never kneel... even in the end.

Chinese Subtitle: 把酒仰问天，古今谁不死……
English Translation: Raise thy cup, seek answers on high. Who defies death, 'neath every sky?

Chinese Subtitle: 不妙，误了正事……
English Translation: Ugh, I messed up my mission...

Chinese Subtitle: 去给咱找解酒的来……
English Translation: Go find something to sober me up...

Chinese Subtitle: 定风庄的酒，再来两坛
English Translation: Two more jars from Windrest, make it quick!

Chinese Subtitle: 神清气爽！
English Translation: How refreshing!

Chinese Subtitle: 是你把咱叫醒的？多谢
English Translation: You woke me up? Thanks!

Chinese Subtitle: 不过咱现在肚子空空，恕不奉陪
English Translation: Enough with the chit-chat. My belly's growling.

Chinese Subtitle: 咱现在得填饱肚子
English Translation: I must quench this rumbling in my belly first.

Chinese Subtitle: 都道卧虎寺内有肉吃，那可得去瞧瞧
English Translation: The Temple of Crouching Tiger, they say there's meat there. Worth a look!

Chinese Subtitle: 吃饱唱足才好做事，肚肠空空可是没戏
English Translation: The feast first, then the toil. Hunger brings no spoils!

Chinese Subtitle: 你这瘦鬼身子，也该多吃点，走走走，跟咱去卧虎寺
English Translation: You should eat more, skinny. Off we go! To the Temple of Crouching Tiger.

Chinese Subtitle: 这些烂鼠肉食之若啮檗吞针
English Translation: This putrid rat meat is insufferable.

Chinese Subtitle: 气煞咱
English Translation: It drives me mad!

Chinese Subtitle: 你想法子给咱找点好东西尝尝如何？
English Translation: Help me score a tasty treat, will you?

Chinese Subtitle: 老夫馋那碧藕馋得紧，在此干早之地，可能寻到？
English Translation: I've been craving a taste of that juicy Jade Lotus. Can you find me some in this barren land?

Chinese Subtitle: 偶尔吃吃素，也未尝不可
English Translation: I wouldn't mind some meatless meals from time to time.

Chinese Subtitle: 事情有了些眉目
English Translation: I have stumbled upon some interesting leads.

Chinese Subtitle: 那黄金之国，真与这不毛之地有关
English Translation: The Realm of Gold does hold a connection to this desolate land.

Chinese Subtitle: 传说中黄金之国是太阳西沉落海之地，那里的人们以鼠为尊
English Translation: I hear the Realm of Gold is where the sun sets. There, they held rats above all others.

Chinese Subtitle: 只是不知怎的，后来这个国家就消失了，很是奇怪
English Translation: And somehow, before we knew it, the realm was gone. Quite odd, that is.

Chinese Subtitle: 造才咱尝了尝那些鼠精鼠怪，咂摸着像是还带点人味儿
English Translation: I just tried those rat guais. They taste like men flesh.

Chinese Subtitle: 那古国遗民并未尽亡，黄风怪与古国的神秘消殒恐怕脱不了干系……
English Translation: Its people are not yet extinct. I suspect the Yellow Wind Guai had a role in their downfall.

Chinese Subtitle: 来之前，大哥给我一枚金片，说是到时自有用处
English Translation: Our senior brother gave me a piece of gold. I'll need it here when the time's right, he said.

Chinese Subtitle: 时候到了，咱这就回老地方试上一试
English Translation: It's the right time now. I'm taking it to the right place to give it a try.

Chinese Subtitle: 大哥给的金片，为何在你那里？
English Translation: Where did you acquire my brother's gold piece?

Chinese Subtitle: 拿来！
English Translation: Give it here!

Chinese Subtitle: 好身手！痛快！
English Translation: What an excellent fight! The intensity!

Chinese Subtitle: 如此甚好，与咱同赴古国如何！
English Translation: This is good. You and I should explore that realm together!

Chinese Subtitle: 今人不见古时月，今月曾经照古人
English Translation: Men in our time do not see the ancient moon, but this moon hath shone on men of yore.

Chinese Subtitle: 你看，黄金之国也好，落日之国也罢，都已不复存在
English Translation: Behold! Be it the realm of sunset or the realm of gold, it's but an echo of the past.

Chinese Subtitle: 传说这里的茫茫沙海之中，曾蛰伏着一只上古巨虫
English Translation: Legends speak of an ancient colossal beetle in these sands.

Chinese Subtitle: 这巨虫平日里沉睡地底，无踪可寻
English Translation: Whilst deep in slumber, it lay hidden beneath the earth's embrace.

Chinese Subtitle: 一旦醒了便会钻出来吞噬人畜
English Translation: When awakened, it would devour all souls that crossed its path.

Chinese Subtitle: 偏偏它外壳坚若磐石，寻常刀斧弓弩难以穿透
English Translation: Its shell, harder than stone, defied the strikes of common arms.

Chinese Subtitle: 往来商旅不敢靠近，周边小国更是苦不堪言
English Translation: It struck fear into travelling merchants and wider, to neighboring realms.

Chinese Subtitle: 适逢一只黄毛貂鼠下界途经此地，感应到那巨虫身上似有无上佛力
English Translation: But a yellow-furred rat sensed the immense power emanating from the insect.

Chinese Subtitle: 于是施法镇住巨虫，收为己用
English Translation: He halted the beetle's havoc and harnessed it for his own ends.

Chinese Subtitle: 小国国王大喜，将鼠妖奉为护国神圣
English Translation: Overjoyed, the king named the rat guai the Royal Sage,

Chinese Subtitle: 更为他建庙塑像，世代供奉
English Translation: and built a shrine in his honor.

Chinese Subtitle: 鼠妖图修炼方便，干脆留了下来
English Translation: The bound beetle was a perfect source of power so the rat stayed.

Chinese Subtitle: 后来，鼠妖神功初成，掳走了唐僧，与孙悟空激战于黄风岭……
English Translation: He seized the Tang Monk using the new power and battled with Sun Wukong upon the Yellow Wind Ridge...

Chinese Subtitle: 一时风沙蔽日，日月无光……
English Translation: The guai's formidable winds veiled the vast expanse of the sky.

Chinese Subtitle: 那鼠妖的神风着实厉害，若非灵吉菩萨出手，怕是真经难取
English Translation: Were it not for Bodhisattva Lingji, Tang Monk's quest for the scriptures would have failed.

Chinese Subtitle: 只是……没了鼠妖坐镇，古国自是难逃覆灭的劫数
English Translation: Yet, stripped of the rat's protection, the kingdom was plunged into a state of ruin.

Chinese Subtitle: 而原本水秀山青的黄风岭，也变成了今天这般模样……
English Translation: The once lush Yellow Wind Ridge now lies a desolate wasteland...

Chinese Subtitle: 慢着
English Translation: Hold it.

Chinese Subtitle: 过路的，从哪来回哪去，再往前小命不保
English Translation: You, traveler. Back to where you belong, or meet your end here.

Chinese Subtitle: 吾乃黄风大王部下的前路先锋，今奉大王严命，在山巡逻
English Translation: I am the vanguard of the Yellow Wind King. I patrol this land by royal decree.

Chinese Subtitle: 这沙海之中有只妖怪，祸害百姓
English Translation: A yaoguai lurks in these sands, a scourge to the common folk.

Chinese Subtitle: 我家大王正要降服那妖怪，贩夫走卒不得擅入
English Translation: Our king seeks to subdue it. Commoners must not intrude.

Chinese Subtitle: 要是哪个不长眼的闯了进去，扰了大王作法，我可担待不起
English Translation: It will be on my head if any heedless fools trouble our king

Chinese Subtitle: 不识起倒，拿你这凡夫给大王做个案酒！
English Translation: You scorn my words? I'll have you served at the king's dinner!

Chinese Subtitle: 不识起倒，拿你这凡夫给大王做个案酒！
English Translation: You scorn my words? I'll have you served at the king's dinner!

Chinese Subtitle: 你这手棍真凶，看来有大神通
English Translation: Such fierce staff work. You wield grand might!

Chinese Subtitle: 在下斗胆求高人出手，助我大王降妖
English Translation: Brave soul, why not use this might to aid my king's good deed?

Chinese Subtitle: 我家大王打灵山而来，不忍见此地百姓受苦受难，出手降妖
English Translation: Our king comes from Mount Lingshan. His kind heart seeks to end the place's suffering.

Chinese Subtitle: 只是那妖怪道行不浅，你若肯施予援手，定然事半功倍
English Translation: The yaoguai's skills run deep. Yet with your help, our chances will be doubled.

Chinese Subtitle: 大王就在前面，在下修为尚浅，不便前往，还请高人速速赶去
English Translation: The king is just ahead. With my meager skills, I cannot join you. Please, go aid him quickly!

Chinese Subtitle: 实不相瞒，我洞中还有未成人的两个孩子，不能在此送了性命
English Translation: Truth be known, being a father of two little ones, my life is not mine to give.

Chinese Subtitle: 黄风大王宅心仁厚，是灵山来的正道弟子
English Translation: Worry not. The Yellow Wind King is a noble disciple from Mount Lingshan.

Chinese Subtitle: 你放心去，结个善缘
English Translation: Go and meet him. A good karma awaits you there.

Chinese Subtitle: 虎先锋败了？
English Translation: You bested my vanguard?

Chinese Subtitle: 想必你有几分神通
English Translation: Then you do indeed have skills.

Chinese Subtitle: 那妖怪身上不知有何法宝，与我相克
English Translation: That yaoguai must have some vessel that counters me.

Chinese Subtitle: 三昧神风都不能伤他分毫
English Translation: Even my Samadhi Wind can't hurt it.

Chinese Subtitle: 要引那妖怪出来，须得用擂鼓之法
English Translation: There is only one way to draw out this yaoguai.

Chinese Subtitle: 我擂响大鼓，引出巨虫
English Translation: I'll sound the drums and it'll come forward.

Chinese Subtitle: 若你愿前去，待时机一到，夺了他的法宝
English Translation: If you are willing, l ask you to seize its vessel at the right time.

Chinese Subtitle: 我便能施法降服此妖
English Translation: Then, the yaoguai will be mine.

Chinese Subtitle: 擂鼓之法本是这天尽头的百姓，为抵御太阳西沉入海的海沸之声而发明
English Translation: Here at the western end of the world, each day the sun sets and boils the sea.

Chinese Subtitle: 海水沸腾，声音之大，可以震杀城中小儿
English Translation: The boiling hiss is sharp enough to ravage babies in their cradles.

Chinese Subtitle: 擂鼓之法解了此难，却又引来了妖怪
English Translation: The people sound drums to counter the impact, but the drums draw this yaoguai.

Chinese Subtitle: 它有法宝护身，我无开奈何
English Translation: The vessel this yaoguai holds protects it from me.

Chinese Subtitle: 你既有胆来，恳请助我一臂之力
English Translation: Your boldness in venturing here is clear. Aid me with this!

Chinese Subtitle: 那怪就在下方沙海之中，请务必助我降服此妖，救此地百姓
English Translation: It's right here beneath us in the sands. Together, we shall rid the people of this wretched yaoguai.

Chinese Subtitle: 满城百姓，感谢不尽！
English Translation: On the folk's behalf, I thank you!

Chinese Subtitle: 有圣，就有盗
English Translation: Besides every sage, a villain resides.

Chinese Subtitle: 有高山， 就有深渊
English Translation: Beneath every mountain, an abyss lies.

Chinese Subtitle: 有天地悬殊，就有腥风血雨
English Translation: Where disparities persist, bloodbaths may arise.

Chinese Subtitle: 我逃不掉
English Translation: I cannot escape,

Chinese Subtitle: 你，也逃不掉
English Translation: and nor can you!

Chinese Subtitle: 孽徒啊孽徒
English Translation: Me disciple... ye're a fool...

Chinese Subtitle: 孽徒啊孽徒
English Translation: Me disciple... ye're a fool...

Chinese Subtitle: 你偷二郎心法，夺大圣根气
English Translation: Ye stole Erlang's spell and snatched the Great Sage's relic.

Chinese Subtitle: 还要师父的脑袋……
English Translation: Ye even took yer master's head!

Chinese Subtitle: 就为在这黄风谷底一时快活？
English Translation: Just for a short reign over this barren valley?

Chinese Subtitle: 阿弥陀佛
English Translation: Thank Amitabha!

Chinese Subtitle: 小施主，老衲乃是小须弥山之主，法号灵吉
English Translation: I am Bodhisattva Lingji of New Mount Sumeru,

Chinese Subtitle: 也是这鼠妖的看管之人
English Translation: the warden of this rat.

Chinese Subtitle: 大圣殒后，六根不灭，散落到了世间
English Translation: After the Great Sage's passing, his Six Senses were scattered across the mortal realm.

Chinese Subtitle: 这贼鼠私下寻得其中一根，因自身修为有限
English Translation: This thieving rat chanced upon one of them, yet hindered by his meager might,

Chinese Subtitle: 难以炼化，于是生了歹心……
English Translation: he could not absorb its power, thus he schemed with wicked intent...

Chinese Subtitle: 我不慎中了他暗算，连头颅也被他一并割去
English Translation: A victim of his deceit, I had my head taken by him.

Chinese Subtitle: 做了存放根器修炼邪法的容器
English Translation: The Sense requires such a grand container to release its power.

Chinese Subtitle: 连带黄风岭再次生灵涂炭，我之罪也
English Translation: I should bear the blame for his reign of havoc upon this ridge again.

Chinese Subtitle: 此番重回大道，全赖施主智勇无双
English Translation: Through your valor and sagacity, order has been restored.

Chinese Subtitle: 这世上应只有施主一人，有资格保全此物
English Translation: You are the sole worthy one to keep it.

Chinese Subtitle: 来罢，替我收好它
English Translation: Please keep it secure in my stead.

Chinese Subtitle: 人也，兽也
English Translation: Men, beasts,

Chinese Subtitle: 佛也，妖也
English Translation: Buddhas, yaoguais...

Chinese Subtitle: 众生自有根器，持优劣为次第，可乱来不得
English Translation: Each bears a distinct root from birth, superior and inferior. None should disturb what's decided.

Chinese Subtitle: 你说，对吗
English Translation: Am I right?

Chinese Subtitle: 孙悟空
English Translation: Sun Wukong?

Chinese Subtitle: 吃斋念佛，诵经打坐
English Translation: Faith and devotion, quite the notion.

Chinese Subtitle: 又有几个真的心如止水，清静无为
English Translation: Yet how many can claim a mind so pure, still and sure?

Chinese Subtitle: 你看看你
English Translation: Look at you,

Chinese Subtitle: 这大风大雪的，还要这么拼命
English Translation: through the heavy snow you roam,

Chinese Subtitle: 一定也是为了那个玩意儿
English Translation: desiring that thing, no doubt.

Chinese Subtitle: 你来之前，我算过一卦
English Translation: I read your fortune before you came.

Chinese Subtitle: 你猜猜写的是啥
English Translation: Care to hear?

Chinese Subtitle: 动不如静，有才无命
English Translation: Act not and be still, thy gifts art thy ill.

Chinese Subtitle: 既要送死，也不拦你
English Translation: If you seek your own end, I shall not stop you.

Chinese Subtitle: 小西天土地，在此恭迎天命人
English Translation: I, the Keeper of the New West, welcome the Destined One!

Chinese Subtitle: 变！
English Translation: Now fly!

Chinese Subtitle: 瞧见湖中的小庙没？
English Translation: See that temple on the lake?

Chinese Subtitle: 那里面，便藏着你要的东西
English Translation: Therein lies the thing you seek.

Chinese Subtitle: 趁此地的主人不在，快快取走，切勿停留
English Translation: The lord of this land is away. Seize it now and leave!

Chinese Subtitle: 哟，这回来的是神仙还是妖怪呢？
English Translation: Well, who'd it be now? A deity, or a yaoguai?

Chinese Subtitle: 这股子臊味儿，可真是熟悉啊
English Translation: I know this whiff of monkey stench.

Chinese Subtitle: 新来的，我劝你老实待着
English Translation: Stay where you are, newcomer.

Chinese Subtitle: 这地界随便乱跑是会死的
English Translation: Wanderers in this place meet their demise!

Chinese Subtitle: 诵经念咒，声起声消，人心就乱了
English Translation: Here is where one's mind ebbs away with the tides of chants.

Chinese Subtitle: 你啊，也逃不过
English Translation: That includes yours too.

Chinese Subtitle: 何妨像我一样，不听不看，安心在这等死
English Translation: Why bother fighting it? Just abandon your senses and wait for your end, like me.

Chinese Subtitle: 自我出走之时，便料到会有今日
English Translation: I foresaw today when I chose to depart.

Chinese Subtitle: 尽是灵山造的恶业
English Translation: Another master plan of Mount Lingshan.

Chinese Subtitle: 人不人，妖不妖，真不如死了痛快
English Translation: Once a man, now a guai. Death was his relief.

Chinese Subtitle: 是你啊……竟然还活着
English Translation: Oh, it's you. You're still alive?

Chinese Subtitle: 还杀了我部下将领，打开了这扇门
English Translation: And I see you've slain one of my captains and helped yourself to break in.

Chinese Subtitle: 我部下共有四将，皆乱了心智
English Translation: Four loyal captains. Now, four bewildered souls.

Chinese Subtitle: 你若真是天命人，可否助他们解脱?
English Translation: Can you free them from that pain, if you truly are the Destined One?

Chinese Subtitle: 黄眉假扮弥勒，骗我等来此赴宴
English Translation: He posed as Maitreya and tricked us here for a false feast.

Chinese Subtitle: 若非我一时天真，也不会害了手足弟兄
English Translation: And I was foolish enough to fall for his trap. My men suffer because of me.

Chinese Subtitle: 可怜四将，沦为妖怪的鹰犬
English Translation: Four mighty captains, now mere pawns of Yellowbrow.

Chinese Subtitle: 我为保全本心，自绝耳目，方不受妖言魔音侵扰
English Translation: I got rid of my eyes and ears to shield myself from these beguiling chants.

Chinese Subtitle: 黄眉老怪，你失算了
English Translation: A misstep of yours, Yellowbrow!

Chinese Subtitle: 这猴子或许真是天命人
English Translation: He might be the true Destined One!

Chinese Subtitle: 黄眉得了大圣根器，野心大过往日
English Translation: With that relic, Yellowbrow now harbors greater desires than ever.

Chinese Subtitle: 顾盼自雄，得意忘形，你或有可乘之机
English Translation: Your chance may arise as he grows obsessed with his own ego.

Chinese Subtitle: 顾盼自雄，得意忘形，你或有可乘之机
English Translation: Your chance may arise as he grows obsessed with his own ego.

Chinese Subtitle: 捉雾拿风收水怪，擒龙伏虎镇山场
English Translation: Yaoguais fell in his hands, a hero of the lands.

Chinese Subtitle: 名扬四海？
English Translation: What kind of hero am I?

Chinese Subtitle: 我谁也救不了
English Translation: I can save no one!

Chinese Subtitle: 多谢你带他们回来，不用再受心魔之苦
English Translation: Thank you for bringing them back. Their suffering has ended.

Chinese Subtitle: 我少小离家，也曾自诩天命所归
English Translation: When I left home young, I too saw myself as destined.

Chinese Subtitle: 可如今，成了这副样子
English Translation: But look at me...

Chinese Subtitle: 连跟着我的兄弟，都不得善终……
English Translation: and the destiny of those who followed my cause.

Chinese Subtitle: 这个于我已无用，你且收下罢
English Translation: Take this. I don't need it anymore.

Chinese Subtitle: 该回家了……
English Translation: Now I can go home...

Chinese Subtitle: 元帅还是不肯归顺吗
English Translation: Admiral, why so stubborn?

Chinese Subtitle: 元帅还是不肯归顺吗
English Translation: Admiral, why so stubborn?

Chinese Subtitle: 再忍一时三刻，怕是就要化为脓血了
English Translation: Keep at it, you could melt into blood and pus.

Chinese Subtitle: 好妹妹，里面凉快得很呐
English Translation: Darling come on, it's perfectly cool in here!

Chinese Subtitle: 就等你进来与我一起双修了
English Translation: Join me inside for some yin-yang practice, will you?

Chinese Subtitle: 元帅说笑了
English Translation: Such humor, Admiral.

Chinese Subtitle: 你若放下执念，我自然会劝师父放了你
English Translation: Let go of your stubbornness, and I could request Master to set you free.

Chinese Subtitle: 到时便可同修大道
English Translation: Then I'd be open to joining you.

Chinese Subtitle: 我可消受不起
English Translation: Oh, I don't deserve you.

Chinese Subtitle: 看来那老贼得了师兄的玩意，果然功力大涨
English Translation: That old bastard has really made good use of Wukong's relic.

Chinese Subtitle: 连你这东天小官都被驯得服服帖帖
English Translation: Even you, a Celestial Courtier, bend to his will.

Chinese Subtitle: 不过听这动静，天命人已停了塔下的经筒
English Translation: Yet, my ears tell me that the Destined One has stopped the mani wheel.

Chinese Subtitle: 好妹妹，估着这金疙瘩要等不到你师父来开咯
English Translation: Pity. Reckon it won't be your master who unlocks these metals eventually.

Chinese Subtitle: 这金饶是祖师爷的法宝，小小天命人，如何破得了
English Translation: These Gold Cymbals are made by our Grandmaster, and you think a puny monkey can go beyond that?

Chinese Subtitle: 你……你唤醒了龟将？
English Translation: You... you've roused Turtle General?

Chinese Subtitle: 你怎知这下面是他？
English Translation: How could you know he is here below?

Chinese Subtitle: 甚么蛇不蛇龟不龟的
English Translation: Turtle, snake, who cares?

Chinese Subtitle: 刚刚闻到一股臊味
English Translation: I caught a whiff of monkey stench,

Chinese Subtitle: 这味道好生亲切，忍不住敲锣迎接！
English Translation: familiar enough for me to sound my welcome!

Chinese Subtitle: 师父惜你赋性，饶你一命，让你在浮屠塔底清修
English Translation: Master valued your talents. He kept you alive beneath the pagoda for your own good.

Chinese Subtitle: 既不识相……
English Translation: How ungrateful...

Chinese Subtitle: 小西天的极乐之境，怕是与你无缘了
English Translation: Evidentally, you just don't deserve the ecstasy of the New west!

Chinese Subtitle: 师父果没说错，猴子最是冥顽……
English Translation: Master's right, monkeys are set in their ways.

Chinese Subtitle: 倒也无妨，这金饶你休想打开！
English Translation: Still though.... you'll never crack the Gold Cymbals!

Chinese Subtitle: 阿绵花屎呢，拖拖拉拉的！
English Translation: What took you so long? Constipation?

Chinese Subtitle: 老猪我在里面都快腌硬了
English Translation: I was nearly cooked alive in there!

Chinese Subtitle: 老猪我在里面都快腌硬了
English Translation: I was nearly cooked alive in there!

Chinese Subtitle: 让开让开
English Translation: Move it!

Chinese Subtitle: 我呸！
English Translation: Bah!

Chinese Subtitle: 人不人鬼不鬼的婆娘
English Translation: Blasted eyesore!

Chinese Subtitle: 人不人鬼不鬼的婆娘
English Translation: Blasted eyesore!

Chinese Subtitle: 不想想当年在天上，我几时拿正眼看过她
English Translation: Wasn't even worth my second glance back in the Court.

Chinese Subtitle: 又是这副模样
English Translation: Ah, that same look again.

Chinese Subtitle: 毛脸毛眼，尖嘴缩腮，全仗着命大
English Translation: A furry coat and a pinched face. Luck's all you've got.

Chinese Subtitle: 毛脸毛眼，尖嘴缩腮，全仗着命大
English Translation: A furry coat and a pinched face. Luck's all you've got.

Chinese Subtitle: 又是个哑巴，算了算了，正事要紧
English Translation: Great, another mute. Whatever, let's not dally.

Chinese Subtitle: 这只老龟，我倒有几分交情
English Translation: Now, the turtle and I have shared a few tales.

Chinese Subtitle: 这黄眉老怪不同别个妖王
English Translation: That Yellowbrow is not like other foes.

Chinese Subtitle: 花果山那只老猢狲特地浼我来处理，生怕你中了他的算计
English Translation: That old monkey from Mount Huaguo asked me to back you up here to save you from his ugly tricks.

Chinese Subtitle: 花果山那只老猢狲特地浼我来处理，生怕你中了他的算计
English Translation: That old monkey from Mount Huaguo asked me to back you up here to save you from his ugly tricks.

Chinese Subtitle: 他和我说，只要凑齐六根，便能救活大师兄
English Translation: He told me that once we gathered all six relics, we could bring Wukong back.

Chinese Subtitle: 我且信他一回
English Translation: Let's say I buy it for now.

Chinese Subtitle: 我先去叙叙旧，你四处查看一番
English Translation: I'll go and catch up with him first, you take a look around.

Chinese Subtitle: 龟老弟，这么多年被封在这鸟不拉屎的地方，苦了你了
English Translation: My old friend, you must have had it rough all these years in this shithole.

Chinese Subtitle: 你放心
English Translation: Rest easy,

Chinese Subtitle: 等靠岸了，我一定上去先砸了那小破庙
English Translation: once we're ashore, I'll take down that blasted temple...

Chinese Subtitle: 给你和蛇兄弟报仇
English Translation: to avenge you and Brother Snake.

Chinese Subtitle: 稳点，稳点
English Translation: Easy there, easy.

Chinese Subtitle: 我懂
English Translation: I hear you.

Chinese Subtitle: 这世道，活着，死了，都不如变回石头疙瘩
English Translation: Dead or alive, all suffer the same. Should be better off staying a stone.

Chinese Subtitle: 你啊，空涨了许大年纪，哽哽咽咽的成何体统
English Translation: Come on. Cut the weeps and whines, will you? You are too old for those.

Chinese Subtitle: 知道知道， 别哭了
English Translation: Yes, yes. Stop sobbing.

Chinese Subtitle: 老实在这候着，我去看看你那兄弟怎样了
English Translation: Stay here and wait, I'll check on your snake pal.

Chinese Subtitle: 这定是龟蛇二将中的蛇将了，竟已变为一具枯骨
English Translation: This must be the Snake General, now nothing but bare bones!

Chinese Subtitle: 黄眉老怪的手段着实狠毒
English Translation: That Yellowbrow is surely cruel, I'll give him that.

Chinese Subtitle: 老兄，蛇将已入轮回，你莫再哭哭啼啼了
English Translation: Enough with the tears, Turtle. The Snake General has passed on.

Chinese Subtitle: 龟蛇二将竟被折磨成了这般模样
English Translation: The once mighty Generals, now tortured and shattered.

Chinese Subtitle: 他的泪滴可大有用处，这是他的答谢，你速去收下
English Translation: His teardrop holds great power. Take it as his thanks to you.

Chinese Subtitle: 怪事，又一位老朋友，黄眉莫不是把老猪的旧友都抓来了？
English Translation: One more familiar face! Are all my old friends in Yellowbrow's clutches now?

Chinese Subtitle: 非礼勿视，非礼勿听
English Translation: Stop prying! This is not for your eyes!

Chinese Subtitle: 你这小儿，搅我雅兴！
English Translation: Young one, you have spoiled my joy!

Chinese Subtitle: 老头儿，许久未见，你脾气见长啊!
English Translation: It's been a lifetime, old bones! Your temper's grown fiercer!

Chinese Subtitle: 老头儿，许久未见，你脾气见长啊!
English Translation: It's been a lifetime, old bones! Your temper's grown fiercer!

Chinese Subtitle: 这些个神仙不好好在天上待着，来小西天做甚
English Translation: Why are these Immortals in the New West instead of up above where they belong!

Chinese Subtitle: 我这小仙被贬下界，法力失了大半
English Translation: I was cast down to the mortal realm, my powers much diminished.

Chinese Subtitle: 别无所求，就想好好活着
English Translation: I ask for nothing more than to live out my days peacefully.

Chinese Subtitle: 我死了算了，神仙做不成，又被你这猢狲欺负
English Translation: I might as well die! No chance at immortality, and forced to suffer your torment!

Chinese Subtitle: 老夫横坚是动弹不得了
English Translation: This old loong can hardly move a muscle as he is.

Chinese Subtitle: 非吃一颗戌狗老弟炼制的还魂丹药不行
English Translation: Only one of Xu Dog's resurrection pills can save me now.

Chinese Subtitle: 你怎么还在这儿啊，老夫没剩几口气了
English Translation: Why are you still here? This old loong's living on borrowed time.

Chinese Subtitle: 疼，疼哎
English Translation: Oh, the pain!

Chinese Subtitle: 戌狗老弟好丹药
English Translation: Xu Dog loves his medicinal arts.

Chinese Subtitle: 依他的脾性，准是又在哪个丹炉前摇扇子
English Translation: Given his nature, he's surely tending the furnace flames somewhere.

Chinese Subtitle: 不消说，定是那老头儿欺负你了
English Translation: Your grim face alone speaks for that old loong's bullying.

Chinese Subtitle: 好汉莫怪罪，我两个是旧相识，他的脾气我再熟悉不过
English Translation: Pray, refrain from blaming him. His ill temper persists unaltered since the first day of our long acquaintance.

Chinese Subtitle: 这老龙神力仍在，就是馋我的丹了，拿去给他便是
English Translation: Regret not, for his power endures. His desire be but one more pill, gladly bestowed by me.

Chinese Subtitle: 孺子可教，孺子可教
English Translation: I knew you could do it! The young may yet be taught.

Chinese Subtitle: 得此丹药，便有了开启那宝地的法力
English Translation: With this pill, I'll gain the strength to unseal that precious place.

Chinese Subtitle: 这画中胜境，乃是我等合力打造的世外桃源
English Translation: The Painted Realm. A peaceful haven I built with my fellow deities.

Chinese Subtitle: 猴子既已归位，六丁六甲也当重聚了
English Translation: Now the monkey is in place, we should gather once more!

Chinese Subtitle: 啊啊妖怪，走开！走开走开！
English Translation: No more yaoguai! Away! Away from me!

Chinese Subtitle: 别过来，别过来
English Translation: Don't... Don't get any closer!

Chinese Subtitle: 打！打死这群妖怪！
English Translation: Kill them! Kill the yaoguais!

Chinese Subtitle: 你，你不会吃了我罢？
English Translation: Wait, you won't eat me, will you?

Chinese Subtitle: 小生，小生来此山中寻宝，不想遇见了妖怪
English Translation: I was... I was on a treasure hunt, but l ended up being the hunted.

Chinese Subtitle: 幸得英雄搭救，待宝物到手，定与英雄同享
English Translation: I owe you my life, sir. I'll share the treasure with you once I find it.

Chinese Subtitle: 都说此地乃西天佛国，为何尽是妖魔呢？
English Translation: Say, why is there nothing but yaoguais in this so-called Buddhas' realm?

Chinese Subtitle: 若又入险境，可否再访英雄帮助帮助?
English Translation: Can I look to you to save me again, sir, if they come back?

Chinese Subtitle: 稀奇古怪圆溜溜，青皮红肉黑骨头……
English Translation: Green without, round and sweet. Red within, a summer treat.

Chinese Subtitle: 这冰天雪地的，该去那里找寻呢
English Translation: Where can I find something like that in this frozen land?

Chinese Subtitle: 火！
English Translation: Fire!

Chinese Subtitle: 英雄真是妙法，险些冻死在这雪岭
English Translation: I would be dead if it weren't for you.

Chinese Subtitle: 这便暖和多了
English Translation: No more frost now.

Chinese Subtitle: 听闻这山中有片瓜田，乃佛祖数百年前种下
English Translation: I heard that Buddha planted watermelons here hundreds of years ago.

Chinese Subtitle: 吃上一口，益寿延年
English Translation: One bite grants prolonged life.

Chinese Subtitle: 只是这天寒地冻的，我又无英雄这般法力傍身
English Translation: Yet, when the cold bites all around, without your powerful spells,

Chinese Subtitle: 找寻起来，实是艰难
English Translation: there is no way I can find it.

Chinese Subtitle: 此前有人瞧见一个胖头娃娃抱着西瓜跳下山崖
English Translation: Someone once saw a chubby boy jump from the cliff with a watermelon in his arms.

Chinese Subtitle: 那人跑到崖边探看，没一点人影，料想那娃定是摔死了
English Translation: He rushed to the edge of the cliff but saw no movement down there. Seemed like a certain death.

Chinese Subtitle: 却听得崖下传来孩子的笑声，一阵又一阵……
English Translation: But suddenly, he heard the boy laughing from beneath, on and on.

Chinese Subtitle: 吓得那人屁滚尿流地逃了
English Translation: Bewildered, he fled from the cliff.

Chinese Subtitle: 我猜疑这其中定然有千丝万缕的联系
English Translation: This story may offer a clue for my treasure hunt.

Chinese Subtitle: 莫非瓜田在那崖下？
English Translation: Maybe the watermelons were planted under the cliff?

Chinese Subtitle: 英雄不必在此守护
English Translation: Don't let me keep you, sir.

Chinese Subtitle: 小生稍坐片刻，待身体回暖，便自行离去
English Translation: I will leave by myself when I feel warm enough.

Chinese Subtitle: 三番两次试你，竟都是不分好歹的愚善
English Translation: Time and again, I tested you, and saw nothing but gullible goodness.

Chinese Subtitle: 三番两次试你，竟都是不分好歹的愚善
English Translation: Time and again, I tested you, and saw nothing but gullible goodness.

Chinese Subtitle: 大哥也有看走眼的时候
English Translation: Our brother does misjudge as well.

Chinese Subtitle: 小小伎俩便能轻松骗来
English Translation: It requires no effort to trick you.

Chinese Subtitle: 小小伎俩便能轻松骗来
English Translation: It requires no effort to trick you.

Chinese Subtitle: 你根本做不成天命人，还是早登极乐罢
English Translation: You will never be the Destined One. Let me help you end your sorry life!

Chinese Subtitle: 你根本做不成天命人，还是早登极乐罢
English Translation: You will never be the Destined One. Let me help you end your sorry life!

Chinese Subtitle: 莽夫罢了
English Translation: Foolhardy, nothing more.

Chinese Subtitle: 大哥交代的事情已了，来日再会！
English Translation: I've done as our brother asked. Till we meet again!

Chinese Subtitle: 果然有慧根
English Translation: Your faith has led you here.

Chinese Subtitle: 放松些，这里可没有假道场的繁絮叨叨，打打杀杀
English Translation: Rest easy. You won't find those noisy chantings and pained screamings here.

Chinese Subtitle: 好瓜，熟了
English Translation: A nice, ripe melon.

Chinese Subtitle: 尝尝？
English Translation: Want a bite?

Chinese Subtitle: 可别瞧不上这瓜，当年孙悟空就是用它，诈了我那小童
English Translation: It's better than you think. Sun Wukong used it to trick that disciple of mine.

Chinese Subtitle: 来，近前来
English Translation: Come... Come closer.

Chinese Subtitle: 既然寻到这里，有一样他俩都不会的本事，我可传授与你
English Translation: Now you've found this place, I'll teach you a trick neither of them knows.

Chinese Subtitle: 手
English Translation: Your hand.

Chinese Subtitle: 禁字法，不杀敌，只克已
English Translation: Spell Binder. It hurts no foe but binds yourself.

Chinese Subtitle: 妙用何在，你自会明白
English Translation: You'll come to understand its use.

Chinese Subtitle: 有位孙悟空的故人，来找过我，说想清静清静
English Translation: An old friend of Sun Wukong came to me, wanting some peace.

Chinese Subtitle: 我便送他去了浮屠塔，你可曾拜会？
English Translation: I led him to the Great Pagoda. Have you paid him a visit?

Chinese Subtitle: 都说你是天命人
English Translation: They say you are the Destined One.

Chinese Subtitle: 可这命若由了天，还有什么意思呢
English Translation: But if destiny is set, what difference do our actions make?

Chinese Subtitle: 爷爷我累了，去亭子里歇一歇
English Translation: I need a rest. That pavilion looks like a good place.

Chinese Subtitle: 喂！你这鬼娃儿，又是哪冒出来的山精树鬼？
English Translation: Oi, kid! You look suspicious. What kind of yaoguai are you?

Chinese Subtitle: 喂！你这鬼娃儿，又是哪冒出来的山精树鬼？
English Translation: Oi, kid! You look suspicious. What kind of yaoguai are you?

Chinese Subtitle: 嘘， 我在细细端详对面的大佛
English Translation: Shh... I'm looking at that Buddha over there.

Chinese Subtitle: 你看他的肚脐眼，有这么大
English Translation: See his belly button? It's so big.

Chinese Subtitle: 比我，比你，还大好几圈
English Translation: Me, and you, we look way smaller!

Chinese Subtitle: 大佛？哪来的大佛？
English Translation: Buddha? Where is it?

Chinese Subtitle: 你看不见佛，因为你心里无佛
English Translation: You see no Buddha because you think no Buddha.

Chinese Subtitle: 无佛可拜，自然眼瞎
English Translation: No thought, no sight.

Chinese Subtitle: 我堂堂净坛使者，甚么大佛小佛没见过！
English Translation: I the Sacred Gourmand, saw enough Buddhas before you were even born.

Chinese Subtitle: 你才眼瞎，不知先拜拜面前的活菩萨
English Translation: Foolish brat! You didn't see that coming, did you?

Chinese Subtitle: 心诚则缘到，缘到则佛现
English Translation: True hearts find their path, and the Buddha is on that path.

Chinese Subtitle: 两位施主不妨再四处找找，好好拜拜
English Translation: Why not worship around with true hearts, for Buddhas may light your path.

Chinese Subtitle: 找个屁！
English Translation: Worship my hoof!

Chinese Subtitle: 见庙就进，见佛就拜，不分真假黑白，那是我师傅
English Translation: Visit temples, kneel to figures, tell no black from white—that's my master!

Chinese Subtitle: 我老猪平生最嫌这些表面功夫
English Translation: I am fed up with all these skin-deep rites.

Chinese Subtitle: 心不诚，山不开
English Translation: No true heart, the path is sealed.

Chinese Subtitle: 心若诚，路自来
English Translation: With true heart, it's revealed.

Chinese Subtitle: 出家人要逢庙烧香，遇佛拜佛
English Translation: Visit each teinple you encounter and worship every Buddha you see.

Chinese Subtitle: 不然肉眼愚迷，难识活佛真形
English Translation: Or the true face of Buddha will always remain elusive to your eyes.

Chinese Subtitle: 莫急莫急，再四处看看
English Translation: Why the rush? Try looking around.

Chinese Subtitle: 欲要做佛事，须有敬佛心
English Translation: To see a Buddha, one must hold the Buddha in one's heart.

Chinese Subtitle: 老猪明白了
English Translation: I get it now.

Chinese Subtitle: 那小和尚让四处找找，是让我们拜四次哩！
English Translation: For Buddhas," that boy said... Ah! There must be four Buddhas to worship!

Chinese Subtitle: 疯泼和尚，忒没道理！
English Translation: Loony monk. Can't reason with him!

Chinese Subtitle: 后生，做个样子便好
English Translation: Just go through the motions, boy.

Chinese Subtitle: 那小和尚故弄玄虚，谁知真假
English Translation: Who knows if it's true or not? That little monk was speaking riddles.

Chinese Subtitle: 那小和尚故弄玄虚，谁知真假
English Translation: Who knows if it's true or not? That little monk was speaking riddles.

Chinese Subtitle: 当年过小西天
English Translation: Back when we journeyed to the New West,

Chinese Subtitle: 便是因为师父他老人家以为到了灵山，见佛便拜，被黄眉捉了
English Translation: Our master took it for Mount Lingshan. He visited and kneeled to every figure until Yellowbrow captured him.

Chinese Subtitle: 老猪可不上当
English Translation: I'm not my master.

Chinese Subtitle: 什么动静！
English Translation: What's that sound?

Chinese Subtitle: 定又是那小和尚耍把戏，拜什么拜，回去瞧瞧！
English Translation: That little monk's up to his tricks once more. Worship my hoof! Let's go back!

Chinese Subtitle: 定又是那小和尚耍把戏，拜什么拜，回去瞧瞧！
English Translation: That little monk's up to his tricks once more. Worship my hoof! Let's go back!

Chinese Subtitle: 定又是那小和尚耍把戏，拜什么拜，回去瞧瞧！
English Translation: That little monk's up to his tricks once more. Worship my hoof! Let's go back!

Chinese Subtitle: 小胖和尚，能拜的全拜了，路呢？
English Translation: Chubby one, we've done the rites. Where's the path?

Chinese Subtitle: 路？路不一直在那里吗？
English Translation: The path? Isn't it always there?

Chinese Subtitle: 你这鼓着肚皮的秃头小儿，敢唬我老猪！
English Translation: Don't you trick me, you bald, potbellied brat!

Chinese Subtitle: 全是光溜溜的山，哪来的路！
English Translation: All I'm seeing are mountains. No path at all!

Chinese Subtitle: 他，有慧根
English Translation: He sees wisely with faith.

Chinese Subtitle: 你，心不诚
English Translation: You are daft without it.

Chinese Subtitle: 诚你个奶奶！
English Translation: Cut your nonsense!

Chinese Subtitle: 你莫不是那老贼变的，专来作弄人哩！
English Translation: You must be that trickster himself, fooling us all along!

Chinese Subtitle: 吃我一钯！
English Translation: Take my rake!

Chinese Subtitle: 不拜就不拜，这般气急败坏
English Translation: Why so rude? I didn't force you to kneel.

Chinese Subtitle: 修养还不如身边小辈，羞是不羞？
English Translation: Throwing a tantrum at this age? Shame on you!
Target Word: Throwing a tantrum at this age?

Chinese Subtitle: 修养还不如身边小辈，羞是不羞？
English Translation: Throwing a tantrum at this age? Shame on you!

Chinese Subtitle: 气煞老猪！
English Translation: You brat!

Chinese Subtitle: 此路不通，爷爷我拱也拱出一条路来！
English Translation: Save your stupid path. I'll burrow one myself!

Chinese Subtitle: 你且先行一步，我们在山顶汇合
English Translation: You go on first. I'll meet you at the summit.

Chinese Subtitle: 死了一个妖猴， 又来一个妖猴
English Translation: One monkey dead, and another shows up.

Chinese Subtitle: 死了一个妖猴， 又来一个妖猴
English Translation: One monkey dead, and another shows up.

Chinese Subtitle: 等剥了你这张脸，我也去当个天命人玩玩
English Translation: The face of the Destined One? It will fit me just as well.

Chinese Subtitle: 好戏开场！
English Translation: The real show starts now!

Chinese Subtitle: 官人且留步听我诉说
English Translation: Kind sir, pause your steps and heed my story.

Chinese Subtitle: 我本是山中修炼的狐妖，一心想成人
English Translation: I was a fox guai who practiced to become one of the humans.

Chinese Subtitle: 谁料那日出门觅食，中了猎户埋下的陷阱
English Translation: One day, I was foraging for food and found myself caught in a hunter's trap.

Chinese Subtitle: 朦胧中见一书生前来，将我救下，带回家中养伤
English Translation: A young scholar saved me and kept me in his home to let me heal.

Chinese Subtitle: 我动弹不得，心中却满是感激
English Translation: I couldn't move, yet my heart swelled with gratitude.

Chinese Subtitle: 原想待身体康健，便助他求取功名，以报救命之恩
English Translation: I thought l could aid him in his career in return for saving my life.

Chinese Subtitle: 没承想，那书生南柯一梦，梦醒后将我残杀，留下孤魂不散
English Translation: Little did I foresee that, following a dream, he would take my life. My soul lingered, yet he left without a trace.

Chinese Subtitle: 我苦苦寻觅，才知他遁入空门，就在小雷音寺中
English Translation: I sought tirelessly, only to find he had become a monk in the New Thunderclap Temple.

Chinese Subtitle: 恳求官人，取我毛发，化身前往，见他一见，解我心中困苦
English Translation: I beg you, sir, to take my fur and wear my form. Confront him and calm my sorrowful heart.

Chinese Subtitle: 我知他藏在寺中偏殿，有劳官人，带我去见他
English Translation: He's hiding in the side hall of the temple. Kind sir, will you lead me to him?

Chinese Subtitle: 随自妄情种种计度，到底哪个才是真我，谁能知道？
English Translation: Entangled in the web of all deceptions of the heart." Who knows which thread in the net of my thoughts marks me true?

Chinese Subtitle: 此乃念佛斋戒之地，施主满身杀气，不妨坐下与老衲诵诵经
English Translation: In a place for chanting and peace, you reek of blood. Sit, and seek solace in the scriptures with me.

Chinese Subtitle: 你我皆戴罪之人，人生漫漫，许多事不得不为
English Translation: We both misdeeds, things we had to do. Life demands us acts we’d rather not.

Chinese Subtitle: 老衲已悟彻红尘，余生只求在此殿内，诵经打坐，圆赎旧孽
English Translation: I've seen and severed the illusions of life. Now, I devote my existence to the scriptures for redemption.

Chinese Subtitle: 施主，念经千遍易，知行合一难
English Translation: It is as easy to recite as it is difficult to embody.

Chinese Subtitle: 莫如老衲，到了这般岁数，还在悔不当初……
English Translation: Let not the years lead you to lament as they have led me.

Chinese Subtitle: 一念起万法生，一念灭万缘寂
English Translation: A thought springs, a world blooms; a thought ceases, all bonds break.

Chinese Subtitle: 什么是对？什么是错？
English Translation: What is right and what is wrong?

Chinese Subtitle: 杀生有罪，可若是为了大道，不得不杀呢？
English Translation: To kill is foul. But for a noble cause, can it be justified?

Chinese Subtitle: 眼根受色，耳分别声，鼻嗅诸香，舌嗜于味
English Translation: The eyes are lured by sight, ears by sound, nose by odor, and tongue by taste.

Chinese Subtitle: 所有身根，贪受诸触，意根分别，一切诸法
English Translation: Every sense is ensnared by contact, yet the mind, based on the perception of all, differs from all.

Chinese Subtitle: 六情诸根，各各自缘，诸尘境界，不行他缘
English Translation: All the six of them, tied to its kind, amidst the mortal world, are unswayed by each other.

Chinese Subtitle: 你，你，你是人是鬼？
English Translation: A g-ghost? Weren't you dead already?

Chinese Subtitle: 这么多年，我日日为你诵经，可你还是要索我性命么？
English Translation: For years, I've prayed you'd find peace. Still, you come to take my life in penance against yours.

Chinese Subtitle: 你又岂会知我动手时，是何等心痛……
English Translation: You wouldn't understand my agony when I took your life...

Chinese Subtitle: 你既怨毒未消，我佛慈悲，便再超度你一回！
English Translation: The Buddha sees no such vengeance. I shall usher you to the beyond once more!

Chinese Subtitle: 哪怕遁入空门，也无法解脱……
English Translation: Nothing, not even the scriptures, can free me from this chain.

Chinese Subtitle: 妖就是妖……无可救药……
English Translation: The nature of yaoguais... is beyond remedy

Chinese Subtitle: 冤有头，债有主
English Translation: I've brought this upon myself.

Chinese Subtitle: 世人总说，人妖殊途
English Translation: They say mortals and yaoguais walk different paths.

Chinese Subtitle: 再见到他，我才知道
English Translation: But it's after seeing him again that I understood...

Chinese Subtitle: 怕妖的人，比妖更可怕
English Translation: Those who fear yaoguais are fouler than what they fear.

Chinese Subtitle: 好得很，好得很
English Translation: How delightful!

Chinese Subtitle: 它还记得你的味道
English Translation: It still recalls your scent.

Chinese Subtitle: 那猴儿活着的时候，只知四处求人，哭哭啼啼
English Translation: When that monkey was alive, he was all about weeping and begging for help.

Chinese Subtitle: 那猴儿活着的时候，只知四处求人，哭哭啼啼
English Translation: When that monkey was alive, he was all about weeping and begging for help.

Chinese Subtitle: 死了还祸及子孙， 引得你们一个个送上门来
English Translation: Now, even in death, he led all you younglings right to me.

Chinese Subtitle: 我这搭包儿，都快装不下了
English Translation: This sack of mine can barely fit you all!

Chinese Subtitle: 亢金龙，你法性已通
English Translation: Kang-Jin Loong, now that you are ready,

Chinese Subtitle: 出来帮为师试试他的成色
English Translation: go and weigh up this one for your master.

Chinese Subtitle: 看看这只猴子，是否够格做我的弟子
English Translation: See if this monkey merits a place amongst my disciples.

Chinese Subtitle: 看看这只猴子，是否够格做我的弟子
English Translation: See if this monkey merits a place amongst my disciples.

Chinese Subtitle: 入了此番轮回，就别想再轻易涅槃
English Translation: You have chosen your way. This time, there will be no easy way out!

Chinese Subtitle: 很久以前，我与金蝉子还是同门
English Translation: Ages ago, Jinchanzi and I were peers.

Chinese Subtitle: 他是个认真的人
English Translation: Ever questing with good will, he was.

Chinese Subtitle: 看不得灵山从来祥光瑞霭，山下却遭着苦困天灾
English Translation: His nature made him question the supremacy of us beyond mortal woe and grief.

Chinese Subtitle: 他说，凡诸众生，皆有慧根
English Translation: He deemed all souls could be akin to us.

Chinese Subtitle: 何以只有你我高高在上，其他人就只配磕头烧香
English Translation: Why then do we tower, whilst others merely kneel and offer?" He asked.

Chinese Subtitle: 我说，因为他们不如你我
English Translation: I told him, the others are less than us.

Chinese Subtitle: 后来，他犯了大错，重入轮回
English Translation: His misstep cast him back into the endless cycle.

Chinese Subtitle: 又收了几个徒弟
English Translation: Reborn, he drew three disciples.

Chinese Subtitle: 可结果如何？
English Translation: But what did they change?

Chinese Subtitle: 徒弟死的死，逃的逃，连他自己也躲了起来
English Translation: One ended up a corpse, others fugitives. He too took to the shadows.

Chinese Subtitle: 要我说，这些去取经的，都是废物
English Translation: Pathetic. Those journeyers have misplaced their worship.

Chinese Subtitle: 信甚么狗屁如来，不如我自己来
English Translation: Why bet on the Sutra, when one oneself can be a Buddha?

Chinese Subtitle: 既见未来，为何不拜？
English Translation: Kneel before the Buddha of the Future!

Chinese Subtitle: 顽固不化！
English Translation: Obstinate fool!

Chinese Subtitle: 本座这搭包正是为迷途之人准备
English Translation: My sack awaits misguided souls like you.

Chinese Subtitle: 你且进去悟上一悟！
English Translation: Enter within and find enlightenment!

Chinese Subtitle: 你这夯货，也被那老贼抓到了？
English Translation: Idiot! That trickster caught you too?

Chinese Subtitle: 你这夯货，也被那老贼抓到了？
English Translation: Idiot! That trickster caught you too?

Chinese Subtitle: 这搭包儿比以前邪门多了，竟养出了此等利害妖物
English Translation: This wicked sack is much more vicious than before, nurturing such evilness!

Chinese Subtitle: 估摸老贼借了大师兄的道行，把这破袋子又缝补了一番
English Translation: Yellowbrow must have woven Wukong's strength into it. That bastard!

Chinese Subtitle: 估摸老贼借了大师兄的道行，把这破袋子又缝补了一番
English Translation: Yellowbrow must have woven Wukong's strength into it. That bastard!

Chinese Subtitle: 一起上，先杀出去再说！
English Translation: Join me, let's fight our way out!

Chinese Subtitle: 还记得盂兰会上，世尊说过
English Translation: I remember what the Buddha said at the Ullambana.

Chinese Subtitle: 众生之苦，多因不守戒律，放情纵欲
English Translation: All beings suffer as they heed not the precepts and indulge.

Chinese Subtitle: 要我说，放屁
English Translation: I say: nonsense!

Chinese Subtitle: 不杀生，仇恨永无止息
English Translation: Thou shalt kill, lest feuds instill.

Chinese Subtitle: 不偷盗，强弱如我何异
English Translation: Thou shalt snatch, a fair play in a fair match.

Chinese Subtitle: 不邪淫，一切有情皆孽
English Translation: Thou shalt lust, before all loves turn into dust.

Chinese Subtitle: 不妄语，梦幻泡影空虚
English Translation: Thou shalt boast, for prestige and legacy it doth host.

Chinese Subtitle: 不馋酒，忧怖涨落无常
English Translation: Thou shalt drink, and drenched unease shall sink.

Chinese Subtitle: 不耽乐，芳华刹那而已
English Translation: Thou shalt revel, prime year shan't be spent to settle.

Chinese Subtitle: 不贪眠，苦苦不得解脱
English Translation: Thou shalt dream, to reach in bleak void the sole gleam.

Chinese Subtitle: 不纵欲，诸行了无生趣
English Translation: Thou shalt indulge, or life is but a scourge!

Chinese Subtitle: 万法皆空，唯因果不空
English Translation: All dharma is emptiness, but karma alone is not.

Chinese Subtitle: 杀罢，杀罢！
English Translation: Kill it! Do it!

Chinese Subtitle: 对，就是这样，这才是你
English Translation: Yes, just like that, that's who you are!

Chinese Subtitle: 小侄子，撑住！莫丢了神智！
English Translation: Keep your wits, boy! Don't get swayed!

Chinese Subtitle: 来，我让你杀得更畅快些！
English Translation: Here, let me quench your thirst for blood!

Chinese Subtitle: 诸行无常，诸相迷障
English Translation: All conditioned things are impermanent and lead astray.

Chinese Subtitle: 拿起屠刀，魔亦成佛！
English Translation: Be a butcher, then be a Buddha!

Chinese Subtitle: 以彼之身，施彼之道
English Translation: To retaliate in kind, you must be of that kind.

Chinese Subtitle: 因果循环，报应不爽
English Translation: Now, you have introduced your karma in this cycle.

Chinese Subtitle: 佛者，觉也
English Translation: Buddhahood. Enlightenment.

Chinese Subtitle: 你有觉心，定能成佛
English Translation: Such enlightenment surely would grant you Buddhahood!

Chinese Subtitle: 我有弟子三千，信众无数
English Translation: Three thousand heed my words, countless more revere my name.

Chinese Subtitle: 皆为你准备，任你杀戮
English Translation: They are all yours to have your fill of carnage.

Chinese Subtitle: 六道众生谁无杀心？
English Translation: In the Six Paths, all souls harbor the urge to kill!

Chinese Subtitle: 何况天也杀人，地也杀人！
English Translation: Even the sky and earth take lives!

Chinese Subtitle: 你恶业深重，从一地狱历一地狱
English Translation: Misdeeds heap upon your head as you find no escape in your suffering.

Chinese Subtitle: 最后的涅槃便由我来助你罢
English Translation: An ultimate nirvana I shall grant you gladly.

Chinese Subtitle: 我……我早就看穿了你的下场
English Translation: I saw how this would end for you long ago.

Chinese Subtitle: 只要你还在为他人而战，迟早，也会死在他人手上
English Translation: Keep fighting for others, and in time, you shall fall by their hands.

Chinese Subtitle: 我黄眉，只为自己
English Translation: I, Yellowbrow, fight solely for myself.

Chinese Subtitle: 我没输……
English Translation: I haven't lost...

Chinese Subtitle: 我不会输……
English Translation: I will not lose!

Chinese Subtitle: 只要，只要再用一次那猴子的宝贝……
English Translation: If only... I could wield that monkey's relic just once more...

Chinese Subtitle: 这孽畜早先拐了我的宝贝下界
English Translation: This rogue stole my Seedsack and fled here.

Chinese Subtitle: 又借大圣之力，把我那后天袋儿变成了销魂夺魄的邪宝
English Translation: With Wukong's relic, he made it a soul-snatching vessel.

Chinese Subtitle: 还化作我模样，假我之名诓来了许多旧仇，一心逞能报复
English Translation: He also took my look and my name to trick his old foes into vengeance...

Chinese Subtitle: 大肚皮，我早该猜到是你！
English Translation: You potbelly! I should've figured out it was you!

Chinese Subtitle: 恕罪恕罪
English Translation: Forgive my little deception.

Chinese Subtitle: 拐你一次，我信
English Translation: Stolen once? I buy it.

Chinese Subtitle: 拐你两次，猪都不信！
English Translation: Stolen twice? I doubt it!

Chinese Subtitle: 我也不信，谁知这孽畜胆子这么大
English Translation: Your doubt is fair. I shouldn't have underestimated his nerve.

Chinese Subtitle: 我本要亲自收他，不料两位施主先到
English Translation: I meant to subdue him myself, but you two were swifter.

Chinese Subtitle: 悟能你自是福大命大，而他年纪轻轻竟如此了得
English Translation: Fortune favors you, Bajie. But I see great potential in this young one

Chinese Subtitle: 这回或许……没看错人
English Translation: He might just be... the right monkey.

Chinese Subtitle: 莫讲这些不帮衬的话
English Translation: Enough of this empty talk.

Chinese Subtitle: 你那黄眉小儿失足淹死事小
English Translation: I don't care if Yellowbrow drowns in the lake.

Chinese Subtitle: 大师兄的东西若是丢了，再找寻起来就难了
English Translation: We can't have Wukong's relic sink with him!

Chinese Subtitle: 你那九齿钉钯，且借我用用
English Translation: For that. Pray, lend me that rake of yours.

Chinese Subtitle: 师兄此番下界，倒是去了好久
English Translation: You tarried in the mortal world for a good while, didn't you?

Chinese Subtitle: 说人话
English Translation: Speak clearly.

Chinese Subtitle: 这一回，我又赢了，金蝉子
English Translation: Once again, I proved it to you, Jinchanzi.

Chinese Subtitle: 祸乱人心，倒果为因
English Translation: You chose a means to an end, not to a proof.

Chinese Subtitle: 师兄如此执着输赢，可笑，可悲
English Translation: You sow chaos in hearts just for the sake of winning. How absurd and pathetic.

Chinese Subtitle: 师兄如此执着输赢，可笑，可悲
English Translation: You sow chaos in hearts just for the sake of winning. How absurd and pathetic.

Chinese Subtitle: 若不能赢，还证什么因果人心
English Translation: Heh, if not for winning, why debate over means and ends?

Chinese Subtitle: 杀无赦
English Translation: Kill without mercy!

Chinese Subtitle: 这断是个庙宇庵院，不打紧，进去瞧瞧
English Translation: It is a temple, no doubt. It won't hurt to peek inside.

Chinese Subtitle: 冰天雪地的，老猪孔儿都要冻住了!
English Translation: The frost is biting hard. Even my rump is frozen solid!

Chinese Subtitle: 闲话少题，我没兴趣
English Translation: Spare me your prattle, it bores me.

Chinese Subtitle: 既然来了，我便帮你把那身破铜烂铁换换
English Translation: Since you're here, the scrap you're hauling can stay no more.

Chinese Subtitle: 刀打好了，手痒得很，正愁没人来试
English Translation: Edge sharpened, arm restless. I was looking for someone to test it.

Chinese Subtitle: 话说前头，我这刀铜浇铁铸
English Translation: Mark me, this blade is cast from the best metal.

Chinese Subtitle: 擦着碰着，概不负责
English Translation: Don't blame me if you hurt yourself.

Chinese Subtitle: 废铁一块，不称我的武艺！
English Translation: This scrap is unfit for my skill!

Chinese Subtitle: 送你了！
English Translation: It's yours now!

Chinese Subtitle: 我再打一把就是
English Translation: I'll just forge another.

Chinese Subtitle: 一身破烂，难怪登门
English Translation: What rags and tatters. No wonder you're at my door.

Chinese Subtitle: 这才像个模样，不送！
English Translation: Now you seem a proper sort. Be on your way!

Chinese Subtitle: 后生小辈，你可知那黄眉的来历？
English Translation: Young one, did you ever hear the story of Yellowbrow?

Chinese Subtitle: 他原是东来佛祖弥勒面前司磬的一个童儿
English Translation: He used to be a measly altar boy to Maitreya in the East,

Chinese Subtitle: 偷了弥勒宝贝，下界成精
English Translation: stole his master's vessel to gain great power in the mortal realm.

Chinese Subtitle: 我们取经时路过小西天，黄眉假设小雷音
English Translation: When we journeyed to the New West and his New Thunderclap Temple,

Chinese Subtitle: 师傅不知好歹，进门便拜，中了算计
English Translation: our masterstrolled in and knelt —right into a trap.

Chinese Subtitle: 那黄眉老怪想打死我们师徒，自己去取经
English Translation: Yellowbrow tried to slaughter us all and take on the journey in our stead.

Chinese Subtitle: 过了这些年月，这一点他倒是没变
English Translation: That's never changed, even after all these years.

Chinese Subtitle: 大师兄当年跟老猪一样，被困在金铙里
English Translation: Wukong got trapped in the Gold Cymbals then, just as I did.

Chinese Subtitle: 是亢金龙将自己的角钻进去救他出来
English Translation: He was saved when Kang-Jin Loong broke the Cymbals with her antler.

Chinese Subtitle: 如今竟成了黄眉老怪的手下，怪哉
English Translation: To think that she has sided with Yellowbrow himself. How odd!

Chinese Subtitle: 莫非是那孽畜又得了什么能迷人心窍的宝贝？
English Translation: You don't think that he's gotten his hands on some mind-twisting vessels, do you?

Chinese Subtitle: 说到宝贝，黄眉老怪手上最厉害的宝贝当属那后天袋！
English Translation: Speaking of which, the most powerful thing Yellowbrow has should be the Seedsack!

Chinese Subtitle: 天上的二十八星宿，北方真武大帝手下的龟蛇二将
English Translation: The celestial deities above, the Turtle and Snake Generals under Xuanwu…

Chinese Subtitle: 还有国师王菩萨派来的小张太子和四大神将
English Translation: And the Third Prince with his Four Captains, sent by the Bodhisattva Guoshiwang.

Chinese Subtitle: 那破袋一张口，没一个逃得脱
English Translation: Once that wicked sack opened up, they were all devoured.

Chinese Subtitle: 大师兄没了法子，正凄惨呢，他师父弥勒就来了
English Translation: Just as Wukong was losing his wits, Maitreya himself appeared.

Chinese Subtitle: 你说巧不巧，偏偏是走投无路的时候，这胖和尚正好现身了
English Translation: What were the chances? That pot-bellied monk came right as we were all out of options.

Chinese Subtitle: 主子一到，黄眉自是威风不起来了
English Translation: With his master present, Yellowbrow soon met his defeat.

Chinese Subtitle: 可要我说，他根本没服气，一直记恨着大师兄坏了他的前程
English Translation: But I don't think he ever truly gave up. He's always had it in for Wukong for wrecking his plans.

Chinese Subtitle: 哥啊，这么好的差事交了我们，真是大造化
English Translation: My friend, we've struck gold with this task, haven't we?

Chinese Subtitle: 大个屁！
English Translation: Gold my ass!

Chinese Subtitle: 这一路挑担磨肩，骨头都累折了！
English Translation: My bones are cracking from lugging this load!

Chinese Subtitle: 你只快些走吧，休要误了我吃酒
English Translation: Step it up! I gotta catch that feast on time.

Chinese Subtitle: 我闻得，那妖婆有些个怪癖
English Translation: Hear me out. They say that hag has her quirky ways.

Chinese Subtitle: 八节四时都要进补，每次进补必要成亲
English Translation: Each season, she'd wed a mate, then devour him.

Chinese Subtitle: 有次夫人来此贺喜，挑了面宝镜作礼
English Translation: Once, our Lady brought her a wedding gift: a mirror...

Chinese Subtitle: 名为“照骨镜”
English Translation: the Past-Echo.

Chinese Subtitle: 且慢
English Translation: Wait...

Chinese Subtitle: 照骨镜……
English Translation: The Past-Echo...

Chinese Subtitle: 我记得夫人时常念叨，言语间好生可惜哩
English Translation: The Lady often speaks of it with regrets, I wonder why...

Chinese Subtitle: 你听我说完后话
English Translation: Let me finish, will you?

Chinese Subtitle: 那妖婆拿镜子一照，竟失了神，转身就把镜子扔了
English Translation: The hag got the mirror and looked into it. And for no reason at all, she threw it away!

Chinese Subtitle: 夫人因此受了闷气，便不再亲自走动了
English Translation: That soured our Lady's mood. She stopped visiting since then.

Chinese Subtitle: 叨咕个没完
English Translation: Jibbering and jabbering.

Chinese Subtitle: 老子一路上觉都睡不安稳
English Translation: Couldn't even catch a wink of sleep this whole time.

Chinese Subtitle: 谁！谁在里面？
English Translation: What? Who's in there?

Chinese Subtitle: 好大胆，巫山的贺礼也敢动！
English Translation: How dare you spoil the gifts from Mount Wushan!

Chinese Subtitle: 这年头，躲在哪里都没个清静
English Translation: No place to find peace these days.

Chinese Subtitle: 哪里来的女菩萨，快下来说话
English Translation: Hey lovely, why don't you come down and join us?

Chinese Subtitle: 这就走了？害羞什么……
English Translation: Leaving so soon? Why the shyness?

Chinese Subtitle: 前面似是个有人烟的去处，瞧一瞧？
English Translation: Looks like there's a dwelling ahead. Care to take a quick peek?

Chinese Subtitle: 这鬼地方哪里还有人住，只剩些不济事的妖怪变着法子欺我们
English Translation: Who'd live in this forsaken place? None but spineless guais, fooling about.

Chinese Subtitle: 唉，这里还和从前一样，一点没变……
English Translation: This place still looks the same. The past clings here.

Chinese Subtitle: 小猴子！我未曾说完呐！
English Translation: You restless monkey! I was talking here!

Chinese Subtitle: 此处门路打开，必有埋伏
English Translation: A wide road ahead. An ambush all but certain.

Chinese Subtitle: 莫要猴急
English Translation: Hold your monkeys.

Chinese Subtitle: 让叔叔也帮你一帮
English Translation: Let me fix you up a little.

Chinese Subtitle: 二位远劳，里头正排筵席，快请进来饮几杯薄酒罢
English Translation: Welcome, good sirs! The feast is all set. Please come in and be our guests!

Chinese Subtitle: 哟，二位贵客，怎来得这般迟？
English Translation: My! Gentlemen, you're fashionably late.

Chinese Subtitle: 哟，二位贵客，怎来得这般迟？
English Translation: My! Gentlemen, you're fashionably late.

Chinese Subtitle: 你们家夫人，这次又没来吗？
English Translation: Is your Lady not joining us again this time?

Chinese Subtitle: 夫人碍于身份，不便在下界露面
English Translation: Our Lady prefers not to be seen in the lower realm.

Chinese Subtitle: 但她心里一直记挂着各位，特差小的送来这份薄礼
English Translation: But she's been thinking of you all and sent this small token.

Chinese Subtitle: 夫人说了，盼仙姑早日康复，早日上天一叙
English Translation: She hopes your Lady will recover soon and pay her a visit up there.

Chinese Subtitle: 夫人未来，实是可惜
English Translation: It's a pity she didn't come.

Chinese Subtitle: 我们可是备了一出好戏要唱，专意等了这许久哩
English Translation: Or she would certainly enjoy a splendid show we've prepared for her.

Chinese Subtitle: 而今……
English Translation: But now,

Chinese Subtitle: 礼被偷了，人被杀了
English Translation: the gift's gone, and blood's been shed.

Chinese Subtitle: 不如……
English Translation: I say...

Chinese Subtitle: 拿你两个顶缸罢！
English Translation: You two should take the fall!

Chinese Subtitle: 我们不过是办事的下人，奶奶这是扯什么笑话？
English Translation: We're just servants, Madam. What's the jest?
Zhu Bajie!

Chinese Subtitle: 我知你生得丑，怕见人
English Translation: I know you find your look embarrassing.

Chinese Subtitle: 但也不用要顶着另一张猪脸哄我母亲罢？
English Translation: But why hide from my mother with another pig face?

Chinese Subtitle: 没眼色
English Translation: Rude girl!

Chinese Subtitle: 我老猪一心向佛，你母亲也不知哪位，且得等着
English Translation: Don't you know I'm a pious Buddhist? Give me your mother's name, and I'll check my list.

Chinese Subtitle: 好薄情的人！
English Translation: You heartless ass!

Chinese Subtitle: 当年你在这岭上杀人放火，毁她清誉
English Translation: After you ruined her House and her reputation,

Chinese Subtitle: 如今却都不记得了？
English Translation: you're telling me you don't remember her?

Chinese Subtitle: 清誉？
English Translation: Reputation?

Chinese Subtitle: 都做野妖精了，还有脸提什么清誉
English Translation: Yaoguais care about reputation?!

Chinese Subtitle: 都做野妖精了，还有脸提什么清誉
English Translation: Yaoguais care about reputation?!
All she cared about was lust!

Chinese Subtitle: 我说呢，原来你就是那蜘蛛精的小辈
English Translation: Now I know, you're one of her spiderlings, aren't you?

Chinese Subtitle: 罢了罢了
English Translation: Well, well.

Chinese Subtitle: 叫我一声好叔叔，老猪给你几分面子，去那破洞里见见故人
English Translation: Your rudeness is forgiven. Show some respect, maybe I'll kindly pay your mother a visit.

Chinese Subtitle: 你乐意去也好，不乐意去也罢

Chinese Subtitle: 我与夫君本住在山顶的庄子里
English Translation: We lived in peace in our mountaintop home.

Chinese Subtitle: 忽地一日，不知哪处杀来的一伙虫妖，定要强占此地
English Translation: But out of nowhere, wicked insects swarmed the place.

Chinese Subtitle: 庄子里人死的死，逃的逃、独留了我一个……
English Translation: They occupied our village. I was the lone survivor...

Chinese Subtitle: 我原想回那庄子里寻些亡夫的遗物
English Translation: I intended to retrieve my late husband's keepsakes,

Chinese Subtitle: 可那伙虫妖中有个领头的，号毒敌大王
English Translation: but the guais' leader, the Scorpionlord,

Chinese Subtitle: 他的倒马毒甚是厉害，现下我一点成算也没了……
English Translation: has discouraged all my attempts with his Deathsting...

Chinese Subtitle: 你也要去后头的山里？
English Translation: Young master, are you heading up the mountain?

Chinese Subtitle: 那林间俱是些放毒的妖魔，你若擅入，必是有去无回
English Translation: Venomous yaoguais have infested the forest ahead. Take caution, or you may never make it back alive.

Chinese Subtitle: 切记多备些解毒的草药，莫要逞强……
English Translation: Remember to carry enough herbs with you, in case you find yourself poisoned.

Chinese Subtitle: 今朝有酒今朝醉，莫管门前是与非……
English Translation: In today's wine, I steep; let outside quarrels keep...

Chinese Subtitle: 晦气，晦气啊！
English Translation: Woe, woe is me!

Chinese Subtitle: 那等天克我族的祸害，不乘机痛快杀了，还偏让老子这里护着
English Translation: The chance to kill that bane of our kind is there! Yet here I am, forced to protect it!

Chinese Subtitle: 走走走，别碍着我喝闷酒
English Translation: Get lost! Don't disturb my drink.

Chinese Subtitle: 看你那副痨病鬼的模样，爷爷甩两钩子，你就死了，留着性命不好吗?
English Translation: How about a quick death with my stinger, you taut-faced monkey? Now leave while you can

Chinese Subtitle: 你别在这里晃荡，若是碰坏了老子的酒坛，有你好看
English Translation: Quit your dawdling, will you? One scratch on my jars, just one, and you'll be a dead monkey!

Chinese Subtitle: 大胆！
English Translation: The nerve!

Chinese Subtitle: 你这毛怪，我意欲放你，你却定要与我为难，自寻死路!
English Translation: You fur face! I meant to let you pass, but you chose to ruin my day! Now, face your doom!

Chinese Subtitle: 此等隐僻之处，许久未见过生人了
English Translation: It's been long since any soul has trodden these hidden bounds.

Chinese Subtitle: 小居士，你尖嘴缩腮，肌瘦面黄
English Translation: Hail, young master. Your face is gaunt, complexion sallow.

Chinese Subtitle: 小居士，你尖嘴缩腮，肌瘦面黄
English Translation: Hail, young master. Your face is gaunt, complexion sallow.

Chinese Subtitle: 小居士，你尖嘴缩腮，肌瘦面黄
English Translation: Hail, young master. Your face is gaunt, complexion sallow.

Chinese Subtitle: 一副痨病鬼模样，莫不是也中了虫毒？
English Translation: Both remind me of the venom's touch. Has the worm also beset you?

Chinese Subtitle: 这谷内生有一种异虫，名琴螂
English Translation: An oddity thrives here—the Amourworm.

Chinese Subtitle: 生食其卵，可功力大增
English Translation: Consuming its eggs grants great power.

Chinese Subtitle: 只是那幼虫一旦孵化，便将五脏六腑啃食殆尽，空留一具不死的躯壳
English Translation: Yet once the larvae hatch, they devour your insides, leaving an undying husk.

Chinese Subtitle: 如今……多半药石无医了
English Translation: And now... most are beyond remedy.

Chinese Subtitle: 小居士，你若有心，便代我了结他们
English Translation: Young master, if you will, end their suffering in my stead.

Chinese Subtitle: 同门一场，我下不去手
English Translation: They were my fellows. I can't.

Chinese Subtitle: 他们的尸身内，或还存有完好的新卵
English Translation: Their lifeless bodies might still bear eggs unhatched.

Chinese Subtitle: 顺道寻来给我，我也好找出破解之法
English Translation: Bring those eggs to me, and perhaps I can find a cure.

Chinese Subtitle: 好！好！好！正是它
English Translation: Splendid! This is it!

Chinese Subtitle: 这般妖物，诡状异形，我得带回观内好生琢磨一番
English Translation: Vile and evil it is, hence I must bring it back for thorough study.

Chinese Subtitle: 小居士，你我相识一场，也是难得
English Translation: Young master, in our brief acquaintance you were kind enough to do me a favor.

Chinese Subtitle: 不如再帮我一回，将猴头留下，我好与师父交差
English Translation: Why not extend your kindness by leaving your head with me? That would please my master greatly!

Chinese Subtitle: 这般能耐……正好正好
English Translation: A strong foe... Just what I need.

Chinese Subtitle: 由你来做我锐变飞升的头份血食，再好不过
English Translation: You shall be my initial feast to power my metamorphosis ascension.

Chinese Subtitle: 这些凡夫俗子，不自量力
English Translation: These impudent mortals have overreached themselves.

Chinese Subtitle: 这些凡夫俗子，不自量力
English Translation: These impudent mortals have overreached themselves.

Chinese Subtitle: 此番下场，都是咎由自取
English Translation: Their demise was of their own creation.

Chinese Subtitle: 你不一样，这天地间的毒物，轻易要不了你的性命
English Translation: But you - you are special. What poisoned them only strengthens you.

Chinese Subtitle: 这东西好生收着，善加运用，妙处无穷
English Translation: Keep it close and wield it wisely. You'll see its potential.

Chinese Subtitle: 快去救他罢，困在那里，想必生不如死
English Translation: Go, release him. Being trapped there is a torment worse than death.

Chinese Subtitle: 从小看他长大，我下不去手……
English Translation: I've watched him grow up; I cannot bring myself to do it...

Chinese Subtitle: 这些年未得相见，你竟被他们害成了这副模样
English Translation: All these years apart, and they've marred you like this.

Chinese Subtitle: 我自黎山而来，在此调查谷中之事
English Translation: I journeyed from Mount Li to delve into the mysteries of this valley.

Chinese Subtitle: 我并非有意瞒你，确实有些难处
English Translation: I didn't mean to hold this back from you. It was because I had to.

Chinese Subtitle: 我同他母亲相识一场，下不去手，这才引你来此
English Translation: I stayed my hand for my ties to his mother. That's why I called upon you.

Chinese Subtitle: 我道此物早已落入那多目怪手中，竟被你寻得了
English Translation: But how did you get this? I thought it was with the Hundred-Eyed Guai.

Chinese Subtitle: 或许这就是机缘罢
English Translation: This...may well be the design of destiny itself.

Chinese Subtitle: 既然如此，我便帮你将此物回复神力，权作我的答谢之意了
English Translation: I shall help you and restore its power. Consider this as my token of gratitude.

Chinese Subtitle: 不过是几缕天上垂下的丝线
English Translation: A few strings dangling from the sky.

Chinese Subtitle: 连它通向何处，是福是祸也不知道
English Translation: No one knows whether they lead to weal or woe.

Chinese Subtitle: 为何……都争着往上爬呢？
English Translation: Why does everyone vie to scale them?

Chinese Subtitle: 住手，且饶他一命
English Translation: Stop! Spare his life.

Chinese Subtitle: 你这泼猴，都第几世了，还是这般不通人情
English Translation: Foul monkey. No matter how many times you reincarnate, you're still blind to the ways of this world.

Chinese Subtitle: 你这泼猴，都第几世了，还是这般不通人情
English Translation: Foul monkey. No matter how many times you reincarnate, you're still blind to the ways of this world.
Target Word: blind to the ways of this world

Chinese Subtitle: 自己莽撞闯祸，搅了天上的买卖也就罢了
English Translation: Now, in your folly, you've hindered the dealings of the Court.

Chinese Subtitle: 还捎上个自不量力的小女娃
English Translation: But above that, you've given a girl who knows no limits a false hope.
Target Word: knows no limits a false hope

Chinese Subtitle: 你放心，我定会将她好生炼成颗金丹，替你收着
English Translation: I shall transform her into a mighty golden pill and keep it safe for you.

Chinese Subtitle: 你若下辈子还要闹腾，记得来天上取
English Translation: Think about her, won't you? Should you feel like stirring trouble in your next life.

Chinese Subtitle: 老猪当年总督天河，掌管八万水兵大众
English Translation: Time was, I guarded the Celestial River, with my boys eighty thousand strong.

Chinese Subtitle: 这些个阴兵鬼卒也敢拦路？
English Translation: And the puny revenants dare to impede me?

Chinese Subtitle: 若不是靠我神妙变化，你今日准交代在这了
English Translation: That grand transformation of mine was the only reason you're still standing here.

Chinese Subtitle: 给叔叔磕个响头罢？
English Translation: A proper kneel to show gratitude would be appropriate, no?

Chinese Subtitle: 哼，吃过一回亏，再无第二回！
English Translation: Hmph. Fooled me once, never again!

Chinese Subtitle: 这等撒诈捣虚之徒，不足为惧
English Translation: Deceptive tactics like this pose no threat.

Chinese Subtitle: 我先过去探个实信，你小子速速跟上
English Translation: I'll go size them up first. Keep pace, boy!

Chinese Subtitle: 刚刚与那些阴兵正打杀着，不知为何昏了神……
English Translation: I thought you were one of them. What happened to me...

Chinese Subtitle: 吾乃牛魔王麾下先锋，还好未伤你性命！
English Translation: The vanguard of the Bull King is relieved you re unharmed.

Chinese Subtitle: 饶你，饶你！
English Translation: Well, consider yourself lucky!

Chinese Subtitle: 你的事我早有耳闻
English Translation: —I knew of you long ago.

Chinese Subtitle: 你要寻的东西，老大王定然知道
English Translation: The thing you seek, the king must know about it.

Chinese Subtitle: 如今山里生了妖孽，不知哪里冒出这些个阴兵
English Translation: Out of nowhere, the whole mountain was infested with those stinking corpses.

Chinese Subtitle: 上山的关隘也被几辆棺材车拦住，冒着邪火烧老子……
English Translation: Some coffin carts blocked all the passes up, burning everything in their path.

Chinese Subtitle: 我想你有些溜撒，寻个法儿，把它们都拆了，如何？
English Translation: You seem clever. How about you find a way to destroy them, eh?

Chinese Subtitle: 棺材车又叫五行车，是大王的孩儿炼化出来的异物，厉害得很
English Translation: They’re called "Five Element Carts”, an evil and powerful invention of the king's son.

Chinese Subtitle: 那车儿怕不只是阻止我等上山
English Translation: I'm afraid they are not only guarding the passes.

Chinese Subtitle: 我觉得其中定有蹊跷！
English Translation: Trust me, there's more to it!

Chinese Subtitle: 眼下老子还得守住山门，这火焰山乱成一团，没了我可不行哩
English Translation: Got to hold my ground at the entrance for a while. Can't imagine the chaos without me!

Chinese Subtitle: 老子往这一站……
English Translation: I tolerate no evil under my nose...

Chinese Subtitle: 谁敢来！
English Translation: Neither does my axe!

Chinese Subtitle: 再来几个阴兵让老子杀杀才痛快！
English Translation: Bring me more revenants so I can chop them up!

Chinese Subtitle: 听着！
English Translation: Heed my words!

Chinese Subtitle: 红孩儿出动五行车儿，行的是障眼法
English Translation: The Red Boy's carts are nothing more than a distraction.

Chinese Subtitle: 得亏老子聪明！
English Translation: Thinks he can outwit me!

Chinese Subtitle: 呸！小杂种！
English Translation: Bah! That brat!

Chinese Subtitle: 呸！小杂种！
English Translation: Bah! That brat!

Chinese Subtitle: 你速速上山，我倒要看看他葫芦里卖的什么药
English Translation: Make haste and head up the mountain. We must figure out what he's planning.

Chinese Subtitle: 杀了个爽！
English Translation: What a great fight!

Chinese Subtitle: 瞧见没，老子大斧一挥……
English Translation: You see how l swung my axe?

Chinese Subtitle: 那个不孝子不知从哪听来些鬼话，竟在火焰山弄出这么大动静
English Translation: Someone fed that unruly boy a load of nonsense, and now he's running amok.

Chinese Subtitle: 那个不孝子不知从哪听来些鬼话，竟在火焰山弄出这么大动静
English Translation: Someone fed that unruly boy a load of nonsense, and now he's running amok.

Chinese Subtitle: 老大王为何任其摆布？
English Translation: Why doesn't the king take action?

Chinese Subtitle: 凭他的本事，十个红孩儿也不是对手！
English Translation: With his might, he could take down ten Red Boys!

Chinese Subtitle: 老大王远远瞧着，身旁既不见坐骑，更不见混铁棍……
English Translation: I can see the king from here, stripped of his mount and weapon.

Chinese Subtitle: 这其中到底有何缘由……火焰山究竟还有什么……
English Translation: I wonder what's behind all this... What else is hidden in this mountain?

Chinese Subtitle: 看不明白！看不明白！
English Translation: I feel blind! Blind!

Chinese Subtitle: 得先找到璧水金晴兽才好
English Translation: We should find the king's mount first...

Chinese Subtitle: 璧水金晴兽是老大王的心爱坐骑，如同手足弟兄，怎会不见了？
English Translation: The Bishui Beast is treasured by the king as his own kin. How could it simply vanish?

Chinese Subtitle: 牛魔王仁义无双
English Translation: My king... He treated me well...

Chinese Subtitle: 侍奉他我心甘情愿
English Translation: To die for him, I would not regret it.

Chinese Subtitle: 唯独，辜负了大哥
English Translation: But I've failed Brother.

Chinese Subtitle: 他交给我的差事办砸了
English Translation: Failing his mission is what l regret...

Chinese Subtitle: 为了那孽畜，老大王定是做了什么蠢事
English Translation: My king must've done something reckless for that darn boy.

Chinese Subtitle: 为了那孽畜，老大王定是做了什么蠢事
English Translation: My king must've done something reckless for that darn boy.

Chinese Subtitle: 这个秘密，恐怕都在那扇门后面
English Translation: The truth, I wager, lies beyond that door.

Chinese Subtitle: 那小小鬼车，不在话下
English Translation: That accursed cart was no match for me.

Chinese Subtitle: 老子是故意让它几手！
English Translation: I... I went easy on it, that's all!

Chinese Subtitle: 千万不要舍本……
English Translation: don't be swayed...

Chinese Subtitle: 逐末……
English Translation: Stay true...

Chinese Subtitle: 谁来救救我啊！
English Translation: Somebody help!

Chinese Subtitle: 救人，小师父救人呐！救人！
English Translation: Help! Help me, young master!

Chinese Subtitle: 猴哥哥，是你！
English Translation: It's you, kind monkey!

Chinese Subtitle: 救我！猴哥哥救我啊！
English Translation: Help me! Help me, please!

Chinese Subtitle: 山中生了变故，只有我逃了出来
English Translation: Things went south in the mountain, and I barely escaped.

Chinese Subtitle: 不想下山路上，又被妖人擒住
English Translation: But on my way down, guais captured me.

Chinese Subtitle: 在这儿吊了三日三夜……
English Translation: I've been kept here for three days...

Chinese Subtitle: 不知哪世修来的缘法，今生得遇好哥哥
English Translation: But now my luck has returned. My savior appeared here right in front of me!

Chinese Subtitle: 若肯舍大慈悲，救我一家老小
English Translation: Should you extend your mercy to save my family.

Chinese Subtitle: 就算典身卖命，也要酬谢大恩
English Translation: I'll repay your kindness at any cost.

Chinese Subtitle: 大王说的没错
English Translation: Master got it right.

Chinese Subtitle: 这小娘儿叫唤起来果然勾人
English Translation: The lass surely knows how to ask for help.

Chinese Subtitle: 这小娘儿叫唤起来果然勾人
English Translation: The lass surely knows how to ask for help.

Chinese Subtitle: 这小娘儿叫唤起来果然勾人
English Translation: The lass surely knows how to ask for help.

Chinese Subtitle: 这声音？
English Translation: Oh, no...

Chinese Subtitle: 是他们……
English Translation: It's them.

Chinese Subtitle: 抓我的人回来了！
English Translation: My captors are back!

Chinese Subtitle: 哥哥快点救我！
English Translation: Please don't leave me!

Chinese Subtitle: 嘿嘿嘿，好个愿者上钩
English Translation: Heh-heh, an easy catch!

Chinese Subtitle: 现在怎么办？
English Translation: And what now?

Chinese Subtitle: 嗯嘿嘿，通通烧死，烧个皮焦肉烂！
English Translation: Heh-heh, burn them all to cinders! Bum them bur them!

Chinese Subtitle: 贤侄好风流
English Translation: Quite the charmer, aren't you boy!

Chinese Subtitle: 贤侄好风流
English Translation: Quite the charmer, aren't you boy!

Chinese Subtitle: 比老猪更怜香惜玉
English Translation: But these eyes have seen prettier disguises.

Chinese Subtitle: 妖精！
English Translation: Yaoguai!

Chinese Subtitle: 姓甚名谁，老实说来！
English Translation: Your true face, out with it!

Chinese Subtitle: 若有半句编谎
English Translation: If a single lie slips,

Chinese Subtitle: 叔叔的钉钯可不长眼！
English Translation: my rake shall strike true!

Chinese Subtitle: 好险好险，多谢恩人搭救
English Translation: That was so close! Thank you for saving me!

Chinese Subtitle: 我是大力王的女儿，名叫萍萍……
English Translation: I am the Bull King's daughter, Pingping...

Chinese Subtitle: 胡柴！
English Translation: Nonsense!

Chinese Subtitle: 牛魔王何来女儿
English Translation: The Bull has no daughter!

Chinese Subtitle: 哄骗我老猪，讨打！
English Translation: Dare to fool me, scoundrel?!

Chinese Subtitle: 我……记得你
English Translation: I... I know who you are!

Chinese Subtitle: 我母亲玉面公主……
English Translation: My mother is Princess Fair Fox.

Chinese Subtitle: 就是被你所杀！
English Translation: You killed her!

Chinese Subtitle: 母亲死后，我便一直跟着父亲生活
English Translation: After my mother died, I've been living with my father.

Chinese Subtitle: 铁扇公主心善，认我做了养女
English Translation: His wife, Princess Rakshasi, took me in as her own.

Chinese Subtitle: 后来……
English Translation: Later...

Chinese Subtitle: 哥哥从南海学成回来，我们一家团聚
English Translation: Brother came back from Bodhisattva Guanyin, and we reunited.

Chinese Subtitle: 终于过上安宁日子
English Translation: We had some peaceful days.

Chinese Subtitle: 哥哥一向孝顺
English Translation: My brother was kind,

Chinese Subtitle: 对我也甚是关照
English Translation: to me and to our parents.

Chinese Subtitle: 可是不知怎的，不久前他忽然性情大变
English Translation: But somehow, not long ago, he suddenly changed.

Chinese Subtitle: 他悄悄招了火云洞的旧部过来
English Translation: He secretly summoned his old troops for a coup,

Chinese Subtitle: 先是囚了父亲，又困住母亲
English Translation: imprisoned Father, kept Mother under strict watch.

Chinese Subtitle: 我……我实在没有法子了
English Translation: I... I had nowhere else to turn.

Chinese Subtitle: 才跑出来搬救兵
English Translation: I had to go for help.

Chinese Subtitle: 可可的一出山口，就撞见了哥哥的手下……
English Translation: But barely after leaving the place, his minions fell upon me...

Chinese Subtitle: 那牛魔王神通无穷
English Translation: The Bull King's might is known.

Chinese Subtitle: 我跟师兄两人才斗他不过
English Translation: Even together, Wukong and I couldn't rival him.

Chinese Subtitle: 铁扇仙更有灵宝护身
English Translation: Rakshasi's Plantain Fan is also formidable.

Chinese Subtitle: 怎么到了你这女怪嘴里，说囚就囚了？
English Translation: And you want me to believe that they were subdued by a kid?

Chinese Subtitle: 谁能料到自己儿子反目成仇
English Translation: Subdued by their son?

Chinese Subtitle: 做父母的，谁又真的狠心对亲生孩子动手？
English Translation: Who else could make them put their guard down? Really, with soft hearts, they could never harm him.

Chinese Subtitle: 呆子，这小狐狸哄你玩呢！
English Translation: You idiot! This fox is fooling you!

Chinese Subtitle: 你们看看这里……
English Translation: Look at this place.

Chinese Subtitle: 若不是哥哥的三昧真火，又怎会落得如此凄惨！
English Translation: Only my brother's Samadhi Fire could wreak such havoc!

Chinese Subtitle: 不好！
English Translation: Oh no!

Chinese Subtitle: 父亲性命顷刻即休，请猴哥哥务必助我一家渡此劫难……
English Translation: My father is dying. Please, kind monkey, help me and my family....

Chinese Subtitle: 火焰山极凶极险
English Translation: A perilous place, this is.

Chinese Subtitle: 这只蟭蟟虫儿你却收好
English Translation: Keep this cicada safe with you.

Chinese Subtitle: 到时自有用处
English Translation: It'll come in handy.

Chinese Subtitle: 这声音耳熟得很
English Translation: That's a voice I know well.

Chinese Subtitle: 老猪我去探探便知
English Translation: I'll go ahead and take a look.

Chinese Subtitle: 来不及了
English Translation: No time to lose now.

Chinese Subtitle: 猴哥哥，我在前面带路
English Translation: Follow me.

Chinese Subtitle: 快来！
English Translation: This way!

Chinese Subtitle: 适才那位猪长老，跟你说了什么悄悄话？
English Translation: What secrets did Master Pig whisper to you just now?

Chinese Subtitle: 我且不计较从前血债，他倒好，竟还有如此大的敌意……
English Translation: I've let go of our blood feud, but he still holds so much hostility...

Chinese Subtitle: 这山里山外，到处都是哥哥的手下
English Translation: My brother's minions are everywhere.

Chinese Subtitle: 猴哥哥务必跟紧我
English Translation: Stay close to me, kind monkey.

Chinese Subtitle: 从前，哥哥常与我在这山间玩耍
English Translation: Brother and I used to play around there.

Chinese Subtitle: 那六健将还会逗我们开心，好生快活
English Translation: The Valiant Six had their ways of amusing us. What fun we had together.

Chinese Subtitle: 此处有洞能过，我先行，猴哥哥径自往前出去
English Translation: I'll get through this hole, and you can pass by that crack ahead.

Chinese Subtitle: 两只脚比不过四只脚
English Translation: My paws beat your feet!

Chinese Subtitle: 是父亲的声音……他就在那儿！
English Translation: That's Father... He's right there.

Chinese Subtitle: 哥哥的三昧真火实在厉害，上山的路，都已封死了……
English Translation: My brother's Samadhi fire has obstructed all paths uphill.

Chinese Subtitle: 要灭此火，须得用到母亲的芭蕉扇……可是母亲她……
English Translation: To quench it, Mother's Plantain Fan is a must... But she'd never...

Chinese Subtitle: 从这里跳下，有条密道通往母亲的寝宫
English Translation: Down this cliff, there is a secret passage to her palace.

Chinese Subtitle: 她应该还在里面
English Translation: She should be there.

Chinese Subtitle: 母亲一向溺爱哥哥，怎肯轻易交出扇子……
English Translation: But she'd never give you the fan to be used against her precious son...

Chinese Subtitle: 我想起来！
English Translation: Got it!

Chinese Subtitle: 旁边不远的地界，另有一位高人居住，据说以前也是母亲的故友
English Translation: Quite nearby, there is a deity we can turn to - one said to be Mother's old friend.

Chinese Subtitle: 如能再请他出山，与我们一同劝说母亲，借出芭蕉扇的机会，又能再大几分！
English Translation: If we could persuade him to come along, maybe he could talk Mother into giving us the fan.

Chinese Subtitle: 我速去速回，猴哥哥自己当心啊！
English Translation: I'll go find him. Be careful out here!

Chinese Subtitle: 猴子，棍子，死的，活的，大王，都要！
English Translation: Wanted monkey, wanted staff. Wanted, dead, or alive!

Chinese Subtitle: 站住！大王有令，擅闯娘娘禁宫者，杀！
English Translation: Halt! Intruders...to the Princess' palace face death.

Chinese Subtitle: 这只蟭蟟虫儿你却收好
English Translation: Keep this cicada safe with you.

Chinese Subtitle: 到时自有用处
English Translation: It'll come in handy.

Chinese Subtitle: 哥哥长，哥哥短，不好生陪着你那哥哥，来这里作甚？
English Translation: Enough about your brother! If you care for him so much, why not go back to him and give me some peace?

Chinese Subtitle: 孩儿想……想借母亲的芭蕉扇去救父王
English Translation: If you won't act, Mother, then I implore you... to lend me your Plantain Fan to save Father.

Chinese Subtitle: 救，火焰山这场劫，一柄扇子，怕是救不了
English Translation: Save him? Or this mountain from its doom? Both are beyond this fan.

Chinese Subtitle: 母亲！母亲，女儿求求你了！
English Translation: Mother, please... I am begging you!

Chinese Subtitle: 再这么拖下去，哥哥的凶性一发，父王怕是必死无疑！
English Translation: Father's life hangs on a thread. A thread which brother could cut short any moment!

Chinese Subtitle: 你是当真关心那放荡老牛？
English Translation: Since when did you start caring for that old bull?

Chinese Subtitle: 你是当真关心那放荡老牛？
English Translation: Since when did you start caring for that old bull?

Chinese Subtitle: 别以为做娘的不知你那点小心思
English Translation: Do not think you can hide your secret wish from me!

Chinese Subtitle: 难保不是盼望我们都气死了
English Translation: You wish you could rule this mountain with your brother,

Chinese Subtitle: 好与你哥哥在这山中逍遥快活
English Translation: once we are finished...

Chinese Subtitle: 母亲冤枉！
English Translation: That is not true, Mother...

Chinese Subtitle: 若不是心忧父王安危，我何苦找到上仙一起来这里央求
English Translation: If that were my wish, why would l bring this Master here to help?

Chinese Subtitle: 哼，狐狸精就是狐狸精
