English Translation: Hmph. Words from cunning foxes...

Chinese Subtitle: 哼，狐狸精就是狐狸精
English Translation: Hmph. Words from cunning foxes...

Chinese Subtitle: 哼，狐狸精就是狐狸精
English Translation: Hmph. Words from cunning foxes...

Chinese Subtitle: 我看你只想骗去芭蕉扇，做个人情献给孽儿
English Translation: You just want to trade my fan for a smile on your brother's face.

Chinese Subtitle: 我……我是父王的亲生骨肉
English Translation: I... I owe my life to Father,

Chinese Subtitle: 承蒙母亲不弃，才得以苟活至今
English Translation: and to your kindness for taking me in.

Chinese Subtitle: 哥哥待我再好，又怎比得上双亲的天恩
English Translation: Brother was good to me. But I would never betray my parents for him...

Chinese Subtitle: 扇子的事，我意已决
English Translation: Say no more of the fan.

Chinese Subtitle: 当时多造的孽缘，如今不配自怜
English Translation: We raised the boy. Guess this is what we deserve.

Chinese Subtitle: 反倒是你
English Translation: But you...

Chinese Subtitle: 挑这个时候来，是何缘由？
English Translation: Why are you here at this very moment?

Chinese Subtitle: 师姐
English Translation: Rakshasi,

Chinese Subtitle: 这是你的家事
English Translation: I'm not a part of your family.

Chinese Subtitle: 我一介外人，本不便置喙
English Translation: And I'm aware I have no voice in this.

Chinese Subtitle: 但萍儿找到我说，天命人已经到了火焰山
English Translation: But Ping told me the Destined One had arrived.

Chinese Subtitle: 天命天命，乖乖听老天命令
English Translation: The Destined One who doesn't even know what he's destined for?

Chinese Subtitle: 几个老不死，名字起得倒怪传神的
English Translation: Those old bastards must've pulled a muscle coming up with the name.

Chinese Subtitle: 他的真实来历，你我皆知
English Translation: You and I both know who he truly is.

Chinese Subtitle: 届时……
English Translation: When the time comes...

Chinese Subtitle: 你的儿女也好，丈夫也罢，连上这罗刹宝地
English Translation: Your children, your husband, and even this very palace.

Chinese Subtitle: 都难逃灰飞烟灭
English Translation: could all turn to ashes.

Chinese Subtitle: 一颗身不由己的棋子，来了又有何惧？
English Translation: What do l have to fear from a mere pawn?

Chinese Subtitle: 不说老牛与孩儿
English Translation: He's no match for us.

Chinese Subtitle: 我那芭蕉扇，也不是吃素的
English Translation: He can't even rival the power of my fan.

Chinese Subtitle: 他前脚得知身世，天命人后脚就到
English Translation: Once the truth is revealed, suddenly he is here.

Chinese Subtitle: 两事同时发生，师姐不觉得诡异吗？
English Translation: Do you not find it odd, such a twist of fate?

Chinese Subtitle: 身世……？
English Translation: The truth?

Chinese Subtitle: 什么身世？
English Translation: The truth of what?

Chinese Subtitle: 你们在说谁？
English Translation: Who are you talking about?

Chinese Subtitle: 我听闻剩余几个遗物，都已落入天命人之手
English Translation: I heard the Destined One had obtained all the other relics.

Chinese Subtitle: 师姐，事已至此……
English Translation: Rakshasi, your situation is grave...

Chinese Subtitle: 你还不明白吗？
English Translation: Do you not see?

Chinese Subtitle: 是谁让他回来的？
English Translation: Who mandated his return?

Chinese Subtitle: 那些东西，当真是修炼至宝？
English Translation: Were those relics really bestowed for your good?

Chinese Subtitle: 只怕我们一个个自作聪明
English Translation: Perhaps, amidst these schemes and plots,

Chinese Subtitle: 到头来反倒成了助他还魂的祭品
English Translation: we've unwittingly become stepping stones for his rebirth.

Chinese Subtitle: 我不在意别人死活
English Translation: For others, I care not.

Chinese Subtitle: 我……我从来……
English Translation: All along...

Chinese Subtitle: 都只在意你一个人
English Translation: you are all I care for.

Chinese Subtitle: 不如
English Translation: I say,

Chinese Subtitle: 我们两个一起走罢！
English Translation: we should leave together!

Chinese Subtitle: 当年在上面我如何待你
English Translation: I vow to treasure you dearly,

Chinese Subtitle: 今后也会如何待你！
English Translation: just like when we’re up there.

Chinese Subtitle: 师弟……
English Translation: I never thought...

Chinese Subtitle: 到了这种时候，竟只有你，还挂念着我
English Translation: That one day you'd be the only one l can rely on.

Chinese Subtitle: 我……我一下没了主意
English Translation: I am overwhelmed...

Chinese Subtitle: 来，坐上来
English Translation: Come sit with me,

Chinese Subtitle: 与我细说
English Translation: and tell me what to do.

Chinese Subtitle: 母亲，不可信他
English Translation: Don't let him, Mother!

Chinese Subtitle: 这厮面露奸相，定有轻薄之意！
English Translation: Don't you see? He is taking advantage of you!

Chinese Subtitle: 这厮面露奸相，定有轻薄之意！
English Translation: Don't you see? He is taking advantage of you!

Chinese Subtitle: 淫贼！
English Translation: You lecher!

Chinese Subtitle: 我是白瞎了请你救人，你竟趁人之危
English Translation: I called for your help, not your treachery.

Chinese Subtitle: 你，你敢！
English Translation: How... how dare you!

Chinese Subtitle: 长辈们说话
English Translation: A child of a concubine...

Chinese Subtitle: 轮不到一个庶女弄舌
English Translation: should know better manners.

Chinese Subtitle: 轮不到一个庶女弄舌
English Translation: should know better manners.

Chinese Subtitle: 我与你母亲相识的时候
English Translation: When I first crossed paths with her,

Chinese Subtitle: 你那父王，大约还套着牛梭子
English Translation: your bull of a father was no more than livestock,

Chinese Subtitle: 你那父王，大约还套着牛梭子
English Translation: your bull of a father was no more than livestock,

Chinese Subtitle: 不知在哪里犁地呢
English Translation: munching on a patch of grass.
Target Word: munching on a patch of grass

Chinese Subtitle: 淫贼！下贱！母亲别信他！
English Translation: Have you no shame? Mother, don't be fooled!

Chinese Subtitle: 淫贼！下贱！母亲别信他！
English Translation: Have you no shame? Mother, don't be fooled!

Chinese Subtitle: 你啊，一边清静清静！
English Translation: Enough of your endless prattle!

Chinese Subtitle: 这才好些
English Translation: Now that's better.

Chinese Subtitle: 师姐，下界之后，小仙……
English Translation: Rakshasi, have we not been this close...

Chinese Subtitle: 还从没离你这么近过
English Translation: since our time in Tushita Palace?

Chinese Subtitle: 师弟，这些年其实我……
English Translation: Well yes...I do miss the old days, too...

Chinese Subtitle: 也很怀念宫里的日子
English Translation: We were so happy back then...

Chinese Subtitle: 这是何物
English Translation: What in the blazes?!

Chinese Subtitle: 猪蹄啊，还能是什么？
English Translation: No tricks here—it's just my hoof.

Chinese Subtitle: 再不现形，你要扑上来啃一口了！
English Translation: You deserve to know before we kiss!

Chinese Subtitle: 气杀我也，气杀我也！
English Translation: You'll live to repent this!

Chinese Subtitle: 好个腌臜东西
English Translation: Filthy lowlife!

Chinese Subtitle: 竟敢化作师姐模样诈我！
English Translation: You dare to take her form and beguile me?

Chinese Subtitle: 老朋友，见甚么外呢？
English Translation: My old friend, wasn't it fun?

Chinese Subtitle: 咱俩携手剿灭狐狸洞的日子，我老猪也想念得紧呢
English Translation: Have we not been this close, since our carnage in the fox den?

Chinese Subtitle: 狡猾东西
English Translation: You abhorrent fraud!

Chinese Subtitle: 亏我一片诚心
English Translation: My candid words...

Chinese Subtitle: 竟着了你这恶心手段！
English Translation: were wasted on your foul ears!

Chinese Subtitle: 扯什么淡！
English Translation: Candid my hoof!

Chinese Subtitle: 这一路的阴兵鬼将，以为老猪看不出是谁的杰作？
English Translation: Your revenants are everywhere. I thought you'd have better lies.

Chinese Subtitle: 哟，贤侄，你也到了？
English Translation: Quick on your heels, huh?

Chinese Subtitle: 正好正好，与叔叔一起会会这坏了纲常的烂淫贱货！
English Translation: Well then boy, let us teach this brazen adulterer a lesson!

Chinese Subtitle: 正好正好，与叔叔一起会会这坏了纲常的烂淫贱货！
English Translation: Well then boy, let us teach this brazen adulterer a lesson!

Chinese Subtitle: 孽畜，这么多年了，还是妖性难移
English Translation: Vile beast! Your savagery knows no cure.

Chinese Subtitle: 孽畜，这么多年了，还是妖性难移
English Translation: Vile beast! Your savagery knows no cure.

Chinese Subtitle: 我这兜帅宫的无根水一旦落了地，看你还如何放肆！
English Translation: But you will behave once my Sourceless Water from Tushita drops.

Chinese Subtitle: 曾经我助你等西行
English Translation: I've aided your journey once.

Chinese Subtitle: 今日不妨再送一程
English Translation: Now, I shall aid you again - on your way to death.

Chinese Subtitle: 阴阳之道，一向一背
English Translation: From yin and yang, arises two sides.

Chinese Subtitle: 天地之道，一升一降
English Translation: From land and sky, emerges a divide.

Chinese Subtitle: 今日就拿你这毛贼，喂喂我的阴阳鱼儿
English Translation: Now... you shall be feasted upon.... by my Yin-Yang Fish!

Chinese Subtitle: 这家子真不知礼数
English Translation: What a stingy host!

Chinese Subtitle: 弄这么条小鱼儿
English Translation: Such a meager fish...

Chinese Subtitle: 还不够请咱吃饭呢
English Translation: ...hardly enough for a platter!

Chinese Subtitle: 身世之谜已揭
English Translation: The truth has been revealed.

Chinese Subtitle: 红孩儿是不会善罢甘休的
English Translation: Disasters are sure to follow.

Chinese Subtitle: 你眼里这地覆天翻
English Translation: The turmoil you witness...

Chinese Subtitle: 不过是人家案板上一碗冷饭……
English Translation: is but a ripple caused by a drop from above.

Chinese Subtitle: 这厮溜了？
English Translation: Wha... Gone already?

Chinese Subtitle: 老猪我才刚打了个盹
English Translation: Bad news after a good nap.

Chinese Subtitle: 小小丹童这等猖狂
English Translation: He's gone too far from a furnace servant.

Chinese Subtitle: 以前也是个清白出身
English Translation: A decent lad, he was.

Chinese Subtitle: 说起来，都是大师兄造的孽……
English Translation: Decent, until ruined by Brother Wukong...

Chinese Subtitle: 命不好就罢了，又爱上了不该爱的人
English Translation: Then destiny carried him further to fall for the wrong woman.

Chinese Subtitle: 你，从这边上去
English Translation: You, go up this way,

Chinese Subtitle: 看看有无通路
English Translation: check if any way leads up.

Chinese Subtitle: 我再去四处找寻找寻
English Translation: I'll go look around.

Chinese Subtitle: 老娘虽然跑了，难说宝贝还在山内
English Translation: The owner might be gone, but her treasure might still be there.

Chinese Subtitle: 猴哥哥，快来快来
English Translation: Come here, kind monkey!

Chinese Subtitle: 我在这里！
English Translation: I'm over here!

Chinese Subtitle: 扇子我找着了，你看！
English Translation: I found the fan. Look!

Chinese Subtitle: 母亲大抵是左右为难，才匿了行踪，却把扇子留了下来
English Translation: Mother left her fan before she went away. She must have felt torn between her son and husband.

Chinese Subtitle: 只是这大铁球滚来滚去，不见消停……
English Translation: But this iron ball... It just won't stop.

Chinese Subtitle: 幸好猴哥哥及时赶到
English Translation: Now that you are here!

Chinese Subtitle: 你且助我引开它，我好举扇灭火
English Translation: Help me drive it away, and I'll let the fan do its work!

Chinese Subtitle: 小狐狸
English Translation: Hey, fox.

Chinese Subtitle: 这当真……是芭蕉扇？
English Translation: How can you be sure it's even real?

Chinese Subtitle: 放心放心，母亲曾教过我使用口诀
English Translation: Rest assured. Mother taught me this spell.

Chinese Subtitle: 一扇下去，便知真假
English Translation: Only the real fan will answer it.

Chinese Subtitle: 那老牛哼哼的十分虚切，估着只剩半口气了
English Translation: The Bull sounds weak, probably on his last legs.

Chinese Subtitle: 老猪姑且信你一次，尽点力气挡住那铁球，你趁机使出扇子
English Translation: Guess l have to trust you once. I'll get down there and stop the ball and let you do your work.

Chinese Subtitle: 猪八戒皮糙肉厚，死不掉的
English Translation: Don't worry. His thick skin will protect him!

Chinese Subtitle: 猴哥哥，先随我一起去救父亲要紧！
English Translation: Come on, let's save Father first!

Character: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
Chinese Subtitle: 贼婆娘快看，居然有个毛脸的，生得比我还丑
English Translation: Did you see that fur-face, wicked lass? He's even uglier than me!

Character: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
Chinese Subtitle: 贼婆娘快看，居然有个毛脸的，生得比我还丑
English Translation: Did you see that fur-face, wicked lass? He's even uglier than me!

Character: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
Chinese Subtitle: 贼汉子，我看你是耍糊涂了
English Translation: Are you still in the haze or what, you wicked lad?

Character: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
Chinese Subtitle: 贼汉子，我看你是耍糊涂了
English Translation: Are you still in the haze or what, you wicked lad?

Character: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
Chinese Subtitle: 夫人交代我俩守住此地，你管他丑不丑，闯进来的只管杀掉！
English Translation: Our lady asked us to guard this place, not to check another face! Kill whoever breaks in was the order!

Character: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
Chinese Subtitle: 得令！
English Translation: By your word!

Chinese Subtitle: 这么蛮横，就留你去喂那老牛的紫皮狮子狗罢
English Translation: You're a cruel one! Fine, go feed yourself to that old bull's purply pup.

Chinese Subtitle: 这么蛮横，就留你去喂那老牛的紫皮狮子狗罢
English Translation: You're a cruel one! Fine, go feed yourself to that old bull's purply pup.

Chinese Subtitle: 这么蛮横，就留你去喂那老牛的紫皮狮子狗罢
English Translation: You're a cruel one! Fine, go feed yourself to that old bull's purply pup.

Chinese Subtitle: 老娘不陪了
English Translation: I'm done playing with you.

Chinese Subtitle: 不哭不哭
English Translation: Shh, there, there.

Chinese Subtitle: 师父只道让这孩子平安降生，却不知带累我遭了多大磨难
English Translation: Our master bade this child be born, but he never knew my struggles.

Chinese Subtitle: 师父的示下，我们怎能不从
English Translation: How can we but follow the master's word?

Chinese Subtitle: 况且，师姐你已当着他老人家的面，饮了子母河的水
English Translation: Rakshasi, you know it was he who made you drink from the River of Childbearing.

Chinese Subtitle: 住口，这事莫要再提
English Translation: Shut it. You shall never speak of it.

Chinese Subtitle: 大王明知我不得不饮……
English Translation: The king knows why I had to drink it...

Chinese Subtitle: 可从那之后，脸都没露过，还多了个不归家的借口
English Translation: But I haven't glimpsed him...ever since then. He made it another reason for his absence.

Chinese Subtitle: 师姐，那老牛定是见不得这些
English Translation: Rakshasi, your husband shirks a dishonor this way.

Chinese Subtitle: 他能给你腾出此洞，又派金晴兽把守，已是给足了师父情面
English Translation: He granted you this cave, with his mount Bishui Beast as its sentinel. He's compromised enough for the sake of our master.

Chinese Subtitle: 你千万要守紧嘴巴
English Translation: You will seal your lips on this.

Chinese Subtitle: 若是再有他人晓得了此子来历，我们一家必有大难
English Translation: Our family would be doomed if anyone knew the truth behind this child.

Chinese Subtitle: 师姐放心，师父已让我来此作暗中协助
English Translation: Fear not. Master bids me aid you in secret.

Chinese Subtitle: 你且与那老牛好好将他抚养成人
English Translation: You and the bull, you will rear this child to manhood.

Chinese Subtitle: 待这娃儿长大，灵山的那些血债，他便是最好的人证
English Translation: And when the boy comes of age... well, on that day...he will be living proof...of the dark deeds of Mount Lingshan.

Chinese Subtitle: 父亲，父亲，天命人我带来了
English Translation: Father, I've brought him here - it's the Destined One.

Chinese Subtitle: 趁着哥哥不在，父亲可把那东西交还于他
English Translation: Brother is not around. You can hand it over to him now.

Chinese Subtitle: 此物一旦物归原主，哥哥自然死心
English Translation: Brother will surely give up on his plan once it's returned.

Chinese Subtitle: 火焰山的劫数，也便解了
English Translation: And then, we will be a family again.

Chinese Subtitle: 好个泼猢狲……
English Translation: You mischievous monkey...

Chinese Subtitle: 怎么作死……
English Translation: You dare to push your luck....

Chinese Subtitle: 都死不干净
English Translation: but always have a way out...

Chinese Subtitle: 可惜……
English Translation: Only...

Chinese Subtitle: 来得不是时候……
English Translation: You came back at the wrong time...

Chinese Subtitle: 父亲糊涂了吗？
English Translation: Are you not thinking straight, Father?

Chinese Subtitle: 小女把天命人带来救你了
English Translation: I brought the Destined One here to save you.

Chinese Subtitle: 是糊涂喽……
English Translation: I may be unwell,

Chinese Subtitle: 可眼没糊涂……
English Translation: but l am not blind...

Chinese Subtitle: 你……不是我女儿
English Translation: You... are not my daughter.

Chinese Subtitle: 父亲此话从何说起？
English Translation: How can you say that to me?

Chinese Subtitle: 萍萍吃尽千辛万苦，寻了人，灭了火
English Translation: I went through flames to find the Destined One for you.

Chinese Subtitle: 不就是为了回到父亲这里？
English Translation: For you Father! Don't you see?

Chinese Subtitle: 早知把眼也戳瞎好了……
English Translation: I should have plucked my eyes out too,

Chinese Subtitle: 免得见你作怪……
English Translation: to save me from your pretense...

Chinese Subtitle: 莫急啊，老畜生
English Translation: Worry not,
old, horned fool.

Chinese Subtitle: 一会儿就遂了你意
English Translation: I'll see to it shortly.

Chinese Subtitle: 枉我卖弄这般手段
English Translation: You could have enjoyed a good show...

Chinese Subtitle: 没意思，真没意思
English Translation: But you simply lack the taste.

Chinese Subtitle: 不如都杀了利索！
English Translation: I should've just killed you all!

Chinese Subtitle: 我打扮做那小妖精，自问一般无二
English Translation: My guise was perfect. None could see a single flaw in it.

Chinese Subtitle: 你是怎么看穿的？
English Translation: How did you find out then?

Chinese Subtitle: 她……不像你……
English Translation: Unlike you...

Chinese Subtitle: 面上敬我，心里一点不惧
English Translation: she has never needed to fake her respect for me.

Chinese Subtitle: 原来如此
English Translation: Interesting.

Chinese Subtitle: 少不得要再把那小贱人抓回来，好好耍子一番
English Translation: That little fox. I will find out if it's true after I hunt her down.

Chinese Subtitle: 少不得要再把那小贱人抓回来，好好耍子一番
English Translation: That little fox. I will find out if it's true after I hunt her down.

Chinese Subtitle: 不过
English Translation: But first,

Chinese Subtitle: 眼下先把你们两个好兄弟，烧成灰葬在一起
English Translation: I should burn you two together and mix your ashes to honor your friendship.

Chinese Subtitle: 闲情雅致
English Translation: Entertainment...

Chinese Subtitle: 时候多的是！
English Translation: That can wait!

Chinese Subtitle: 你这孙子……
English Translation: You cursed monkey...

Chinese Subtitle: 走到哪里……
English Translation: Wherever you go...

Chinese Subtitle: 哪里就家破人亡……
English Translation: you leave behind a ruined family...

Chinese Subtitle: 小儿虽一时落败，但精气未散
English Translation: My son is defeated, but not vanquished...

Chinese Subtitle: 只怕不过半晌还能站起来
English Translation: I am afraid he'll rise again soon.

Chinese Subtitle: 这东西，我得来后一直封在胃囊
English Translation: Since it came into my possession, I've kept it in my stomach,

Chinese Subtitle: 无人知晓
English Translation: hidden from all.

Chinese Subtitle: 我老了……
English Translation: I am old now...

Chinese Subtitle: 什么都怕……
English Translation: Fears have grown in me...

Chinese Subtitle: 怕战
English Translation: Fear of war,

Chinese Subtitle: 怕死
English Translation: fear of death,

Chinese Subtitle: 怕老婆
English Translation: fear of my wife,

Chinese Subtitle: 怕儿子
English Translation: fear of my son...

Chinese Subtitle: 所以……
English Translation: That is why...

Chinese Subtitle: 我不敢吃
English Translation: I dare not consume it....

Chinese Subtitle: 他来要，我更不敢给……
English Translation: let alone give it back to him...

Chinese Subtitle: 狗屁天命，都是苦命
English Translation: Destined, deprived, it's all the same

Chinese Subtitle: 切莫信了这些方便
English Translation: Don't ever believe their bullshit.

Chinese Subtitle: 此番能否再修正果，全凭之前因缘造化
English Translation: You are your choices, your causes and effects, not what you're called.

Chinese Subtitle: 多亏这张闭气符
English Translation: Thanks to this false death talisman.

Chinese Subtitle: 那土地老儿虽然技不如人，也算死得其所
English Translation: Poor Keeper, seems his legacy was his only offer after all.

Chinese Subtitle: 那土地老儿虽然技不如人，也算死得其所
English Translation: Poor Keeper, seems his legacy was his only offer after all.

Chinese Subtitle: 那土地老儿虽然技不如人，也算死得其所
English Translation: Poor Keeper, seems his legacy was his only offer after all.
Target Word: his legacy was his only offer

Chinese Subtitle: 我说怎么扇了没下一滴雨
English Translation: No wonder not a single raindrop was fanned!

Chinese Subtitle: 原来一直是你这憨儿在捉弄我
English Translation: It was your trick the whole time!

Chinese Subtitle: 牛哥，老猪来迟一步，对不住
English Translation: My bad, old bull. I was a bit delayed.

Chinese Subtitle: 臭小子，叔叔今日就代你父母，执行家法！
English Translation: You little rascal. I'll teach you a lesson on your parents' behalf!

Chinese Subtitle: 诸佛说此色非命，然则如何命在身
English Translation: The Buddhas say my flesh is not life's core, so whence springs existence, I implore?

Chinese Subtitle: 此骨与肉何处来，如何此生住母胎
English Translation: What ordained their dwelling in my mother's womb, if blood and flesh don't compose my life's bloom?

Chinese Subtitle: 可悲
English Translation: The Destined One...

Chinese Subtitle: 可悲啊
English Translation: Oh, the irony!

Chinese Subtitle: 我本无意与你为敌
English Translation: Tell me then, is my kind destined for extermination?

Chinese Subtitle: 但你对他们的手段一无所知
English Translation: A monkey born from unfeeling stone,

Chinese Subtitle: 过了火焰山，还有灵山，你过得了吗!
English Translation: can never understand my pain.

Chinese Subtitle: 你这厮甚不通变，唉……
English Translation: Still holding on, despite it all?

Chinese Subtitle: 只想着报仇，家都不要了
English Translation: Does your vengeance weigh more than your family?

Chinese Subtitle: 把师兄的东西吐出来！
English Translation: Spit it out now! His relic!

Chinese Subtitle: 奴家来迟，大王受苦了
English Translation: My King, I'm sorry for my lateness.

Chinese Subtitle: 他们……
English Translation: I turned to them...

Chinese Subtitle: 没一个肯来……
English Translation: But none offered help...

Chinese Subtitle: 夫人……罢了……
English Translation: My Lady... Forget it...

Chinese Subtitle: 两位上仙
English Translation: I implore you...

Chinese Subtitle: 万望垂慈，饶我儿一命
English Translation: ...to show mercy and spare my son.

Chinese Subtitle: 这孩子，是西方夜叉部仅剩的一缕血脉
English Translation: He's the last of the Yaksha's bloodline in the West,

Chinese Subtitle: 身世之悲惨离奇，世间罕有
English Translation: with an origin most tragic and twisted

Chinese Subtitle: 他现在已无还手之力
English Translation: Now he poses a threat no more.

Chinese Subtitle: 若能放他一条生路……
English Translation: Should you grant him mercy,

Chinese Subtitle: 我罗刹女与大力王，情愿虔心隐性，坐关修行
English Translation: I, Rakshasi, and the Bull King shall retreat ourselves to secluded meditation.

Chinese Subtitle: 连同一对儿女，永驻火焰山……
English Translation: Along with our children, we will never leave the mountain again...

Chinese Subtitle: 我夫妻两人……
English Translation: He is our son.

Chinese Subtitle: 甘心代他受罚！
English Translation: We will bear his punishment!

Chinese Subtitle: 如果上仙不弃，这把宝扇……
English Translation: If it pleases you, my Plantain Fan...

Chinese Subtitle: 也一并送上……
English Translation: is also yours to take.

Chinese Subtitle: 有经处有火
English Translation: Flames have paved my way...

Chinese Subtitle: 无火处无经
English Translation: Through flames, I shan't stray.

Chinese Subtitle: 知仇不报，何来修行！
English Translation: Vain was my flame, for a revenge destined astray!

Chinese Subtitle: 他们想看的……
English Translation: Their delight lies in our submission,

Chinese Subtitle: 正是如今，我们跪着的模样
English Translation: kneeling and begging.
You...

Chinese Subtitle: 偏不让你们……
English Translation: shall never witness it...

Chinese Subtitle: 遂心！
English Translation: from me!

Chinese Subtitle: 熊罴，你戴罪立功，赐眼一对
English Translation: You've atoned through deeds, Black Bear. Take this pair of eyes!

Chinese Subtitle: 貂鼠，你替天行道，耳朵拿去
English Translation: You've served the righteous cause, Yellow Rat. These ears are yours!

Chinese Subtitle: 黄眉，你重振旗鼓，鼻子收好
English Translation: Your power has gathered anew, Yellowbrow. Keep this nose!

Chinese Subtitle: 百眼，你忍辱负重，舌头领下
English Translation: You've endured hardships, Hundred-Eyed. Go with the tongue.

Chinese Subtitle: 牛魔，你大义灭亲，最是不易
English Translation: And the bull, it is the hardest to turn against a sworn brother.

Chinese Subtitle: 他的身子，留给你了
English Translation: You can have his body!

Chinese Subtitle: 你这老牛，真是晦气到家了
English Translation: Hah, wretched bull, ill luck plagues your every step!

Chinese Subtitle: 你这老牛，真是晦气到家了
English Translation: Hah, wretched bull, ill luck plagues your every step!
Target Word: ill luck plagues your every step

Chinese Subtitle: 这一辈子，就没选对过一次
English Translation: Never have you made a good choice.

Chinese Subtitle: 牛哥，你省些力气
English Translation: Save your strength, Brother.

Chinese Subtitle: 咱们还要杀上天去，擒那玉帝老儿！
English Translation: We're yet to slay our way to the Court and seize that senile Emperor!

Chinese Subtitle: 此子看着像是天兵头领
English Translation: This one must be the chief of their troop.

Chinese Subtitle: 牛哥你帮我殿后，我去会他一会
English Translation: Brother, watch my back while I go play with him.

Chinese Subtitle: 我知你不情愿，可我又何尝不是勉强
English Translation: Your reluctance is plain, just like my own.

Chinese Subtitle: 那孩子……
English Translation: They forced me...

Chinese Subtitle: 是他们逼我吃了子母河的水，借腹而生
English Translation: to drink from the River of Childbearing, to bear that boy in my womb.

Chinese Subtitle: 你我从此两地分居，各自清静……
English Translation: as if none of this had happened...

Chinese Subtitle: 老匹夫！
English Translation: You old coot!

Chinese Subtitle: 你早知我身世，为何还愿做他们的狗
English Translation: You knew who I was from the start. Why'd you choose to be their lapdog?

Chinese Subtitle: 孩儿本不想与你恩断义绝
English Translation: I never wanted to sever our ties.

Chinese Subtitle: 你若还念一丝骨肉情分，就该把那东西交付于我
English Translation: If kinship means anything to you, give me that relic,

Chinese Subtitle: 放我回去给同族报仇！
English Translation: and let me avenge my people!

Chinese Subtitle: 大王！
English Translation: My king!

Chinese Subtitle: 这把扇子送与那猢狲，教他退兵去罢！
English Translation: Let the monkey have my fan, and there will be no trouble!

Chinese Subtitle: 你弟，我教训了
English Translation: Your brother, I've disciplined;

Chinese Subtitle: 你儿，我送人了
English Translation: your boy, I've given away.

Chinese Subtitle: 今日你婆娘那柄扇子，我也要定了
English Translation: Your wife's fan, today I'll take it with me too!

Chinese Subtitle: 认师父修正果
English Translation: Find a master and serve the right.

Chinese Subtitle: 只有这条路是留给我们走的，长兄还不明白吗
English Translation: It's the only path left for the likes of us. Don't you understand, Brother?

Chinese Subtitle: 猴哥，那老牛的小娘子，也被我一钯筑死了
English Translation: Wukong! I took out the bull's concubine with a whack of my rake too!

Chinese Subtitle: 剥开衣看，原来是个玉面狸精
English Translation: Turned out she was a fox guai!

Chinese Subtitle: 我一直以为，攒了功德，入了仙班
English Translation: The way I saw it, with enough merit and a position before the Buddha,

Chinese Subtitle: 他们就会放过我，也会放过你们
English Translation: they would leave me be, and all of you as well...

Chinese Subtitle: 原来，我这样的人
English Translation: Now I see. For someone like me,

Chinese Subtitle: 只怕独自活着，便是罪过
English Translation: staying alive is enough to be a transgression.

Chinese Subtitle: 长兄，照顾好妻儿
English Translation: Brother, take care of your wife and children.

Chinese Subtitle: 我死后化的东西，碰不得
English Translation: And remember, steer clear of my remains...

Chinese Subtitle: 好侄儿，我们这是还乡，不是投胎
English Translation: We're getting home, son, not getting all worked up.

Chinese Subtitle: 那老猴子好不好，都在花果山顶上等着呢，不用忙慌
English Translation: That old monkey's going to be at the mountaintop no matter what. We don't have to rush.

Chinese Subtitle: 咱们按他吩咐把五根收归来，只待他拿出第六根，齐了！
English Translation: We've gathered the five relics, just as he said. All we need now is the sixth one he has!

Chinese Subtitle: 猫嚼头的亡人
English Translation: Curse these wretches!

Chinese Subtitle: 你瞧，你瞧
English Translation: Hey! You see?

Chinese Subtitle: 我就知那老东西定是藏了什么话没讲
English Translation: I knew there was something that old fool hadn't told us.

Chinese Subtitle: 不然，那群天上的老爷们怎的又来这山庄作耗了
English Translation: Otherwise, no one up above would bother to ruin this place yet again.

Chinese Subtitle: 不消说，定是因为你了
English Translation: They're coming for you, no doubt.

Chinese Subtitle: 真个是难，真个是难！
English Translation: I can't bear it. I simply can't!

Chinese Subtitle: 造化低了，是条绝路
English Translation: Bad luck. It's a dead end!

Chinese Subtitle: 你这告黑状的杀才
English Translation: You nasty slanderer!

Chinese Subtitle: 你这告黑状的杀才
English Translation: You nasty slanderer!

Chinese Subtitle: 我不去找你就罢了，你倒敢来招我
English Translation: I let you be, and now you have the gall to show up!

Chinese Subtitle: 若论赌手段，你今日就该死了
English Translation: If you come at me now, this day will be your last!

Chinese Subtitle: 造化，造化！
English Translation: Fortune's gift it is!

Chinese Subtitle: 是师兄的筋斗云哩！
English Translation: It's Wukong's Somersault Cloud!

Chinese Subtitle: 我正愁该如何捞你，不期这云倒是乖滑
English Translation: I was wringing my brain how to fetch you, but this savvy one's already on it!

Chinese Subtitle: 想是他在这山间云雾里躲藏了多年，感应到你的五根
English Translation: It must have been hidden here amongst the mist until it senses the relics on you.

Chinese Subtitle: 记起旧主人，恰巧救你一命
English Translation: Thanks to them, it recalled its master and saved your skin.

Chinese Subtitle: 它既认得你，倒不如先使唤使唤它
English Translation: Now that it answers to your call, why not make a good use of it?

Chinese Subtitle: 我虽能化风，可驮不动你的肉骨凡胎
English Translation: Your mortal body is too heavy for me in my wind form

Chinese Subtitle: 天兵天将来了这许多，山里定有大事发生，我们且去瞧瞧
English Translation: All these henchmen of the Court. What draws them to this mountain, let's find out.
It can't be....

Chinese Subtitle: 这是师兄的锁子黄金甲！
English Translation: Wukong's Gold Suozi Armor!

Chinese Subtitle: 这猴子和老猪一样，浑身是宝
English Translation: That monkey was full of surprises, just like me!

Chinese Subtitle: 不光自己死不透，连披挂也化作了山中灵物
English Translation: He had his way to linger on, and his belongings, too.

Chinese Subtitle: 还想着杀光天上鹰犬，捎他们下去作陪哩
English Translation: They're set on killing those mongrels of the Court.

Chinese Subtitle: 如不能先一步收了它们，却要被这些废物盗去了
English Translation: But we've got to snatch them first, or these scum will take them.

Chinese Subtitle: 老猪先去寻寻其他几件，你速速跟上
English Translation: I'll go find the other ones. Keep up with me.

Chinese Subtitle: 好！好！好！
English Translation: Splendid!

Chinese Subtitle: 有这两根呆毛，你愈发像那猴子了
English Translation: With these silly strands, you're all the more like Wukong!

Chinese Subtitle: 只是莫学他倚强撒泼就行
English Translation: Just don't prance around with your might as he did!

Chinese Subtitle: 那猴子宝贝多着哩，老猪再四处探探
English Translation: That monkey's got a stash of treasures. I'll scout around some more.

Chinese Subtitle: 让开，这次我是头功！
English Translation: Step away! This time, the glory's mine!

Chinese Subtitle: 罢！罢！罢！
English Translation: Fine then. Fine!

Chinese Subtitle: 有你们猴子在，老猪次次都是空忙
English Translation: With you monkeys around, I'm always toiling away for nothing.

Chinese Subtitle: 贤侄，日后平步青云了，可别忘了携带携带叔叔
English Translation: Kid, when you step up one day, try not to forget your Uncle Bajie.

Chinese Subtitle: 别学你那祖宗，好事不曾想过我，脏活累活全拿我顶缸
English Translation: All I got from Wukong were the nasty jobs. You should do better than that!

Chinese Subtitle: 别学你那祖宗，好事不曾想过我，脏活累活全拿我顶缸
English Translation: All I got from Wukong were the nasty jobs. You should do better than that!

Chinese Subtitle: 此处了账，再去别处看看
English Translation: We’re done here. Time to move on.

Chinese Subtitle: 进去了！进去了！
English Translation: It's in me! It's in me!

Chinese Subtitle: 哎哟，疼！疼！
English Translation: Argh, it hurts! Ouch!

Chinese Subtitle: 贤侄，贤侄！
English Translation: Kid, kid!

Chinese Subtitle: 快救我一救，这东西可不好消化
English Translation: Help me out here! This is a tough swallow!

Chinese Subtitle: 好侄儿，你可仔细些，别把叔叔的心肝脾肺打烂了！
English Translation: Watch it, kid, will you? Mind my innards while you're fighting in there!

Chinese Subtitle: 它是不是不行了？快一棒打死！
English Translation: Is it down for the count? Now finish it off!

Chinese Subtitle: 贤侄啊，你是不是惹恼它了
English Translation: Did you tick off our friend in there, kid?

Chinese Subtitle: 什么动静儿？贤侄，你到底行不行啊？
English Translation: What's that sound? Can you handle it or not, kid?

Chinese Subtitle: 今次又劳小侄儿救命了
English Translation: I owe you once more for saving my rump.

Chinese Subtitle: 老猪吃素，想必里面也不甚腌臜
English Translation: My belly's not too vile, is it? I'm not a meat-eater after all.

Chinese Subtitle: 你莫嫌，你莫嫌
English Translation: I hope it didn't repulse you.

Chinese Subtitle: 好在你把这东西取回来，不算太亏
English Translation: Well, you've fetched it. It wasn't all that bad, eh?

Chinese Subtitle: 现在师兄的金甲都攒齐了，该去那水帘洞里坐坐哩，你随我来
English Translation: Now that Wukong's armor set is complete, we should go to Water Curtain Cave. Come with me.

Chinese Subtitle: 你是哪里来的夷人？
English Translation: Where do you come from, outsider?

Chinese Subtitle: 我这大圣部下的群猴，都是一般模样
English Translation: In my realm, all monkeys are of similar face and shape.

Chinese Subtitle: 你这嘴脸生得各样，相貌有些雷堆，定是别处来的妖魔
English Translation: Your face speaks of a different breed. And an ugly one! You must be a yaoguai from another land.

Chinese Subtitle: 你这嘴脸生得各样，相貌有些雷堆，定是别处来的妖魔
English Translation: Your face speaks of a different breed. And an ugly one! You must be a yaoguai from another land.

Chinese Subtitle: 你这嘴脸生得各样，相貌有些雷堆，定是别处来的妖魔
English Translation: Your face speaks of a different breed. And an ugly one! You must be a yaoguai from another land.

Chinese Subtitle: 自从西行之后，我许久没来过此处了，不想还是这模样
English Translation: I've never ventured here since that journey. Nothing's changed after so many years.

Chinese Subtitle: 当年他在这座儿上，还押着我给他磕头哩
English Translation: He said this and told me to kneel. Right here on this seat.

Chinese Subtitle: 原来藏在这里了
English Translation: Ah, here it is!

Chinese Subtitle: 果然，连观音都说那猴子一毛不拔
English Translation: I knew it. Wukong is tightfisted, even Guanyin agrees so.

Chinese Subtitle: 这东西必然也是留给猴子猴孙的
English Translation: He kept it here so it could be passed down to another one of his kind.

Chinese Subtitle: 小侄儿，还是你来试试罢
English Translation: Now it's time for you to try it, kid.

Chinese Subtitle: 拿了这东西，便不再有退路
English Translation: Once you have this, there's no turning back.

Chinese Subtitle: 你这模样……倒是与师兄一般无二了
English Translation: Now... you look exactly like Wukong.

Chinese Subtitle: 贤侄如今披挂齐整，兵器凶横
English Translation: You're all set, kid. You look like a fierce warrior!

Chinese Subtitle: 速速上山，让我看看那老猴子弄个什么把戏
English Translation: Come with me! Let's find out what that old monkey is up to.

Chinese Subtitle: 这些个不识起倒的东西，通通宰了！
English Translation: These nitwits don't know their place. Let's remind them!

Chinese Subtitle: 今日就是玉帝老儿自个来了，老猪也不让分毫！
English Translation: I won't back down, not even if the Jade Emperor himself showed up today!

Chinese Subtitle: 小小天兵，呸！
English Translation: Minions of the Court. Bah!

Chinese Subtitle: 小小天兵，呸！
English Translation: Minions of the Court. Bah!

Chinese Subtitle: 去天上打听打听，老猪也是你们惹得起的吗！
English Translation: Ask around up there. No one dares to meddle with me!

Chinese Subtitle: 叫你们的主子出来，跟老猪比试比试！
English Translation: Have your commander step forward if he dares to duel with me!

Chinese Subtitle: 莫管他们，一群夯货，贤侄你径直上山便是
English Translation: Ignore these worthless idiots. Eyes front and up the mountain, kid!

Chinese Subtitle: 奶奶的，碍事！
English Translation: Curse it. You're in my way!

Chinese Subtitle: 把路给老猪让开！
English Translation: Move it or lose it, all of you!

Chinese Subtitle: 贤侄！这里，过来，快过来！
English Translation: Over here, kid! Hurry! Hurry!

Chinese Subtitle: 老家伙说在山顶等我，人影却不见一个
English Translation: He said we'd find him here, but I don't see a trace of him.

Chinese Subtitle: 只留了这块怪石头矗在这，又弄什么玄虚？
English Translation: There's nothing but a rock here. What's this supposed to mean?

Chinese Subtitle: 这石头，以我老猪的见识，大抵就是大师兄化成的石卵
English Translation: If you ask me, this rock must be the stone egg that holds Wukong.

Chinese Subtitle: 可我敲了敲无甚反应，你不妨再仔细查勘一番
English Translation: I gave it a knock, but nothing happened. Maybe you should have a closer look.

Chinese Subtitle: 来了？
English Translation: You're here.

Chinese Subtitle: 来了
English Translation: We're here.

Chinese Subtitle: 上船
English Translation: Step abroad.

Chinese Subtitle: 我说老猴，上了你这贼船，不会回不了头了罢
English Translation: Hey, old monkey. I hope this isn't a one-way trip, is it?

Chinese Subtitle: 天下哪里不是贼船，不上我这艘，你以为就回得了头么
English Translation: Isn't all life a one-way trip? Once you embark on the journey, there's no turning back.

Chinese Subtitle: 这里是什么地方？
English Translation: What is this place?

Chinese Subtitle: 他的记忆
English Translation: His memories.

Chinese Subtitle: 那猴子打小就这样，见到好东西一定要拿到手
English Translation: Since his early days, he'd had an eye for the finer things,

Chinese Subtitle: 别人不给，他就抢
English Translation: and a will to wrest them from others.

Chinese Subtitle: 这眼见便喜，不择手段的臭毛病
English Translation: Laying his eyes on, then craving to seize, their riches.

Chinese Subtitle: 与黑熊金池，又有何分别
English Translation: No better than the black bear and Jinchi, I say.

Chinese Subtitle: 小偷小摸要不得，学佛悟道就是大功德？
English Translation: He can't have an eye for the finer things, while the Buddha oversees the three realms?

Chinese Subtitle: 我看啊，差不多，都差不多
English Translation: Well, I hardly think that's fair.

Chinese Subtitle: 好一只泼猴，在地下成王成圣还不够
English Translation: How insatiable! Not content with his kingdom and title below,

Chinese Subtitle: 偏要跑到天上去讨个官儿做
English Translation: he asked for a position in the Celestial Court.

Chinese Subtitle: 可这天上没呆几日，只因王母不请他赴宴，便怒发冲冠
English Translation: But soon after his wish was granted, his joy turned to rage, all because he wasn't invited to a feast.

Chinese Subtitle: 恨不得把整个天宫都给拆了
English Translation: He nearly ruined the entire Celestial Palace.

Chinese Subtitle: 耳听即怒，恣意妄为
English Translation: Ears fume at unfavorable news.

Chinese Subtitle: 和那黄毛畜生一个德性，养不熟，养不熟啊
English Translation: As untamed and ungrateful as that yellow rat. Beasts are beasts, don't you think?

Chinese Subtitle: 和那黄毛畜生一个德性，养不熟，养不熟啊
English Translation: As untamed and ungrateful as that yellow rat. Beasts are beasts, don't you think?

Chinese Subtitle: 和那黄毛畜生一个德性，养不熟，养不熟啊
English Translation: As untamed and ungrateful as that yellow rat. Beasts are beasts, don't you think?

Chinese Subtitle: 和那黄毛畜生一个德性，养不熟，养不熟啊
English Translation: As untamed and ungrateful as that yellow rat. Beasts are beasts, don't you think?

Chinese Subtitle: 那时他还小，不懂事嘛
English Translation: He was young. He didn't know any better.

Chinese Subtitle: 又没佛祖教，又没师父带
English Translation: Hadn't learned from the Buddha or our Master yet.

Chinese Subtitle: 你这老人家也忒小气，老揪住人家小时候的丑事不放
English Translation: Aren't you being a bit harsh dredging up the scandals from his youth?

Chinese Subtitle: 大了也没好到哪儿去
English Translation: Like his adulthood was any better!

Chinese Subtitle: 他从那五指山下出来后，说是懂了礼数，收了心性
English Translation: Since his release, he had claimed to have learned manners and discipline;

Chinese Subtitle: 车迟国这一泡尿，就全露馅啦
English Translation: yet his wee prank in Chechi gave him away.

Chinese Subtitle: 目无尊长，自封偶像
English Translation: Posing as an idol, he degraded the gods.

Chinese Subtitle: 从来没把佛祖师父那些教诲放在心上
English Translation: Clear was his defiance of the doctrines he had learned.

Chinese Subtitle: 顽皮而已
English Translation: Well, he was just being naughty.

Chinese Subtitle: 天生本事大的人，骨子里都有那么点自恋，我也一样
English Translation: Aren't all great achievers somewhat self-obsessed? Myself included!

Chinese Subtitle: 鼻嗅痴爱，目空一切
English Translation: Nose in the air, feeling above others.

Chinese Subtitle: 比起那黄眉小子的狂妄，我看也不遑多让
English Translation: I say he was no less insolent than that Yellowbrow brat.

Chinese Subtitle: 比起那黄眉小子的狂妄，我看也不遑多让
English Translation: I say he was no less insolent than that Yellowbrow brat.

Chinese Subtitle: 这不是那谁么，叫甚么夫人的
English Translation: Wait, isn't it that... the lady of some sort?

Chinese Subtitle: 弄得师父一怒之下，把师兄赶回了老家
English Translation: It was her tricks that made Master drive Wukong away.

Chinese Subtitle: 在白虎岭，他倒是狠心绝情
English Translation: On White Tiger Ridge, he forsook his love.

Chinese Subtitle: 接连三次打碎过去的爱人，自以为从此不会再有牵挂
English Translation: Three times he broke her into pieces, convincing himself his heart would ache no more.

Chinese Subtitle: 可你也明白，他心里根本没有放下
English Translation: Yet, as you must know, he had never let go of her.

Chinese Subtitle: 不然也不至于成了佛，仍要执意逃离灵山
English Translation: Otherwise, he wouldn't have been so eager to get away from the Buddhahood he attained.

Chinese Subtitle: 舌尝必思，多情易折
English Translation: Those who talk much of love will one day bite their tongues.

Chinese Subtitle: 这一点他像你，还有你的那些个情人
English Translation: On this matter, he was akin to you, and your many darlings.

Chinese Subtitle: 无论身在何处，永远是孽海情天的囚徒
English Translation: No matter where you are, you'd always fall captive to the web of mortal desire.

Chinese Subtitle: 别扯我啊，老猪是慧根不够
English Translation: Why bring me into this? True, I don't have the wits to break the web.

Chinese Subtitle: 师兄自那次后，情情爱爱的消停多了
English Translation: But he had torn his way out since that day.

Chinese Subtitle: 八戒，仔细看看，这里很多你的好朋友
English Translation: Take a look, Bajie. Can you see? Many of your good friends are here.

Chinese Subtitle: 酒肉一场，算不得朋友
English Translation: We're just fair-weather friends, that's all.

Chinese Subtitle: 酒肉朋友，也是朋友
English Translation: But they are still friends, aren't they?

Chinese Subtitle: 你说是就是罢
English Translation: So you say, so it must be.

Chinese Subtitle: 这几个老兄弟……似乎没得一个善终啊
English Translation: These old buddies... I think none of them ended up well.

Chinese Subtitle: 是啊，古往今来的奇才异能之士，何其之多
English Translation: Indeed. For ages, countless gifted souls have walked this earth.

Chinese Subtitle: 但真正成就不朽功业的，寥寥无几
English Translation: Yet of them, how few have forged everlasting greatness!

Chinese Subtitle: 你们可知为何？
English Translation: Do you know why?

Chinese Subtitle: 世道不公？
English Translation: Injustice?

Chinese Subtitle: 世道从来不公
English Translation: Never has it been just.

Chinese Subtitle: 运气不好？
English Translation: Misfortune?

Chinese Subtitle: 运气只是强者的谦辞
English Translation: Fortune is simply humility in the mighty.

Chinese Subtitle: 那只能是……
English Translation: Well, mayhaps...

Chinese Subtitle: 没我老猪英俊了
English Translation: They simply lacked my charm.

Chinese Subtitle: 因为空有天赋，不思进取
English Translation: Gifted they may be, yet strive they not;

Chinese Subtitle: 小富即安，沉迷享乐
English Translation: content with little and lost in lust.

Chinese Subtitle: 想安逸，又想名利
English Translation: Seek the ease yet crave the renown.

Chinese Subtitle: 想快意江湖，又想成佛作祖
English Translation: They yearn for freedom yet aspire to Buddhahood.

Chinese Subtitle: 哪有这样的好事
English Translation: They always want both.

Chinese Subtitle: 身本多忧，怎可全求
English Translation: Yet, nobody can, and nobody should.

Chinese Subtitle: 牛魔王如此，孙悟空也如此
English Translation: Such was the folly of the Bull King and Wukong.

Chinese Subtitle: 有天命的眷顾，更须有斩断私心凡念的觉悟
English Translation: Destiny's favor calls for the resolution to sever all desires.

Chinese Subtitle: 你，可记好了
English Translation: You should mark well these words.

Chinese Subtitle: 老猴，这不能是师兄的回忆啊，你又弄鬼哄我们
English Translation: Hold on. This can't be Wukong's memory. You're fooling us, aren't you?

Chinese Subtitle: 如今，六根还缺一根
English Translation: Five of the six relics call for one.

Chinese Subtitle: 八戒，是哪一根？
English Translation: Bajie, tell me which?

Chinese Subtitle: 眼，耳，鼻，舌，身，意……
English Translation: Eye, Ear, Nose, Tongue, Body, and Mind.

Chinese Subtitle: 意，缺意
English Translation: Mind! It's Mind!

Chinese Subtitle: 你方才看到了什么？
English Translation: What did you just see?

Chinese Subtitle: 我们仨？
English Translation: The three of us?

Chinese Subtitle: 那就是最后一根
English Translation: That was the last one.

Chinese Subtitle: 我懂了，是你！
English Translation: I see now, it was you!

Chinese Subtitle: 我一早就猜疑，敢莫你才是大师兄的意
English Translation: I knew it from the beginning! You were the Mind of Wukong all along!

Chinese Subtitle: 难怪一路引导我们
English Translation: That's why you led us here.

Chinese Subtitle: 不是我，是他
English Translation: Not me. It's him.

Chinese Subtitle: 甚么鬼话，你说他是大师兄？
English Translation: Don't make me laugh! Him? He is Wukong?

Chinese Subtitle: 是，也不是
English Translation: Yes, and no.

Chinese Subtitle: 我说你个老猢狲，都到这儿了，还含含糊糊卖甚么关子！
English Translation: Cut to the chase, will you? We didn't come this far for your riddles!

Chinese Subtitle: 大圣死后，六根中有五根存留下来，被几个妖王分去
English Translation: After Wukong died, five of his six senses endured and were taken by the yaoguai kings.

Chinese Subtitle: 唯独意，没了
English Translation: Only his Mind was lost.

Chinese Subtitle: 意为六根之首，是每个生命独一无二的本质
English Translation: Mind is the first of the six. It's the essence unique to every life.

Chinese Subtitle: 正因如此，它注定会随着生命的逝去而陨灭
English Translation: Therefore, it's destined to fade away at life's end.

Chinese Subtitle: 等等
English Translation: Hold on.

Chinese Subtitle: 你说大师兄死透了，活不回来了？
English Translation: You mean Wukong's gone for good, never to return?

Chinese Subtitle: 你个老东西，一直在骗我们！
English Translation: You old bastard! You've been lying to us all this time!

Chinese Subtitle: 你的大师兄，绝无可能复生了
English Translation: That Wukong you knew will never return.

Chinese Subtitle: 但他的根本，并没有消疏
English Translation: But what made him remains.

Chinese Subtitle: 天地也自会再生出一个合适的后辈
English Translation: The universe will always bear him a successor,

Chinese Subtitle: 把那根本连同名号，一起传下去
English Translation: one who shall carry on his name and nature.

Chinese Subtitle: 这天选的后辈，便是天命人
English Translation: This chosen successor is the Destined One.

Chinese Subtitle: 你原是无名之人
English Translation: Nameless, you were.

Chinese Subtitle: 却在集齐六根的途中，斗了重重艰险，战了许多强者
English Translation: Yet perils and mighty foes you've braved to recover his relics.

Chinese Subtitle: 淬炼出了足以配得上那份力量的刚强意志
English Translation: Your will now stands resolute, worthy of his power.

Chinese Subtitle: 你是说，让这小猴子顶替我师兄？
English Translation: You mean this boy is to take Wukong's name?

Chinese Subtitle: 他配吗！
English Translation: He's not!

Chinese Subtitle: 孙悟空，早就死了！
English Translation: Sun Wukong is long gone!

Chinese Subtitle: 八戒，你心里明白，你那师兄，从来没那么圆满
English Translation: Bajie, deep down, you know he wasn't all that perfect.

Chinese Subtitle: 孙悟空既已不在，当接过这名号的人，或者是他
English Translation: Now that he is dead, this one, perhaps, shall bear the name in his stead.

Chinese Subtitle: 到了，后面我们不便再送，你须独自过去
English Translation: Here, we can venture forth with you no further. This task is yours alone.

Chinese Subtitle: 孙悟空死后，留下了一具六根全无的残破骨榇
English Translation: Sun Wukong left behind a broken shell, stripped of all his Six Senses.

Chinese Subtitle: 纵然多年过去，那残躯仍有天然灵性，能感应自己生前的气息
English Translation: Though ages have passed, it maintains a connection, attuned to the echos of his former self.

Chinese Subtitle: 你若真是天命所归，便去亲手将这具不生不灭无魂无魄的僵尸除去
English Translation: If you truly are the one destined, you must cast aside his soulless shell and merge the six into one.

Chinese Subtitle: 从此六根合一，西游重续
English Translation: Then, you shall be the one to begin the journey anew.

Chinese Subtitle: 不成不成！
English Translation: No, not on his own!

Chinese Subtitle: 他一向木木樗樗的，我不放心，我同他一齐去
English Translation: He's just a kid who knows nothing. I'll go with him.

Chinese Subtitle: 这个地方，本就是悟空死后残留的执念所化
English Translation: This place is shaped by Wukong's lingering obsession.

Chinese Subtitle: 这返本还原的最后一关，只有靠他自己
English Translation: It allows only his relic-bearer to face the final ordeal.

Chinese Subtitle: 你我帮不上忙，不信，你看
English Translation: We can escort him no more. See it for yourself.

Chinese Subtitle: 小猴子，好侄子，打不过就跑！
English Translation: Hear me, son. You can always run!

Chinese Subtitle: 悟空的名头，咱不要也罢！
English Translation: Remember, you don't have to bear Wukong's name!

Chinese Subtitle: 你们一定都听过关于他的故事
English Translation: You must have heard tales about him.

Chinese Subtitle: 有人说，他帮唐僧取到了真经
English Translation: Some say he helped Tang Monk fetch the Scriptures,

Chinese Subtitle: 封了斗战胜佛，从此留在了灵山
English Translation: was granted Buddhahood, and stayed on Mount Lingshan thereafter.

Chinese Subtitle: 也有人说，那个成佛的根本不是他
English Translation: Some say it was not him who was granted Buddhahood.

Chinese Subtitle: 真正的他，早就死在了西行路上
English Translation: The real him was already dead on the journey to the West.

Chinese Subtitle: 还有人说，西游从来都没有发生过
English Translation: Some say that the journey never happened.

Chinese Subtitle: 他只不过是说书人杜撰的一只猴子
English Translation: He is nothing but a monkey who lives in some storyteller's tall tale.

Chinese Subtitle: 但我要讲的故事，你们一定没有听过
English Translation: But now, you will hear a tale which no one has ever known.

Chinese Subtitle: 见他所见，思他所思
English Translation: In his steps, you've trod, from his eyes, you've seen.

Chinese Subtitle: 你兜兜转转，又回来这里，可有悟到什么？
English Translation: The circle has led you back. Have you gleaned any truths?

Chinese Subtitle: 有位故人，已等你许久了
English Translation: Long has an old friend waited for you.

Chinese Subtitle: 机缘已到，这最后一幅画，便是答案
English Translation: Destiny ripens. This last mural holds the key.

Chinese Subtitle: 去罢，这个故事，没人比他看得更清楚
English Translation: Go forth. No one sees this myth more clearly than him.

Chinese Subtitle: 山上冷，吃不着什么好酒
English Translation: Shame, I must greet you in this bitter cold without a hearty drink.

Chinese Subtitle: 千辛万苦寻到这里，想必不是来陪我解闷的
English Translation: It's no easy feat getting here—I know you didn't come to keep me company.

Chinese Subtitle: 你心里，一定有过不去的事，或者放不下的人
English Translation: In your heart, there must be something you can't get over or someone you can't let go of.

Chinese Subtitle: 我也一样
English Translation: Same goes for me.

Chinese Subtitle: 我杀不了那只猴子，没人杀得了，除了他自己
English Translation: I can't kill that monkey. No one can, except himself.

Chinese Subtitle: 后来我才明白，也许那是唯一的办法
English Translation: But at last, I see this is the only way.

Chinese Subtitle: 他没得选
English Translation: He had no choice.

Chinese Subtitle: 我，也没有
English Translation: And neither did I.

Chinese Subtitle: 开！
English Translation: Hyah!

Chinese Subtitle: 小猴子，你果然有几分他的影子
English Translation: You do have some of his spark, young monkey.

Chinese Subtitle: 既已如此，我便不再留情，得罪了！
English Translation: That's it. I won't hold back from now. Let s fight!

Chinese Subtitle: 今日不够尽兴，不如随我先回天上大醉三天，再大战三百回合
English Translation: Go back with me to the sky. Let us get drunk before we continue this fight!

Chinese Subtitle: 能把我逼到这般模样的，果然还是这只猴子
English Translation: None has what it takes to push me into this but this monkey!

Chinese Subtitle: 你不在的日子，我每天都在想你
English Translation: I've been thinking of you every day since.

Chinese Subtitle: 猴子，你还未用过，这般法相罢
English Translation: Monkey! Such power must be new to you.

Chinese Subtitle: 先与他们，操练操练
English Translation: You should first spar with them awhile.

Chinese Subtitle: 果真，是个好猴子！
English Translation: A monkey of worth indeed!

Chinese Subtitle: 既然帮你，便帮到底罢！
English Translation: As I've helped you, l shall see it through!

Chinese Subtitle: 太钝了，与你斗……还是这般费力损刀
English Translation: Blunt it is. Our battles.... always wear down my edge.

Chinese Subtitle: 这一把，方好陪你！
English Translation: This one should suit you well!

Chinese Subtitle: 石头，就得……
English Translation: A rock must be...

Chinese Subtitle: 硬！
English Translation: Solid!

Chinese Subtitle: 很好
English Translation: Very well.

Chinese Subtitle: 现在有十分像你了！
English Translation: Now you resemble your former self perfectly!

Chinese Subtitle: 有能耐，就在此间报仇罢！
English Translation: Then if you can, avenge him here and now!

Chinese Subtitle: 真个是硬
English Translation: You are hardy, truly.

Chinese Subtitle: 是他赢了
English Translation: The win is his.

Chinese Subtitle: 我遣众兄弟一路试你，就是为了这一刻
English Translation: My brothers tested you at my behest, all for this day.

Chinese Subtitle: 那一战后，直到今日，我才明白……
English Translation: And only now do I understand that fight.

Chinese Subtitle: 一世名，锁不住他
English Translation: No prestige can shackle him.

Chinese Subtitle: 一道箍，困不住他
English Translation: No band can keep him caged.

Chinese Subtitle: 以肉身之死，换意念永续
English Translation: A mortal death for an unbound mind and will.

Chinese Subtitle: 但愿你，不会辜负他
English Translation: May you not fail him.

Chinese Subtitle: 我心结已解，你的路，才刚开始
English Translation: I'm now at peace. Your journey, though, has just begun.

Chinese Subtitle: 若他能从那幅画中出来，这天命又该作何说法？
English Translation: Say, what's to come of destiny, if he steps out of that mural?

Chinese Subtitle: 我不过是个卖卦之人，卦象如何，天命便如何
English Translation: I make a living by reading what was written; the signs alone tell what's to come.

Chinese Subtitle: 未来之所以是未来，在于未定
English Translation: What's to come is what's not yet written.

Chinese Subtitle: 未定之事，天也难算
English Translation: No one can read what's not written.

Chinese Subtitle: 天命，即因果
English Translation: Destiny is written—in what's done.

Chinese Subtitle: 前因既定，谁也逃不脱后果
English Translation: What's done shapes what's to come. None escape.

Chinese Subtitle: 我算不出来，无非前因知道得还不够多
English Translation: It's all written for me—if only l uncover all that occurred.

Chinese Subtitle: 诶，这世上竟有先生算不出来的事情
English Translation: So there really is something even you cannot read.

Chinese Subtitle: 好事，好事！
English Translation: That's good, very good!

Chinese Subtitle: 成了佛又如何
English Translation: What does it matter if you become a Buddhha?

Chinese Subtitle: 那道箍，一直都在你头上
English Translation: That headband has always been on your head.

Chinese Subtitle: 睁开你的狗眼，我这就摘下来给你看！
English Translation: Keep those eyes wide open. Watch me rip it off and break free!

Chinese Subtitle: 孙悟空，汝因大闹天宫
English Translation: Sun Wukong, when you defied the Celestial Court,

Chinese Subtitle: 吾以甚深法力，压在五行山下
English Translation: I had to seal you beneath the mountains with my dharma.

Chinese Subtitle: 幸天灾满足，归于释教
English Translation: Yet, after enduring punishment, you embraced the dharma,

Chinese Subtitle: 且喜汝隐恶扬善，在途中炼魔降怪有功，全终全始
English Translation: uplifted good against evil, and subdued yaoguais throughout the journey.

Chinese Subtitle: 加升大职正果，汝为斗战胜佛
English Translation: For your contribution, now I bestow upon you the title of Victorious Fighting Buddha.

Chinese Subtitle: 那厮触犯了上天，玉帝立此三事
English Translation: He defied the Celestial Court, and the Jade Emperor imposed three ordeals.

Chinese Subtitle: 只等鸡嗛了米尽，狗舔得面尽，灯燎断锁梃
English Translation: Only when the chicken finishes pecking the rice, the dog laps up the flours, and the lamp burns through the key....

Chinese Subtitle: 那方才该下雨哩
English Translation: The rain will fall.

Chinese Subtitle: 哥哥们，饮了这杯，我们一起打上凌霄宝殿！
English Translation: Bottoms up, brothers! One final toast before we crash the Celestial Palace!

Chinese Subtitle: 久在樊笼里，复得返自然
English Translation: Long bound by worldly cage, now free in nature's sage.

Chinese Subtitle: 路上可曾见到那些无主的孤魂？
English Translation: Have you seen those nameless souls adrift on your path?

Chinese Subtitle: 灵蕴不散，浮于空中
English Translation: Their wills float aloft, never to fade.

Chinese Subtitle: 可惜你的葫芦不中用，我这葫芦又认主
English Translation: Shame, your gourd serves little purpose, and mine answers solely to me.

Chinese Subtitle: 我有一法，可超度孤魂，归全反真，于你必有帮助
English Translation: I know a way to guide the souls, mend their paths, and set them free. It will aid you.

Chinese Subtitle: 这才像样，不能装天却可度人，荡去痴念，早入轮回
English Translation: Now, this is better. This gourd, though humble, may save the lost, banish their obsessions, and guide them.

Chinese Subtitle: 既承天命，自是无法回头
English Translation: For one as destined as you, there can be no turning back.

Chinese Subtitle: 你我无非都是这茫茫天地间的蓬草，能往何处去呢？
English Translation: We are like tumbleweeds, drifting through life, with a destiny beyond our grasp.

Chinese Subtitle: 盛景易朽，以笔存之
English Translation: Fair sights fade. But with ink, I bid them stay.

Chinese Subtitle: 你已在路上，又如何能停下脚步
English Translation: The road has claimed you. Now you must see it through.

Chinese Subtitle: 只管任性向前，你我还会再见
English Translation: Your heart will guide you further. We shall meet again.

Chinese Subtitle: 世人都晓神仙好，惟有功名忘不了
English Translation: Their minds yearn to ascend, yet fame still holds sway.

Chinese Subtitle: 古今将相在何方，荒冢一堆草没了
English Translation: Their glory fades through time, in tombs of somber gray.

Chinese Subtitle: 分散逐风转，此已非常身
English Translation: Hurled by gales, to and fro, changed from our former glow.

Chinese Subtitle: 我呀，算准你会来到这里
English Translation: The signs told me you would come here.

Chinese Subtitle: 天命便是如此，一步一步，有缘有故
English Translation: Such is destiny. What's done is one step before what's to come.

Chinese Subtitle: 此间藏一珍宝，乃当年泾河老龙王被斩时脱落人间的鳞片，他人无法得见
English Translation: It houses a treasure that none other can see—a scale shed by the old Loong King of Jing River upon his beheading.

Chinese Subtitle: 小友可否在这黄风岭见过？
English Translation: Have you seen it in this ridge, young friend?

Chinese Subtitle: 当年泾河龙王违抗天命，王帝震怒欲行连坐之罪
English Translation: When the Loong King defied the Court, the jade Emperor was set to punish his entire house.

Chinese Subtitle: 吓得那四渎龙神躲藏了起来
English Translation: The four sons of the Loong King, deities of the four waters, fled.

Chinese Subtitle: 神仙？神仙又有何异？
English Translation: Deities? Not even they have control over their destinies.

Chinese Subtitle: 只要染了因果，不过都是盘中餐，池中物
English Translation: Once caught in the threads of karma, all are mere offerings on the platter.

Chinese Subtitle: 江河淮济，四渎龙神，生死已定，你我皆然
English Translation: Four loongs for the four waters under the sky. Their destiny is sealed, as yours and mine.

Chinese Subtitle: 巧了巧了，天寒遇故友，夫复何求
English Translation: Well, well! Refreshing winds and an old friend. I couldn't be happier

Chinese Subtitle: 来来来，一齐赏雪吟诗
English Translation: Join me. Snow is the best soil for poetry.

Chinese Subtitle: 唉，看来这茶今天是喝不成
English Translation: Well, so much for a quite cup of tea today.

Chinese Subtitle: 莫急，猴兄弟
English Translation: Hold it, my friend!

Chinese Subtitle: 来，先坐下
English Translation: Sit with me awhile.

Chinese Subtitle: 那怪黑毛赤尻，面相奸顽，可不好捉
English Translation: Dark furred, devious-natured. Hunting that guai is no simple task.

Chinese Subtitle: 你虽有些粗浅修为，但这极北之地天寒地冻
English Translation: You do have some skills, but this land bites with cold.

Chinese Subtitle: 胡乱轻造，性命难保
English Translation: Lack of readiness could be your undoing.

Chinese Subtitle: 今日既有缘再见，我便教给你一招防身御寒的小神通
English Translation: Our reunion is destined, and so is my role to teach you this little trick.

Chinese Subtitle: 我非一般人，此非一般火
English Translation: I am extraordinary, as is my flame.

Chinese Subtitle: 以后无论伤了累了冷了，就用棒子在地上画个圈儿
English Translation: it shall help you in need, be it injury, weariness or frostbite.

Chinese Subtitle: 凭他甚么虎豹狼虫，妖魔鬼怪，俱莫敢近
English Translation: Beasts or yaoguais, none shall dare to draw nigh.

Chinese Subtitle: 但识琴中趣，何劳弦上音
English Translation: Knowing the joy within the play, why chase the notes astray?

Chinese Subtitle: 情啊爱啊，不过是白云苍狗，终归都会结满蛛网，重归虚无
English Translation: Love and passion are as fleeting as the clouds. In the end, they leave nothing but cobwebs and dust.

Chinese Subtitle: 猴兄弟，破镜难重圆
English Translation: A broken mirror cannot be made whole again, my friend.

Chinese Subtitle: 你有空劝劝那位猪长老，可别陷得太深
English Translation: Tell Master Pig if you will, that attachments are not to be dwelt upon.

Chinese Subtitle: 本是女中仙，思凡堕九天
English Translation: Immortal once, from above. For love, she strayed.

Chinese Subtitle: 作茧缚洞中，人间又一年
English Translation: In her webbed prison, through mortal years, she stayed.

Chinese Subtitle: 何以称我情，浊酒且自陶
English Translation: What comfort does this heart implore? A humble drink, its solace I adore.

Chinese Subtitle: 好酒当配好器
English Translation: A fine brew deserves a fitting gourd.

Chinese Subtitle: 这个，拿去！
English Translation: Here, take this!

Chinese Subtitle: 牛魔王认了命，可是有人不想认
English Translation: The Bull King accepted his destiny, but there are others who refuse to do the same.

Chinese Subtitle: 清官难断家事，你我何必沾手
English Translation: Family strife confounds even the wisest. Why should we meddle?

Chinese Subtitle: 喝上一壶好酒，忘绝烦恼忧愁
English Translation: With a full gourd's draft by my side, let cares drift away into the tide.

Chinese Subtitle: 无有因，头悬市曹何故？
English Translation: For what deed, must his head be hung for all to see?

Chinese Subtitle: 无有因，四渎失管何故？
English Translation: For what deed, must the waters they governed roam free?

Chinese Subtitle: 无有因，诸色惘惘何故？
English Translation: For what deed, must all matters not know how to be?

Chinese Subtitle: 无有因，慈悲颠倒何故？
English Translation: For what deed, must mercy's hand sow woe upon thee?

Chinese Subtitle: 无有因，林隐赤髯何故？
English Translation: For what deed, must the red one into the woods flee?

Chinese Subtitle: 是曰：木生炉烟，雾长雷电，击背而歌，真意自现
English Translation: Smoke rises high, from wood afire. Hit the back, let the beats respire, as in mist, thunders conspire.

Chinese Subtitle: 无有因，砂掩骊鬓何故？
English Translation: For what deed, must from streams into sands thou flee?

Chinese Subtitle: 是曰：声振波浑，滩余旧痕，藏战于守，巧便为门
English Translation: Resonant waves profound, pulsing through the ground. Evade their might unbound, and victory is surely found.

Chinese Subtitle: 无有因，岸伏青背何故？
English Translation: For what deed, must the cyan one onto the shores flee?

Chinese Subtitle: 是曰：夕照剑辙，万象澄澈，电光朝露，聚散离合
English Translation: Evening light on snow, paths clear below. Lightning strikes in flow; all happens before you know.

Chinese Subtitle: 无有因，庙潜黄衣何故？
English Translation: For what deed, must the yellow one to the shrines flee?

Chinese Subtitle: 是曰：细碎沾衣，萦空堕地，犁然寡欲，心动神疲
English Translation: In the air they swing, to the earth they bring. With snowflakes cling, spirit may wear thin.

Chinese Subtitle: 算卦的袁先生料事如神，但他一定不会料到……
English Translation: For all his foresight, Yuan the Signteller could never have known that...

Chinese Subtitle: 我化为纹饰，藏于他身……
English Translation: I've hidden upon his garb as a pattern.

Chinese Subtitle: 先父为成全取经而死，我等无一日不想为先父报仇
English Translation: Our sire gave his life to pave the way for the journey, and not a day passes that we do not yearn to avenge him.

Chinese Subtitle: 却无一日不是流离失所，无家可归
English Translation: Yet every day we find ourselves adrift, without a home to call our own.

Chinese Subtitle: 没了你，便能了却因果
English Translation: I'll kill you to unbind our destinies.

Chinese Subtitle: 先父违抗王帝旨意，头悬市曹
English Translation: Our sire's head was hung when he defied the Celestial Court.

Chinese Subtitle: 我等恐玉帝见罪，拜求袁先生搭救，逃离四渎
English Translation: We dreaded the Jade Emperor's wrath and pleaded with Master Yuan to help us abscond from our waters.

Chinese Subtitle: 可袁先生说，躲得了一时，躲不了一世
English Translation: But he warned us: we might hide for a time, but not forever.

Chinese Subtitle: 终归会有人来取我们的性命
English Translation: In the end, someone will come to claim our lives.

Chinese Subtitle: 先生还说，舍身成仁，便是我族世世代代的天命
English Translation: He had more to say: Sires to sons, we are destined to die for the righteous cause.

Chinese Subtitle: 我信，但我不认
English Translation: I trust him, yet I won't obey.

Chinese Subtitle: 但愿你的命，不是再为这老天作嫁衣
English Translation: May your path not, once more, be a mere thread in their grand design.

Chinese Subtitle: 你那三个兄弟，皆已诛服
English Translation: All three of your brothers have been claimed.

Chinese Subtitle: 不去相会，更待何时？
English Translation: If not now, when will you reunite?

Chinese Subtitle: 缘落缘起，不妨再赌一把……
English Translation: Destiny repeats itself, always. Why not cast the die once more?

Chinese Subtitle: 这可如何是好，如何是好啊
English Translation: What should I do? I'm caught in a tight spot.

Chinese Subtitle: 过来，别怕，你马哥出身高门大户，不会轻易吃人
English Translation: Come closer, and fear not. Noble blood doesn't prey on travelers like you.

Chinese Subtitle: 阁下一看就不是这里的妖怪，莫非也是来拜那黑风大王的？
English Translation: You don't look like a yaoguai from these parts. Have you come to earn the Black Wind King's favor?

Chinese Subtitle: 听我一言，这黑熊外强中干，靠不住的
English Translation: Hear me. That bear is but a hollow shell. He can grant you nothing.

Chinese Subtitle: 你还是趁早离了此处才好
English Translation: Don't waste your time on him.

Chinese Subtitle: 起死复生，金银财宝，都是唬人的，那些个小妖都被骗啦
English Translation: He lies about cheating death and even the treasures. His followers are, all of them, deceived.

Chinese Subtitle: 黑风怪好弄把戏，嘴上修真养性，肚里贪婪欺心，我所求之事不敢托付
English Translation: Black Wind Guai is a sly one. He preaches virtue with a heart full of greed. I wouldn't entrust him with my plan.

Chinese Subtitle: 虽不知阁下为何来此，但定要多加小心
English Translation: I do not know why you are here, but you should be vigilant.

Chinese Subtitle: 我此刻心急如焚，需即刻启程，就此别过
English Translation: Now, I'm pressed for time. Fare thee well, then.

Chinese Subtitle: 鼠爷爷们，我真是来见你们家大王的！
English Translation: Good sirs, I just want a word with your king

Chinese Subtitle: 错怪了，错怪了！我是来拜见你们大王的！
English Translation: This is a mistake. A mistake! With my respect, I quest an audience with your King!

Chinese Subtitle: 阁下怎会在此？
English Translation: What brought you here?

Chinese Subtitle: 快走！快走！不用你救！
English Translation: Go. Leave! I don't need your help!

Chinese Subtitle: 阁下与我十分有缘，黑风山一别，竟还能在黄风岭相见
English Translation: Fate binds us, sir. From the Black Wind Mountain to here, we meet again.

Chinese Subtitle: 这帮鼠辈不分好歹，径直将我绑了
English Translation: Those rats... They tied me up on sight for no reason.

Chinese Subtitle: 打诨说送去什么卧虎寺，腌好了送与大王
English Translation: joking they'd prepare me for their king's table!

Chinese Subtitle: 这里的妖怪皆是饿鬼
English Translation: This place crawls with yaoguais eager for a bite.

Chinese Subtitle: 不过阁下放心，想吃你马哥，没那么容易
English Translation: But don't worry. If they bite into me, they'll bite more than they can chew.

Chinese Subtitle: 这黄风岭猫鼠同眠，乱作一团
English Translation: This place is a jumble of rats and cats—all at each other's throats.

Chinese Subtitle: 黄风大圣却不闻不问，怪哉，怪哉！
English Translation: And the Yellow Wind Sage keeps silent. How odd!

Chinese Subtitle: 这样的大王谁敢投拜？
English Translation: Who would swear fealty to such a king?

Chinese Subtitle: 我奉劝阁下，赶紧逃命，此地不宜久留
English Translation: Best make haste and go. Never linger in a peril such as this.

Chinese Subtitle: 你放心去便是，小小鼠妖，能奈我何？
English Translation: Just leave. These rats are no match for me.

Chinese Subtitle: 我自有法子逃生
English Translation: I can make my own way out.

Chinese Subtitle: 你形骸虽瘦，遇上这群饿鬼，也饶不过你
English Translation: You are a skinny one, but these rats aren't picky eaters.

Chinese Subtitle: 还是快些逃罢
English Translation: Flee, the quicker the better.

Chinese Subtitle: 我大事未了，自会趁机逃生
English Translation: I won't die here with my task undone.

Chinese Subtitle: 此地人多眼杂，有缘定会再见
English Translation: There are too many eyes around here. We'll meet again if fate wills it.

Chinese Subtitle: 老友！
English Translation: My friend!

Chinese Subtitle: 先前在黄风岭一无所获，不得已，只好来求黄眉老佛
English Translation: Yellow Wind Ridge offered me nothing. Yellowbrow the Buddha was my next plea.

Chinese Subtitle: 来到这小西天拜过了佛爷爷才知，我这一生为他人虚度，少了许多快乐
English Translation: Only after meeting His Grace in The New West did l see - I wasted my life for others and missed much joy.

Chinese Subtitle: 不走了……
English Translation: No more journey now...

Chinese Subtitle: 虽说家中大王遭难，可世间福祸不皆是自取？
English Translation: My king is suffering, yes. But does one hot weave the threads of one's destiny?

Chinese Subtitle: 为己活，才自在
English Translation: Peace is living for yourself.

Chinese Subtitle: 佛爷爷说得对，纵情恣欲，无忧无虑
English Translation: His Grace speaks true. Indulge, and you shall be carefree.

Chinese Subtitle: 我……我从没像现在这般快活
English Translation: This joy... It's new to me, like never before.

Chinese Subtitle: 想当年，我家大王也曾在佛地修行，连他的孩子也是菩萨的弟子哩
English Translation: My king once sought wisdom in such a dharma place. His son, too, was a disciple of a Bodhisattva.

Chinese Subtitle: 如今我皈依佛门，也算是追随大王
English Translation: Now I too walk on this path. I hope I'm following in my king's steps.

Chinese Subtitle: 我劝老友，就留在此地，你我做个同门可好？
English Translation: Say, my friend, why don't you stay here and tread this path with me.

Chinese Subtitle: 可怕！可怕！
English Translation: Grim and dire is this land!

Chinese Subtitle: 从小西天辗转来到盘丝岭，欲求见百目真人
English Translation: I came here from the New West for the wisdom of the Hundred-Eyed One.

Chinese Subtitle: 谁知他闭观不见，还把我捉进洞来
English Translation: But he shut his doors and made me prisoner in this lair.

Chinese Subtitle: 我听说那蜘蛛精大多如狼似虎，可能正需我这般精壮汉子补补元气
English Translation: Tales speak of these insatiable spider guais. They could use a strong male like me to consume and practice.

Chinese Subtitle: 今日多亏猴兄弟！
English Translation: Much I owe you today, my friend!

Chinese Subtitle: 若非你一路相救，我怕是回不成火焰山了
English Translation: Without your help along the way, I would see no more of the Flaming Mountains.

Chinese Subtitle: 猴兄弟可曾听过天命人？
English Translation: Ever heard tell of a Destined One, my friend?

Chinese Subtitle: 说是有位天命人一路打杀，誓要救活孙大圣！
English Translation: They say he marches and fights on a quest to bring back the Great Sage!

Chinese Subtitle: 我家大王与孙大圣曾是结拜兄弟
English Translation: The Great Sage and my king once swore brotherhood.

Chinese Subtitle: 大圣陨落后，大王好似变了个人，将我等遣散
English Translation: After the Sage fell, the king dismissed every one of us. He became someone not himself.

Chinese Subtitle: 那天命人若真能救活孙大圣，在下也愿助其一臂之力！
English Translation: If the Destined One is really the one who can bring back the Sage, he can count on my humble support!

Chinese Subtitle: 这一路来我到处求人，虽计穷力竭，一无所获，却也想通了
English Translation: My plea for aid was met only with silence along this path. But in turn, I've seen through it all.

Chinese Subtitle: 猴兄弟，我已做好打算，求人不如求已
English Translation: My mind is made, friend. I shall rely on none but myself.

Chinese Subtitle: 他们不救，我自己去救！
English Translation: If none shall aid, I will act on my own!

Chinese Subtitle: 他日若能在火焰山相逢，定与你饮酒欢会
English Translation: Should our paths cross at the Flaming Mountains, we'll toast to our reunion.

Chinese Subtitle: 万万保重
English Translation: Now, take great care.

Chinese Subtitle: 住手！
English Translation: Don't!

Chinese Subtitle: 死便死了，只求死得竭绝
English Translation: In death, I desire but a complete and final cessation.

Chinese Subtitle: 能挡住这鬼车，也算值当
English Translation: My life for the cart's demise. I deem it worthy.

Chinese Subtitle: 若不能救我脱身于阴诡之术，就走罢
English Translation: If you can't free me from his evil, you should walk away.

Chinese Subtitle: 生者死之根，死者生之根
English Translation: From death roots life, and from life, death.

Chinese Subtitle: 我是错信了那妖仙
English Translation: I should have discerned his malice.

Chinese Subtitle: 既已好言相告，就此别过罢！
English Translation: Since I have bid farewell with kind words, you should depart now.

Chinese Subtitle: 我只求死后安宁，不愿做浑噩之鬼，走！
English Translation: My body has been exploited. I beg you to leave my soul in peace. Go!

Chinese Subtitle: 此刻你强取此鞭，我必魂飞魄散，万万不可
English Translation: Take the whip now, and my soul shall scatter. I implore you to stop.

Chinese Subtitle: 苦海无边，唯有放下……
English Translation: Life has too much agony. I should let go...

Chinese Subtitle: 你不去超度那至阴之躯，我亦无法解脱
English Translation: I cannot rest in peace before my body is freed from darkness.

Chinese Subtitle: 妖仙已除，我心安矣
English Translation: I can rest in peace now...

Chinese Subtitle: 这一路，没承想，终是做了鬼……
English Translation: Never thought I'd die before I'd finished my task...

Chinese Subtitle: 你速速前来，此魂此魄，不久矣
English Translation: Come forth now as my soul's about to vanish...

Chinese Subtitle: 一念尚存，为的便是等你
English Translation: It has lingered for you for too long.

Chinese Subtitle: 取走罢！
English Translation: It's yours now.

Chinese Subtitle: 生死茫茫，大梦一场……
English Translation: My journey of life, a fleeting dream...

Chinese Subtitle: 千重水，万重山，过了黑风第一关
English Translation: Across streams, over hills, and through the black wind, your blood has spilled.

Chinese Subtitle: 洪钟响，狼蛇藏，烈火熊熊双目盲
English Translation: Wolves howl, snakes wind, flames lick, and the smoke blinds.

Chinese Subtitle: 小妖打得费劲，大怪更是仓皇
English Translation: Stumble on the lesser, lame; crash before their betters, shame.

Chinese Subtitle: 小妖打得费劲，大怪更是仓皇
English Translation: Stumble on the lesser, lame; crash before their betters, shame.

Chinese Subtitle: 如此笨拙痴蠢，如何见得真章？
English Translation: With such clumsiness, what destiny do you claim?

Chinese Subtitle: 螳螂捕蝉，黄雀在后
English Translation: As the small fish catches its prey, the bigger lurks behind.

Chinese Subtitle: 黄雀是谁，我看不到
English Translation: Who is the bigger fish? I can't see it.

Chinese Subtitle: 蝉与螳螂……
English Translation: As for the prey and the small fish...

Chinese Subtitle: 倒是遍地乱跑
English Translation: They are swimming everywhere.

Chinese Subtitle: 那和尚乃金蝉子转生，是西方如来佛祖座下第二个徒弟
English Translation: In his last life, the monk was Jinchanzi, the second disciple to Buddha in the West.

Chinese Subtitle: 因听经不专，轻慢佛法，被如来贬落凡尘
English Translation: Yet, his arrogance led him to disregard the dharma teachings, and as a result, the Buddha cast him down to the mortal realm.

Chinese Subtitle: 夜被火烧是他取经之路的第十一难，后面还有七十难呐……
English Translation: He was destined to face eighty-one trials throughout his journey. The fire for that kasaya was merely the eleventh.

Chinese Subtitle: 一介凡夫，二百七十岁还不知足，偏要图那一件袈裟
English Translation: A mere human blessed with a lifespan nearing three centuries, yet he was never sated. He just had to seize that one kasaya.

Chinese Subtitle: 参禅百年，不敌贪心一瞬
English Translation: Centuries of devotion, undone by a moment's greed.

Chinese Subtitle: 到头来，成了个孤魂野鬼，可悲可悲
English Translation: In the end, a lost soul became him. How pathetic.

Chinese Subtitle: 好好的守山大神不做，又跑回黑风山做长生的美梦
English Translation: A fine guardian for Guanyin he could have been, yet he came back here to daydream immortality.

Chinese Subtitle: 可惜空有贼心，却无贼胆
English Translation: Sadly he had the greed, but lacked the pluck.
Target Word: had the greed, but lacked the pluck

Chinese Subtitle: 骗得了小妖，骗不过自己
English Translation: He could fool his followers, but not himself.

Chinese Subtitle: 他的命，自带上禁箍之时便已注定
English Translation: His destiny was sealed the moment he donned that band.

Chinese Subtitle: 要说地上什么神仙最多，那便是土地了
English Translation: Which deities do most abound upon the earth? The Keepers, surely.

Chinese Subtitle: 官职虽小，人间的事却无所不晓
English Translation: Though humble in rank, nothing in the mortal world escapes their eyes.

Chinese Subtitle: 可别怠慢喽，谁知他们背后，又是哪位高人？
English Translation: You'd be wise not to spurn their kind, for who knows what powers stand behind them.

Chinese Subtitle: 你风沙里走了这一遭，可曾寻到天尽头的古国？
English Translation: With the wind and sand you've endured here, did you reach the forgotten kingdom at the end of the land?

Chinese Subtitle: 又可曾撞上虎伥坠崖，石头打架？
English Translation: Did you find the clash of stones and the fall of Tiger's Acolyte?

Chinese Subtitle: 只怕你聋了耳又乱了心
English Translation: If you shut your ears and heed only your inner murmur,

Chinese Subtitle: 越是贪图完满，越是搜不干净
English Translation: I fear, the more you yearn for flawless endings, the further you'll stray from the path.

Chinese Subtitle: 鼠与虎，都一样，没天命又不认命
English Translation: Rats and cats. Neither grasped their destiny, and yet neither admitted it.

Chinese Subtitle: 小猴子你听，那风里传来的，都是求而不得的声音
English Translation: Listen closely, young one, their complaints ride upon the wind.

Chinese Subtitle: 救也救过，罚也罚过
English Translation: Spared him, punished him.

Chinese Subtitle: 躲也躲过，藏也藏过
English Translation: Avoided him, eluded him.

Chinese Subtitle: 先天一箪食，后天一把灰
English Translation: Master's grace taught, deciple's plot sought.

Chinese Subtitle: 八爪金龙又如何，动了凡心，菩萨也要吃亏
English Translation: His Golden Loong Staff meant nothing once mortal compassions took root. Bodhisattvas too could fall in this way.

Chinese Subtitle: 盘古至今曾见风，不似这风来不善
English Translation: No wind wrought such destruction ere, the Samadhi Wind brought only malice here.

Chinese Subtitle: 那场风，乱了金刚，惊了罗汉
English Translation: Vajras and Arhats, before the Yellow Wind shivered.

Chinese Subtitle: 文殊走了青狮，普贤失了白象，弄得三界震颤
English Translation: Mounts of Bodhisattvas, a lion cyan and an elephant white, in fear quivered.

Chinese Subtitle: 这般法术高强的孽畜，遇见识人的师父
English Translation: A wicked yaoguai of fierce might, followed a discerning master.

Chinese Subtitle: 是他的福分，却也成了他的灾难
English Translation: It was his blessing, but also became his curse.

Chinese Subtitle: 寿星牵白鹿，老君骑青牛
English Translation: On a white deer, or a green bull, the Celestial Courtiers mount.

Chinese Subtitle: 文殊坐青狮，普贤御白象
English Translation: On a cyan lion, or a white elephant, the Bodhissatvas ride.

Chinese Subtitle: 这巨虫……说不准也是哪位的坐骑
English Translation: This great beetle too could be someone's mount.

Chinese Subtitle: 信什么不好，偏要信妖
English Translation: They could have put their beliefin anything, yet they chose a yaoguai.

Chinese Subtitle: 不尊天道，必降天灾
English Translation: Those who deny the rules must suffer the wrath.

Chinese Subtitle: 都说妖怪吃人，其实人也吃人，而且吃得更狠
English Translation: They say yaoguais prey on men, yet men prey on men too, only more ruthlessly.

Chinese Subtitle: 那小小井底的公平交易，与外面又有何不同？
English Translation: A fair trade in that tiny well. How does it differ from the trades out in the world.

Chinese Subtitle: 石猴不过自封齐天，那司磬童儿却敢自立宗庙，自封世尊
English Translation: That stone monkey merely named himself a sage. Yet this altar boy dared to found his own faith and proclaim himself Buddha.
Target Word: found his own faith and proclaim himself Buddha

Chinese Subtitle: 亏得你佛心坚忍，勇猛无惧，竟抵住了他的引诱
English Translation: Your faith is firm and will unwavering. You resisted his lures.

Chinese Subtitle: 那些个星君魔将，高僧大能，一个个乱了性情，坏了道心
English Translation: All those who were high and mighty found their minds lost and their faith stained...

Chinese Subtitle: 那些个星君魔将，高僧大能，一个个乱了性情，坏了道心
English Translation: All those who were high and mighty found their minds lost and their faith stained...

Chinese Subtitle: 真是因为放不下心中的偶像？
English Translation: But was it truly because of their devotion to Yellowbrow?

Chinese Subtitle: 你一路迎霜冒雪，可曾嗅到世人痴心破灭的味道？
English Translation: As you braved ice and snow, did the stench of shattered ego reach your nose?

Chinese Subtitle: 一纸敬鼠令，父子反目成仇
English Translation: An edict for rats turned a son against his sire.

Chinese Subtitle: 他誓不与妖为伍，愤而离家，再也没回去过
English Translation: Vowing to draw the line with yaoguais, he left his home in fury, never to return.

Chinese Subtitle: 如今因旧怨落困牢狱，才又念起故乡
English Translation: Now an old grudge lands him caged, and he recalls his home at last.

Chinese Subtitle: 可没了故人，又哪有故乡?
English Translation: But with loved ones lost, where can one find home again?

Chinese Subtitle: 雪山大士舍全身求半偈，故能证成佛果
English Translation: For half a verse of the ultimate truth, Snow Mountain Ascetic gave his life, so attained Buddhahood.

Chinese Subtitle: 不似这般，怎能当得鼻祖？
English Translation: Such is the sole way to rise above all and build a faith.

Chinese Subtitle: 天生圣人若不敬天，孤高自傲，任意妄为
English Translation: If those with talents should proudly scorn the rules and do as they please...

Chinese Subtitle: 那又何来四海升平，三界清静？
English Translation: How then may all the realms enjoy peace and prosperity?

Chinese Subtitle: 没人知道，他究竟在想什么
English Translation: Not a soul can fathom his mind.

Chinese Subtitle: 北方有个真武，号荡魔天尊
English Translation: Xuanwu of the north, the Vanquisher of Yaoguais.

Chinese Subtitle: 昔年奉玉帝敕旨，剪伐天下妖邪，龟蛇二将乃其左右侍从
English Translation: The jade Emperor once ordered him to purge the world of evil. The Turtle and the Snake were his generals back then.

Chinese Subtitle: 可惜如今，龟蛇不再能合形，真武徒剩虚名
English Translation: Alas, the Snake General can no longer join the ranks, and Xuanwu is no more.

Chinese Subtitle: 西天拜佛，山高路险，除了几位徒弟
English Translation: The journey entailed an arduous road. The monk had his disciples...

Chinese Subtitle: 还有六丁六甲、五方揭谛
English Translation: And the Eighteen Dharma Guardians, the Twelve Zodiac Deities,

Chinese Subtitle: 四值功曹、一十八位护教伽蓝保守唐僧左右
English Translation: the Five Directional Guides, and the Four Temporal Overseers.

Chinese Subtitle: 他们各有神通，你若见到，亦可多加来往
English Translation: Each boasts unique powers. Should your paths cross, strike up a connection.

Chinese Subtitle: 本事虽有长进，却还是个夯货
English Translation: You have grown in strength, but not in wisdom.

Chinese Subtitle: 这番不但伤了悟能与他的小情人，还毁了人家的大阵，罪过罪过
English Translation: You've not only hurt Bajie and his darling but also laid waste to the seal of the high ones. A grave misdeed!

Chinese Subtitle: 凡人也好，神仙也罢，都想着戒断过往，重启炉灶
English Translation: Mortal or Immortal, all seek to break from the past and start anew.

Chinese Subtitle: 可命运呐，就像爱人的舌头，嘴里一套，心里一套
English Translation: Yet destiny, like a lover's tongue, speaks one way and means another.

Chinese Subtitle: 哪怕亲口尝到，也不知到底是想要，还是不想要
English Translation: Though you may savor it yourself, you can never tell if you truly want it or not.

Chinese Subtitle: 当年这蜈蚣精被毗蓝菩萨收服，囚在紫云山
English Translation: Long ago, the many legged one was subdued by Bodhisattva Pilanpo and locked on Purple Cloud Mountain.

Chinese Subtitle: 是上方求请，方得生还
English Translation: Only by a plea from the Celestial Court was he spared.

Chinese Subtitle: 神仙做事，多让耳目代劳，本尊坦然自若，如下棋一般
English Translation: The Immortals dispatch minions to enact their will, while they remain serene, as if playing a game of chess.

Chinese Subtitle: 可怜那些棋子，他们明明自知是棋子
English Translation: Pity those pawns! They know full well what they are...

Chinese Subtitle: 却心怀侥幸，甚至以此为傲
